GP11brahmppu:27405: śṛṇudhvaṃ saṃyatā bhūtvā varṇadharmān mayoditān // BrP_222.2 //
GP11brahmppu:27407: nityodakī bhaved vipraḥ kuryāc cāgniparigraham // BrP_222.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27408: vṛttyarthaṃ yājayet tv anyān dvijān adhyāpayet tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27409: kuryāt pratigrahādānaṃ yajñārthaṃ jñānato dvijāḥ // BrP_222.4 //
GP11brahmppu:27412: gavi ratne ca pārakye samabuddhir bhaved dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27413: ṛtāv abhigamaḥ patnyāṃ śasyate vāsya bho dvijāḥ // BrP_222.6 //
GP11brahmppu:27414: dānāni dadyād icchāto dvijebhyaḥ kṣatriyo 'pi hi /
GP11brahmppu:27415: yajec ca vividhair yajñair adhīyīta ca bho dvijāḥ // BrP_222.7 //
GP11brahmppu:27419: bhavanti nṛpate rakṣā yato yajñādikarmaṇām // BrP_222.9 //
GP11brahmppu:27421: prāpnoty abhimatāṃl lokān varṇasaṃsthāpako nṛpaḥ // BrP_222.10 //
GP11brahmppu:27422: pāśupālyaṃ vaṇijyāṃ ca kṛṣiṃ ca munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27423: vaiśyāya jīvikāṃ brahmā dadau lokapitāmahaḥ // BrP_222.11 //
GP11brahmppu:27424: tasyāpy adhyayanaṃ yajño dānaṃ dharmaś ca śasyate /
GP11brahmppu:27427: krayavikrayajair vāpi dhanaiḥ kārubhavais tu vā // BrP_222.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27428: dānaṃ dadyāc ca śūdro 'pi pākayajñair yajeta ca /
GP11brahmppu:27429: pitryādikaṃ ca vai sarvaṃ śūdraḥ kurvīta tena vai // BrP_222.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27433: satyaṃ śaucam anāyāso maṅgalaṃ priyavāditā // BrP_222.16 //
GP11brahmppu:27435: anasūyā ca sāmānyā varṇānāṃ kathitā guṇāḥ // BrP_222.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27437: guṇās tathopadharmāś ca viprādīnām ime dvijāḥ // BrP_222.18 //
GP11brahmppu:27439: rājanyasya ca vaiśyoktaṃ śūdrakarmāṇi caitayoḥ // BrP_222.19 //
GP11brahmppu:27440: sasāmarthye sati tyājyam ubhābhyām api ca dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27441: tad evāpadi kartavyaṃ na kuryāt karmasaṃkaram // BrP_222.20 //
GP11brahmppu:27442: ity ete kathitā viprā varṇadharmā mayādya vai /
GP11brahmppu:27443: dharmam āśramiṇāṃ samyag bruvato 'pi nibodhata // BrP_222.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27445: guror gehe vasan viprā brahmacārī samāhitaḥ // BrP_222.22 //
GP11brahmppu:27447: vratāni caratā grāhyo vedaś ca kṛtabuddhinā // BrP_222.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27448: ubhe saṃdhye raviṃ viprās tathaivāgniṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27449: upatiṣṭhet tathā kuryād guror apy abhivādanam // BrP_222.24 //
GP11brahmppu:27450: sthite tiṣṭhed vrajed yāti nīcair āsīta cāsite /
GP11brahmppu:27451: śiṣyo gurau dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pratikūlaṃ ca saṃtyajet // BrP_222.25 //
GP11brahmppu:27453: anujñātaṃ ca bhikṣānnam aśnīyād guruṇā tataḥ // BrP_222.26 //
GP11brahmppu:27459: gṛhasthakāryam akhilaṃ kuryād viprāḥ svaśaktitaḥ // BrP_222.29 //
GP11brahmppu:27460: nirvāpeṇa pitṝn arcya yajñair devāṃs tathātithīn /
GP11brahmppu:27461: annair munīṃś ca svādhyāyair apatyena prajāpatim // BrP_222.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27464: bhikṣābhujaś ca ye kecit parivrāḍ brahmacāriṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27465: te 'py atra pratitiṣṭhanti gārhasthyaṃ tena vai param // BrP_222.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27467: aṭanti vasudhāṃ viprāḥ pṛthivīdarśanāya ca // BrP_222.33 //
GP11brahmppu:27468: aniketā hy anāhārā ye tu sāyaṃgṛhās tu te /
GP11brahmppu:27469: teṣāṃ gṛhasthaḥ satataṃ pratiṣṭhā yonir ucyate // BrP_222.34 //
GP11brahmppu:27473: sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyam ādāya gacchati // BrP_222.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27474: avajñānam ahaṃkāro dambhaś cāpi gṛhe sataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27475: parivādopaghātau ca pāruṣyaṃ ca na śasyate // BrP_222.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27476: yaś ca samyak karoty evaṃ gṛhasthaḥ paramaṃ vidhim /
GP11brahmppu:27479: putreṣu bhāryāṃ nikṣipya vanaṃ gacchet sahaiva vā // BrP_222.39 //
GP11brahmppu:27481: bhūmiśāyī bhavet tatra muniḥ sarvātithir dvijāḥ // BrP_222.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27483: tadvat triṣavaṇaṃ snānaṃ śastam asya dvijottamāḥ // BrP_222.41 //
GP11brahmppu:27485: bhikṣā balipradānaṃ tu śastam asya praśasyate // BrP_222.42 //
GP11brahmppu:27488: yas tv etā niyataś caryā vānaprasthaś caren muniḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27489: sa dahaty agnivad doṣāñ jayel lokāṃś ca śāśvatān // BrP_222.44 //
GP11brahmppu:27490: caturthaś cāśramo bhikṣoḥ procyate yo manīṣibhiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27491: tasya svarūpaṃ gadato budhyadhvaṃ mama sattamāḥ // BrP_222.45 //
GP11brahmppu:27495: mitrādiṣu samo maitraḥ samasteṣv eva jantuṣu // BrP_222.47 //
GP11brahmppu:27497: yuktaḥ kurvīta na drohaṃ sarvasaṅgāṃś ca varjayet // BrP_222.48 //
GP11brahmppu:27499: tathā prītir na tiryakṣu dveṣo vā nāsya jāyate // BrP_222.49 //
GP11brahmppu:27501: kāle praśastavarṇānāṃ bhikṣārthī paryaṭed gṛhān // BrP_222.50 //
GP11brahmppu:27502: alābhe na viṣādī syāl lābhe naiva ca harṣayet /
GP11brahmppu:27505: atipūjitalābhais tu yatir mukto 'pi badhyate // BrP_222.52 //
GP11brahmppu:27506: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā darpo lobhamohādayaś ca ye /
GP11brahmppu:27507: tāṃs tu doṣān parityajya parivrāṇ nirmamo bhavet // BrP_222.53 //
GP11brahmppu:27508: abhayaṃ sarvasattvebhyo dattvā yaś carate mahīm /
GP11brahmppu:27509: tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ notpadyate kvacit // BrP_222.54 //
GP11brahmppu:27513: citāgninā sa vrajati sma lokān BrP_222.55d
GP11brahmppu:27520: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca na te 'sty aviditaṃ mune // BrP_223.1 //
GP11brahmppu:27521: karmaṇā kena varṇānām adhamā jāyate gatiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27522: uttamā ca bhavet kena brūhi teṣāṃ mahāmate // BrP_223.2 //
GP11brahmppu:27523: śūdras tu karmaṇā kena brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca gacchati /
GP11brahmppu:27524: śrotum icchāmahe kena brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām iyāt // BrP_223.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27530: imaṃ praśnaṃ purā viprā apṛcchac cārulocanā /
GP11brahmppu:27531: tad ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇudhvaṃ mama sattamāḥ // BrP_223.6 //
GP11brahmppu:27534: dakṣakratuhara tryakṣa saṃśayo me mahān ayam // BrP_223.7 //
GP11brahmppu:27536: kena karmavipākena vaiśyo gacchati śūdratām // BrP_223.8 //
GP11brahmppu:27537: vaiśyo vā kṣatriyaḥ kena dvijo vā kṣatriyo bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:27538: pratilome kathaṃ deva śakyo dharmo nivartitum // BrP_223.9 //
GP11brahmppu:27539: kena vā karmaṇā vipraḥ śūdrayonau prajāyate /
GP11brahmppu:27540: kṣatriyaḥ śūdratām eti kena vā karmaṇā vibho // BrP_223.10 //
GP11brahmppu:27541: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha /
GP11brahmppu:27542: trayo varṇāḥ prakṛtyeha kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam āpnuyuḥ // BrP_223.11 //
GP11brahmppu:27544: brāhmaṇyaṃ devi duṣprāpaṃ nisargād brāhmaṇaḥ śubhe /
GP11brahmppu:27545: kṣatriyo vaiśyaśūdrau vā nisargād iti me matiḥ // BrP_223.12 //
GP11brahmppu:27546: karmaṇā duṣkṛteneha sthānād bhraśyati sa dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27547: śreṣṭhaṃ varṇam anuprāpya tasmād ākṣipyate punaḥ // BrP_223.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27549: kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā brahmabhūyaṃ sa gacchati // BrP_223.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27550: yaś ca vipratvam utsṛjya kṣatradharmān niṣevate /
GP11brahmppu:27551: brāhmaṇyāt sa paribhraṣṭaḥ kṣatrayonau prajāyate // BrP_223.15 //
GP11brahmppu:27553: brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya karoty alpamatiḥ sadā // BrP_223.16 //
GP11brahmppu:27554: sa dvijo vaiśyatām eti vaiśyo vā śūdratām iyāt /
GP11brahmppu:27555: svadharmāt pracyuto vipras tataḥ śūdratvam āpnuyāt // BrP_223.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27558: kṣatriyo vā mahābhāge vaiśyo vā dharmacāriṇi /
GP11brahmppu:27559: svāni karmāṇy apākṛtya śūdrakarma niṣevate // BrP_223.19 //
GP11brahmppu:27561: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdratvaṃ yāti tādṛśaḥ // BrP_223.20 //
GP11brahmppu:27562: yas tu śūdraḥ svadharmeṇa jñānavijñānavāñ śuciḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27563: dharmajño dharmanirataḥ sa dharmaphalam aśnute // BrP_223.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27565: adhyātmaṃ naiṣṭhikī siddhir dharmakāmair niṣevyate // BrP_223.22 //
GP11brahmppu:27567: ghuṣṭānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ śūdrānnaṃ naiva vā kvacit // BrP_223.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27568: śūdrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi sadā devair mahātmabhiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27569: pitāmahamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇam iti me matiḥ // BrP_223.24 //
GP11brahmppu:27571: āhitāgnis tathā yajvā sa śūdragatibhāg bhavet // BrP_223.25 //
GP11brahmppu:27573: brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām eti nāsti tatra vicāraṇā // BrP_223.26 //
GP11brahmppu:27575: tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ vrajed vipro yasyānnam upajīvati // BrP_223.27 //
GP11brahmppu:27577: abhojyānnāni vāśnāti sa dvijatvāt pateta vai // BrP_223.28 //
GP11brahmppu:27579: svādhyāyavarjitaḥ pāpo lubdho naikṛtikaḥ śaṭhaḥ // BrP_223.29 //
GP11brahmppu:27581: vihīnasevī vipro hi patate brahmayonitaḥ // BrP_223.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27583: brahmadviḍ vāpi patati brāhmaṇo brahmayonitaḥ // BrP_223.31 //
GP11brahmppu:27584: ebhis tu karmabhir devi śubhair ācaritais tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27585: śūdro brāhmaṇatāṃ gacched vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyatāṃ vrajet // BrP_223.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27589: kuryād avimanāḥ śreṣṭhaḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ // BrP_223.34 //
GP11brahmppu:27593: vṛthā māṃsaṃ na bhuñjīta śūdro vaiśyatvam ṛcchati // BrP_223.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27595: yajate nityayajñaiś ca svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥ // BrP_223.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27599: agnihotram upāsīno juhvānaś ca yathāvidhi // BrP_223.39 //
GP11brahmppu:27601: tretāgnimātravihitaṃ vaiśyo bhavati ca dvijaḥ // BrP_223.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27602: sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyakule śucir mahati jāyate /
GP11brahmppu:27603: sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo jāto janmaprabhṛti saṃskṛtaḥ // BrP_223.41 //
GP11brahmppu:27605: dadāti yajate yajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ // BrP_223.42 //
GP11brahmppu:27607: ārdrahastaprado nityaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan // BrP_223.43 //
GP11brahmppu:27608: satyaḥ satyāni kurute nityaṃ yaḥ śuddhidarśanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27612: ṛtukāle tu dharmātmā patnīm upāśrayet sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27615: sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya kurvāṇaḥ sumanāḥ sadā // BrP_223.47 //
GP11brahmppu:27616: śūdrāṇāṃ cānnakāmānāṃ nityaṃ siddham iti bruvan /
GP11brahmppu:27617: svārthād vā yadi vā kāmān na kiṃcid upalakṣayet // BrP_223.48 //
GP11brahmppu:27619: svaveśmani yathānyāyam upāste bhaikṣyam eva ca // BrP_223.49 //
GP11brahmppu:27620: dvikālam agnihotraṃ ca juhvāno vai yathāvidhi /
GP11brahmppu:27624: vaiśyo bhavati dharmātmā kṣatriyaḥ svena karmaṇā /
GP11brahmppu:27628: sa brāhmaṇyaṃ samutsṛjya śūdro bhavati tādṛśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27629: karmabhiḥ śucibhir devī śuddhātmā vijitendriyaḥ // BrP_223.54 //
GP11brahmppu:27630: śūdro 'pi dvijavat sevya iti brahmābravīt svayam /
GP11brahmppu:27632: viśuddhaḥ sa dvijātibhyo vijñeya iti me matiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27633: na yonir nāpi saṃskāro na śrutir na ca saṃtatiḥ // BrP_223.56 //
GP11brahmppu:27634: kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇam /
GP11brahmppu:27635: sarvo 'yaṃ brāhmaṇo loke vṛttena tu vidhīyate // BrP_223.57 //
GP11brahmppu:27636: vṛtte sthitaś ca śūdro 'pi brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca gacchati /
GP11brahmppu:27637: brahmasvabhāvaḥ suśroṇi samaḥ sarvatra me mataḥ // BrP_223.58 //
GP11brahmppu:27638: nirguṇaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma yatra tiṣṭhati sa dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27639: ete ye vimalā devi sthānabhāvanidarśakāḥ // BrP_223.59 //
GP11brahmppu:27640: svayaṃ ca varadenoktā brahmaṇā sṛjatā prajāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27641: brahmaṇo hi mahat kṣetraṃ loke carati pādavat // BrP_223.60 //
GP11brahmppu:27642: yat tatra bījaṃ patati sā kṛṣiḥ pretya bhāvinī /
GP11brahmppu:27643: saṃtuṣṭena sadā bhāvyaṃ satpathālambinā sadā // BrP_223.61 //
GP11brahmppu:27644: brāhmaṃ hi mārgam ākramya vartitavyaṃ bubhūṣatā /
GP11brahmppu:27645: saṃhitādhyāyinā bhāvyaṃ gṛhe vai gṛhamedhinā // BrP_223.62 //
GP11brahmppu:27647: evaṃbhūto hi yo vipraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ // BrP_223.63 //
GP11brahmppu:27649: brāhmaṇyaṃ devi saṃprāpya rakṣitavyaṃ yatātmanā // BrP_223.64 //
GP11brahmppu:27651: etat te guhyam ākhyātaṃ yathā śūdro bhaved dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27652: brāhmaṇo vā cyuto dharmād yathā śūdratvam āpnuyāt // BrP_223.65 //
GP11brahmppu:27655: dharmādharme nṛṇāṃ deva brūhi me saṃśayaṃ vibho // BrP_224.1 //
GP11brahmppu:27656: karmaṇā manasā vācā trividhair dehinaḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27657: badhyante bandhanaiḥ kair vā mucyante vā kathaṃ vada // BrP_224.2 //
GP11brahmppu:27658: kena śīlena vai deva karmaṇā kīdṛśena vā /
GP11brahmppu:27659: samācārair guṇaiḥ kair vā svargaṃ yāntīha mānavāḥ // BrP_224.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27664: nādharmeṇa na dharmeṇa badhyante chinnasaṃśayāḥ // BrP_224.5 //
GP11brahmppu:27667: karmaṇā manasā vācā ye na hiṃsanti kiṃcana /
GP11brahmppu:27668: ye na majjanti kasmiṃścit te na badhnanti karmabhiḥ // BrP_224.7 //
GP11brahmppu:27675: mātṛvat svasṛvac caiva nityaṃ duhitṛvac ca ye /
GP11brahmppu:27676: paradāreṣu vartante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.11 //
GP11brahmppu:27678: agrāmyasukhabhogāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.12 //
GP11brahmppu:27679: stainyān nivṛttāḥ satataṃ saṃtuṣṭāḥ svadhanena ca /
GP11brahmppu:27680: svabhāgyāny upajīvanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27682: jitendriyāḥ śīlaparās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27683: eṣa daivakṛto mārgaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27684: akaṣāyakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ // BrP_224.15 //
GP11brahmppu:27685: avṛthāpakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27687: svargamārgam abhīpsadbhir na sevyas tv ata uttaraḥ // BrP_224.16 //
GP11brahmppu:27689: vācā tu badhyate yena mucyate hy athavā punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27690: tāni karmāṇi me deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha // BrP_224.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27692: ātmahetoḥ parārthe vā adharmāśritam eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:27693: ye mṛṣā na vadantīha te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.18 //
GP11brahmppu:27694: vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā kāmakārāt tathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:27695: anṛtaṃ ye na bhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.19 //
GP11brahmppu:27698: paruṣaṃ ye na bhāṣante kaṭukaṃ niṣṭhuraṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27699: na paiśunyaratāḥ santas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27701: parapīḍākaraṃ caiva te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.22 //
GP11brahmppu:27702: ye varjayanti paruṣaṃ paradrohaṃ ca mānavāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27703: sarvabhūtasamā dāntās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27705: saumyapralāpino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.24 //
GP11brahmppu:27706: na kopād vyāharante ye vācaṃ hṛdayadāriṇīm /
GP11brahmppu:27707: śāntiṃ vindanti ye kruddhās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.25 //
GP11brahmppu:27708: eṣa vāṇīkṛto devi dharmaḥ sevyaḥ sadā naraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27709: śubhasatyaguṇair nityaṃ varjanīyā mṛṣā budhaiḥ // BrP_224.26 //
GP11brahmppu:27711: manasā badhyate yena karmaṇā puruṣaḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27712: tan me brūhi mahābhāga devadeva pinākadhṛk // BrP_224.27 //
GP11brahmppu:27715: svargaṃ gacchanti kalyāṇi tan me kīrtayataḥ śṛṇu // BrP_224.28 //
GP11brahmppu:27717: naro badhyeta yeneha śṛṇu vā taṃ śubhānane // BrP_224.29 //
GP11brahmppu:27718: araṇye vijane nyastaṃ parasvaṃ dṛśyate yadā /
GP11brahmppu:27719: manasāpi na gṛhṇanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27721: manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.31 //
GP11brahmppu:27722: śatruṃ mitraṃ ca ye nityaṃ tulyena manasā narāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27723: bhajanti maitryaṃ saṃgamya te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27725: svair arthaiḥ parisaṃtuṣṭās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.33 //
GP11brahmppu:27726: avairā ye tv anāyāsā maitracittaratāḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27729: dharmādharmavido nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.35 //
GP11brahmppu:27731: nirākāṅkṣāś ca ye devi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27733: samutthānam anuprāptās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27735: svargamārgaparā bhūyaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ śrotum ihecchasi // BrP_224.38 //
GP11brahmppu:27737: mahān me saṃśayaḥ kaścin martyān prati maheśvara /
GP11brahmppu:27738: tasmāt tvaṃ nipuṇenādya mama vyākhyātum arhasi // BrP_224.39 //
GP11brahmppu:27739: kenāyur labhate dīrghaṃ karmaṇā puruṣaḥ prabho /
GP11brahmppu:27740: tapasā vāpi deveśa kenāyur labhate mahat // BrP_224.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27741: kṣīṇāyuḥ kena bhavati karmaṇā bhuvi mānavaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27742: vipākaṃ karmaṇāṃ deva vaktum arhasy anindita // BrP_224.41 //
GP11brahmppu:27743: apare ca mahābhāgyā mandabhāgyās tathā pare /
GP11brahmppu:27744: akulīnāḥ kulīnāś ca saṃbhavanti tathā pare // BrP_224.42 //
GP11brahmppu:27745: durdarśāḥ kecid ābhānti narāḥ kāṣṭhamayā iva /
GP11brahmppu:27746: priyadarśās tathā cānye darśanād eva mānavāḥ // BrP_224.43 //
GP11brahmppu:27747: duṣprajñāḥ kecid ābhānti kecid ābhānti paṇḍitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27749: alpavācās tathā kecin mahāvācās tathā pare /
GP11brahmppu:27750: dṛśyante puruṣā deva tato vyākhyātum arhasi // BrP_224.45 //
GP11brahmppu:27753: martyaloke naraḥ sarvo yena svaṃ phalam aśnute // BrP_224.46 //
GP11brahmppu:27755: nityam udyataśastraś ca hanti bhūtagaṇān naraḥ // BrP_224.47 //
GP11brahmppu:27760: nirayaṃ yāti hiṃsātmā yāti svargam ahiṃsakaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27761: yātanāṃ niraye raudrāṃ sakṛcchrāṃ labhate naraḥ // BrP_224.50 //
GP11brahmppu:27762: yaḥ kaścin nirayāt tasmāt samuttarati karhicit /
GP11brahmppu:27763: mānuṣyaṃ labhate vāpi hīnāyus tatra jāyate // BrP_224.51 //
GP11brahmppu:27764: pāpena karmaṇā devi yukto hiṃsādibhir yataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27768: nikṣiptaśastro nirdaṇḍo na hiṃsati kadācana // BrP_224.53 //
GP11brahmppu:27769: na ghātayati no hanti ghnantaṃ naivānumodate /
GP11brahmppu:27770: sarvabhūteṣu sasneho yathātmani tathā pare // BrP_224.54 //
GP11brahmppu:27771: īdṛśaḥ puruṣo nityaṃ devi devatvam aśnute /
GP11brahmppu:27772: upapannān sukhān bhogān sadāśnāti mudā yutaḥ // BrP_224.55 //
GP11brahmppu:27773: atha cen mānuṣe loke kadācid upapadyate /
GP11brahmppu:27777: kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ puruṣaḥ kaiś ca karmabhiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27778: svargaṃ samabhipadyeta saṃpradānena kena vā // BrP_225.1 //
GP11brahmppu:27782: pratiśrayān sabhāḥ kuryāt prapāḥ puṣkariṇīs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27783: nityakādīni karmāṇi karoti prayataḥ śuciḥ // BrP_225.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27784: āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ gṛhaṃ ratnaṃ dhanaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27785: sasyajātāni sarvāṇi sakṣetrāṇy atha yoṣitaḥ // BrP_225.4 //
GP11brahmppu:27788: tatroṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān /
GP11brahmppu:27793: mahākāryo mahābhogo dhanī bhavati mānavaḥ // BrP_225.8 //
GP11brahmppu:27795: brahmaṇā vai purā proktāḥ sarvasya priyadarśanāḥ // BrP_225.9 //
GP11brahmppu:27797: ye 'nnāni na prayacchanti vidyamāne 'py abuddhayaḥ // BrP_225.10 //
GP11brahmppu:27800: na dhanāni na vāsāṃsi na bhogān na ca kāñcanam /
GP11brahmppu:27801: na gāś ca nānnavikṛtiṃ prayacchanti kadācana // BrP_225.12 //
GP11brahmppu:27802: apralubdhāś ca ye lubdhā nāstikā dānavarjitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27803: evaṃbhūtā narā devi nirayaṃ yānty abuddhayaḥ // BrP_225.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27804: te vai manuṣyatāṃ yānti yadā kālasya paryayāt /
GP11brahmppu:27805: dhanarikte kule janma labhante svalpabuddhayaḥ // BrP_225.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27809: anena karmaṇā devi bhavanty adhanino narāḥ // BrP_225.16 //
GP11brahmppu:27810: apare dambhino nityaṃ māninaḥ parato ratāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27811: āsanārhasya ye pīṭhaṃ na yacchanty alpacetasaḥ // BrP_225.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27812: mārgārhasya ca ye mārgaṃ na prayacchanty abuddhayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27813: arghārhān na ca saṃskārair arcayanti yathāvidhi // BrP_225.18 //
GP11brahmppu:27815: śubhaṃ cābhimataṃ premṇā guruṃ nābhivadanti ye // BrP_225.19 //
GP11brahmppu:27817: saṃmānyāṃś cāvamanyante vṛddhān paribhavanti ca // BrP_225.20 //
GP11brahmppu:27819: te ced yadi narās tasmān nirayād uttaranti ca // BrP_225.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27820: varṣapūgais tato janma labhante kutsite kule /
GP11brahmppu:27823: na dambhī na ca mānī yo devatātithipūjakaḥ // BrP_225.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27829: mārgārhāya dadan mārgaṃ gurum abhyarcayan sadā // BrP_225.26 //
GP11brahmppu:27831: evaṃbhūto naro devi svargatiṃ pratipadyate // BrP_225.27 //
GP11brahmppu:27836: svakarmaphalam āpnoti svayam eva naraḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27837: eṣa dharmo mayā prokto vidhātrā svayam īritaḥ // BrP_225.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27839: hastābhyāṃ yadi vā padbhyāṃ rajjvā daṇḍena vā punaḥ // BrP_225.31 //
GP11brahmppu:27840: loṣṭaiḥ stambhair upāyair vā jantūn bādheta śobhane /
GP11brahmppu:27841: hiṃsārthaṃ niṣkṛtiprajñaḥ prodvejayati caiva hi // BrP_225.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27844: sa cen manuṣyatāṃ gacched yadi kālasya paryayāt /
GP11brahmppu:27847: eṣa devi manuṣyeṣu boddhavyo jñātibandhuṣu // BrP_225.35 //
GP11brahmppu:27849: maitrī dṛṣṭiḥ pitṛsamo nirvairo niyatendriyaḥ // BrP_225.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27850: nodvejayati bhūtāni na ca hanti dayāparaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27851: hastapādaiś ca niyatair viśvāsyaḥ sarvajantuṣu // BrP_225.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27852: na rajjvā na ca daṇḍena na loṣṭair nāyudhena ca /
GP11brahmppu:27855: tatrāsau bhavane divye mudā vasati devavat // BrP_225.39 //
GP11brahmppu:27857: alpāyāso nirātaṅkaḥ sa jātaḥ sukham edhate // BrP_225.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27859: eṣa devi satāṃ mārgo bādhā yatra na vidyate // BrP_225.41 //
GP11brahmppu:27864: kena karmavipākena prajñāvān puruṣo bhavet // BrP_225.43 //
GP11brahmppu:27866: evaṃ tvaṃ saṃśayaṃ chindhi sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara // BrP_225.44 //
GP11brahmppu:27867: jātyandhāś cāpare deva rogārtāś cāpare tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27868: narāḥ klībāś ca dṛśyante kāraṇaṃ brūhi tatra vai // BrP_225.45 //
GP11brahmppu:27873: labhante svargatiṃ nityam iha loke yathāsukham // BrP_225.47 //
GP11brahmppu:27874: sa cen manuṣyatāṃ yāti medhāvī tatra jāyate /
GP11brahmppu:27875: śrutaṃ yajñānugaṃ yasya kalyāṇam upajāyate // BrP_225.48 //
GP11brahmppu:27876: paradāreṣu ye cāpi cakṣur duṣṭaṃ prayuñjate /
GP11brahmppu:27877: tena duṣṭasvabhāvena jātyandhās te bhavanti hi // BrP_225.49 //
GP11brahmppu:27878: manasāpi praduṣṭena nagnāṃ paśyanti ye striyam /
GP11brahmppu:27879: rogārtās te bhavantīha narā duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ // BrP_225.50 //
GP11brahmppu:27880: ye tu mūḍhā durācārā viyonau maithune ratāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27881: puruṣeṣu suduṣprajñāḥ klībatvam upayānti te // BrP_225.51 //
GP11brahmppu:27882: paśūṃś ca ye vai badhnanti ye caiva gurutalpagāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27883: prakīrṇamaithunā ye ca klībā jāyanti vai narāḥ // BrP_225.52 //
GP11brahmppu:27885: avadyaṃ kiṃ tu vai karma niravadyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:27886: śreyaḥ kurvann avāpnoti mānavo devasattama // BrP_225.53 //
GP11brahmppu:27888: śreyāṃsaṃ mārgam anvicchan sadā yaḥ pṛcchati dvijān /
GP11brahmppu:27889: dharmānveṣī guṇākāṅkṣī sa svargaṃ samupāśnute // BrP_225.54 //
GP11brahmppu:27891: medhāvī dhāraṇāyuktaḥ prājñas tatrāpi jāyate // BrP_225.55 //
GP11brahmppu:27892: eṣa devi satāṃ dharmo gantavyo bhūtikārakaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27893: nṛṇāṃ hitārthāya sadā mayā caivam udāhṛtaḥ // BrP_225.56 //
GP11brahmppu:27899: yajvānaś ca tathaivānye nirmohāś ca tathā pare /
GP11brahmppu:27900: kena karmavipākena bhavantīha vadasva me // BrP_225.59 //
GP11brahmppu:27904: adharmaṃ dharmam ity āhur ye ca mohavaśaṃ gatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27905: avratā naṣṭamaryādās te narā brahmarākṣasāḥ // BrP_225.61 //
GP11brahmppu:27907: nirhomā nirvaṣaṭkārās te bhavanti narādhamāḥ // BrP_225.62 //
GP11brahmppu:27908: eṣa devi mayā sarva- saṃśayacchedanāya te /
GP11brahmppu:27911: śrutvaivaṃ sā jaganmātā bhartur vacanam āditaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27912: hṛṣṭā babhūva suprītā vismitā ca tadā dvijāḥ // BrP_226.1 //
GP11brahmppu:27914: tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena gatās tasmin girau dvijāḥ // BrP_226.2 //
GP11brahmppu:27915: te 'pi saṃpūjya taṃ devaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ praṇamya ca /
GP11brahmppu:27916: papracchuḥ saṃśayaṃ caiva lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // BrP_226.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27919: pṛcchāmas tvāṃ jagannātha saṃśayaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam // BrP_226.4 //
GP11brahmppu:27921: bhramanti suciraṃ kālaṃ puruṣāś cālpamedhasaḥ // BrP_226.5 //
GP11brahmppu:27923: brūhi tac chrotum icchāmaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ // BrP_226.6 //
GP11brahmppu:27926: nānyopāyaṃ prapaśyāmi vāsudevāt paraṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_226.7 //
GP11brahmppu:27928: vāṅmanaḥkarmabhiḥ samyak te yānti paramāṃ gatim // BrP_226.8 //
GP11brahmppu:27929: kiṃ teṣāṃ jīviteneha paśuvac ceṣṭitena ca /
GP11brahmppu:27930: yeṣāṃ na pravaṇaṃ cittaṃ vāsudeve jaganmaye // BrP_226.9 //
GP11brahmppu:27933: māhātmyaṃ vāsudevasya śrotum icchāma śaṃkara // BrP_226.10 //
GP11brahmppu:27935: pitāmahād api varaḥ śāśvataḥ puruṣo hariḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27936: kṛṣṇo jāmbūnadābhāso vyabhre sūrya ivoditaḥ // BrP_226.11 //
GP11brahmppu:27940: śiroruhebhyo jyotīṃṣi romabhyaś ca surāsurāḥ // BrP_226.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27941: ṛṣayo dehasaṃbhūtās tasya lokāś ca śāśvatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27942: pitāmahagṛhaṃ sākṣāt sarvadevagṛhaṃ ca saḥ // BrP_226.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27944: saṃhartā caiva bhūtānāṃ sthāvarasya carasya ca // BrP_226.15 //
GP11brahmppu:27945: sa hi devadevaḥ sākṣād devanāthaḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27947: na tasmāt paramaṃ bhūtaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃcana /
GP11brahmppu:27948: sanātano mahābhāgo govinda iti viśrutaḥ // BrP_226.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27949: sa sarvān pārthivān saṃkhye ghātayiṣyati mānadaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27950: surakāryārtham utpanno mānuṣyaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ // BrP_226.18 //
GP11brahmppu:27954: etasya devanāthasya kāryasya ca parasya ca // BrP_226.20 //
GP11brahmppu:27956: brahmā vasati nābhisthaḥ śarīre 'haṃ ca saṃsthitaḥ // BrP_226.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27957: sarvāḥ sukhaṃ saṃsthitāś ca śarīre tasya devatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27958: sa devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ śrīgarbhaḥ śrīsahoṣitaḥ // BrP_226.22 //
GP11brahmppu:27960: uttamena suśīlena śaucena ca damena ca // BrP_226.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27964: astraiḥ samuditaḥ sarvair divyair adbhutadarśanaiḥ // BrP_226.25 //
GP11brahmppu:27973: bhavārtham eva devānāṃ buddhyā paramayā yutaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27974: prājāpatye śubhe mārge mānave dharmasaṃskṛte // BrP_226.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27976: aṃśo nāma manoḥ putro hy antardhāmā tataḥ param // BrP_226.31 //
GP11brahmppu:27978: prācīnabarhir bhavitā havirdhāmnaḥ suto dvijāḥ // BrP_226.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27980: prācetasas tathā dakṣo bhaviteha prajāpatiḥ // BrP_226.33 //
GP11brahmppu:27982: manoś ca vaṃśaja ilā sudyumnaś ca bhaviṣyati // BrP_226.34 //
GP11brahmppu:27983: budhāt purūravāś cāpi tasmād āyur bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:27984: nahuṣo bhavitā tasmād yayātis tasya cātmajaḥ // BrP_226.35 //
GP11brahmppu:27985: yadus tasmān mahāsattvaḥ kroṣṭā tasmād bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:27986: kroṣṭuś caiva mahān putro vṛjinīvān bhaviṣyati // BrP_226.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27988: uṣaṅgor bhavitā putraḥ śūraś citrarathas tathā // BrP_226.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27989: tasya tv avarajaḥ putraḥ śūro nāma bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:27992: sa śūraḥ kṣatriyaśreṣṭho mahāvīryo mahāyaśāḥ // BrP_226.39 //
GP11brahmppu:27994: vasudevam iti khyātaṃ putram ānakadundubhim // BrP_226.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27997: rājño baddhān sa sarvān vai mokṣayiṣyati yādavaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27998: jarāsaṃdhaṃ tu rājānaṃ nirjitya girigahvare // BrP_226.42 //
GP11brahmppu:28002: śūraḥ saṃhanano bhūto dvārakāyāṃ vasan prabhuḥ // BrP_226.44 //
GP11brahmppu:28004: taṃ bhavantaḥ samāsādya brāhmaṇair arhaṇair varaiḥ // BrP_226.45 //
GP11brahmppu:28006: yo hi māṃ draṣṭum iccheta brahmāṇaṃ ca pitāmaham // BrP_226.46 //
GP11brahmppu:28008: dṛṣṭe tasminn ahaṃ dṛṣṭo na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā // BrP_226.47 //
GP11brahmppu:28010: sa yasya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ prītiyukto bhaviṣyati // BrP_226.48 //
GP11brahmppu:28012: yas tu taṃ mānavo loke saṃśrayiṣyati keśavam // BrP_226.49 //
GP11brahmppu:28013: tasya kīrtir yaśaś caiva svargaś caiva bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:28014: dharmāṇāṃ deśikaḥ sākṣād bhaviṣyati sa dharmavān // BrP_226.50 //
GP11brahmppu:28016: dharma eva sadā hi syād asminn abhyarcite vibhau // BrP_226.51 //
GP11brahmppu:28018: dharmārthaṃ puruṣavyāghra ṛṣikoṭīḥ sasarja ca // BrP_226.52 //
GP11brahmppu:28019: tāḥ sṛṣṭās tena vidhinā parvate gandhamādane /
GP11brahmppu:28021: tasmāt sa vāgmī dharmajño namasyo dvijapuṃgavāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28022: vandito hi sa vandeta mānito mānayīta ca // BrP_226.54 //
GP11brahmppu:28024: arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ sa devo dvijasattamāḥ // BrP_226.55 //
GP11brahmppu:28025: evaṃ tasyānavadyasya viṣṇor vai paramaṃ tapaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28029: karmaṇā manasā vācā sa namasyo dvijaiḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:28031: eṣa vai vihito mārgo mayā vai munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28032: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadeveśaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ syuḥ surasattamāḥ // BrP_226.59 //
GP11brahmppu:28034: ahaṃ caiva namasyāmi nityam eva jagatpatim // BrP_226.60 //
GP11brahmppu:28035: tatra ca tritayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28036: samastā hi vayaṃ devās tasya dehe vasāmahe // BrP_226.61 //
GP11brahmppu:28038: halī bala iti khyāto bhaviṣyati dharādharaḥ // BrP_226.62 //
GP11brahmppu:28039: triśirās tasya devasya dṛṣṭo 'nanta iti prabhoḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28040: suparṇo yasya vīryeṇa kaśyapasyātmajo balī // BrP_226.63 //
GP11brahmppu:28042: sa ca śeṣo vicarate parayā vai mudā yutaḥ // BrP_226.64 //
GP11brahmppu:28044: ya eṣa viṣṇuḥ so 'nanto bhagavān vasudhādharaḥ // BrP_226.65 //
GP11brahmppu:28046: tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau divyau divyaparākramau // BrP_226.66 //
GP11brahmppu:28048: eṣa vo 'nugrahaḥ prokto mayā puṇyas tapodhanāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28049: tad bhavanto yaduśreṣṭhaṃ pūjayeyuḥ prayatnataḥ // BrP_226.67 //
GP11brahmppu:28051: aho kṛṣṇasya māhātmyaṃ śrutam asmābhir adbhutam /
GP11brahmppu:28054: kāṃ gatiṃ yānti manujā vāsudevārcane ratāḥ // BrP_227.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28055: kiṃ prāpnuvanti te mokṣaṃ kiṃ vā svargaṃ mahāmune /
GP11brahmppu:28056: athavā kiṃ muniśreṣṭha prāpnuvanty ubhayaṃ phalam // BrP_227.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28057: chettum arhasi sarvajña saṃśayaṃ no hṛdi sthitam /
GP11brahmppu:28058: chettā nānyo 'sti loke 'smiṃs tvadṛte munisattama // BrP_227.4 //
GP11brahmppu:28060: sādhu sādhu muniśreṣṭhā bhavadbhir yad udāhṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:28062: dīkṣāmātreṇa kṛṣṇasya narā mokṣaṃ vrajanti vai /
GP11brahmppu:28063: kiṃ punar ye sadā bhaktyā pūjayanty acyutaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_227.6 //
GP11brahmppu:28064: na teṣāṃ durlabhaḥ svargo mokṣaś ca munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28065: labhante vaiṣṇavāḥ kāmān yān yān vāñchanti durlabhān // BrP_227.7 //
GP11brahmppu:28067: svecchayā muniśārdūlās tathā kṛṣṇān manorathān // BrP_227.8 //
GP11brahmppu:28069: gṛhṇāti puruṣo viprās tathā kṛṣṇān manorathān // BrP_227.9 //
GP11brahmppu:28073: prāpnuvanti narāḥ kāmān surāṇām api durlabhān // BrP_227.11 //
GP11brahmppu:28075: na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcid vidyate bhuvanatraye // BrP_227.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28076: dhanyās te puruṣā loke ye 'rcayanti sadā harim /
GP11brahmppu:28079: saṃpūjya taṃ suravaraṃ prāpnuvanti parāṃ gatim // BrP_227.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28080: tasmāc chṛṇudhvaṃ munayo yat pṛcchata mamānaghāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28081: pravakṣyāmi samāsena gatiṃ teṣāṃ mahātmanām // BrP_227.15 //
GP11brahmppu:28089: vrajanti lokapālānāṃ bhavanaṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak // BrP_227.19 //
GP11brahmppu:28090: manvantarapramāṇaṃ tu bhuktvā kālaṃ pṛthak pṛthak /
GP11brahmppu:28091: bhuvanāni pṛthak teṣāṃ sarvabhogair alaṃkṛtāḥ // BrP_227.20 //
GP11brahmppu:28093: tatra bhuktvā varān bhogān daśamanvantaraṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_227.21 //
GP11brahmppu:28094: tasmād gandharvalokaṃ tu yānti vai vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28095: viṃśanmanvantaraṃ kālaṃ tatra bhuktvā manoramān // BrP_227.22 //
GP11brahmppu:28096: bhogān ādityalokaṃ tu tasmād yānti supūjitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28098: tasmād vrajanti te viprāś candralokaṃ sukhapradam /
GP11brahmppu:28099: manvantarāṇāṃ te tatra catvāriṃśad guṇānvitam // BrP_227.24 //
GP11brahmppu:28101: tasmān nakṣatralokaṃ tu vimānaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam // BrP_227.25 //
GP11brahmppu:28102: vrajanti te muniśreṣṭhā guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28103: manvantarāṇāṃ pañcāśad bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān // BrP_227.26 //
GP11brahmppu:28104: tasmād vrajanti te viprā devalokaṃ sudurlabham /
GP11brahmppu:28105: ṣaṣṭimanvantaraṃ yāvat tatra bhuktvā sudurlabhān // BrP_227.27 //
GP11brahmppu:28107: śakralokaṃ punas tasmād gacchanti surapūjitāḥ // BrP_227.28 //
GP11brahmppu:28108: manvantarāṇāṃ tatraiva bhuktvā kālaṃ ca saptatim /
GP11brahmppu:28109: bhogān uccāvacān divyān manasaḥ prītivardhanān // BrP_227.29 //
GP11brahmppu:28110: tasmād vrajanti te lokaṃ prājāpatyam anuttamam /
GP11brahmppu:28113: tasmāt paitāmahaṃ lokaṃ yānti te vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ // BrP_227.31 //
GP11brahmppu:28114: manvantarāṇāṃ navati krīḍitvā tatra vai sukham /
GP11brahmppu:28115: ihāgatya punas tasmād viprāṇāṃ pravare kule // BrP_227.32 //
GP11brahmppu:28117: evaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān // BrP_227.33 //
GP11brahmppu:28118: ihāgatya punar yānti upary upari ca kramāt /
GP11brahmppu:28119: saṃbhave saṃbhave te tu śatavarṣaṃ dvijottamāḥ // BrP_227.34 //
GP11brahmppu:28120: bhuktvā yathepsitān bhogān yānti lokāntaraṃ tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28121: daśajanma yadā teṣāṃ krameṇaivaṃ prapūryate // BrP_227.35 //
GP11brahmppu:28122: tadā lokaṃ harer divyaṃ brahmalokād vrajanti te /
GP11brahmppu:28123: gatvā tatrākṣayān bhogān bhuktvā sarvaguṇānvitān // BrP_227.36 //
GP11brahmppu:28125: gacchanti bhuvanaṃ paścād vārāhasya dvijottamāḥ // BrP_227.37 //
GP11brahmppu:28127: krīḍanti tatra viprendrāḥ kṛtvā rūpaṃ caturbhujam // BrP_227.38 //
GP11brahmppu:28129: tiṣṭhanti śāśvate bhāve sarvair devair namaskṛtāḥ // BrP_227.39 //
GP11brahmppu:28130: tato yānti tu te dhīrā narasiṃhagṛhaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28131: krīḍante tatra muditā varṣakoṭyayutāni ca // BrP_227.40 //
GP11brahmppu:28133: krīḍante tatra saukhyena varṣāṇām ayutāni ca // BrP_227.41 //
GP11brahmppu:28135: tatra sthitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ varṣakoṭiśatān bahūn // BrP_227.42 //
GP11brahmppu:28137: bhuktvā bhogāṃś ca vividhān varṣakoṭyarbudāni ca // BrP_227.43 //
GP11brahmppu:28143: tatra tiṣṭhanti te viprā lakṣakoṭiśatatrayam // BrP_227.46 //
GP11brahmppu:28145: gacchanti yoginaḥ paścād yatra saṃkarṣaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // BrP_227.47 //
GP11brahmppu:28146: tatroṣitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān sahasraśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28149: tatra gatvā vimuktās te bhaveyur nātra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_227.49 //
GP11brahmppu:28150: evaṃ krameṇa bhuktiṃ te prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28151: muktiṃ ca muniśārdūlā vāsudevārcane ratāḥ // BrP_227.50 //
GP11brahmppu:28154: snātvā samyag vidhānena dhautavāsā jitendriyaḥ // BrP_228.1 //
GP11brahmppu:28156: puṣpair gandhais tathā dīpair dhūpair naivedyakais tathā // BrP_228.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28158: stotrair nānāvidhair divyair gītavādyair manoharaiḥ // BrP_228.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28160: evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivad rātrau kṛtvā prajāgaram // BrP_228.4 //
GP11brahmppu:28161: kathāṃ vā gītikāṃ viṣṇor gāyan viṣṇuparāyaṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28162: yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_228.5 //
GP11brahmppu:28165: brūhi tac chrotum icchāmaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ // BrP_228.6 //
GP11brahmppu:28168: gītikāyāḥ phalaṃ viṣṇor jāgare yad udāhṛtam // BrP_228.7 //
GP11brahmppu:28169: avantī nāma nagarī babhūva bhuvi viśrutā /
GP11brahmppu:28173: viṣṇubhaktaḥ sa cāṇḍālo māsi māsi dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28178: prabhāte ca praṇamyeśaṃ dvādaśyāṃ gṛham etya ca // BrP_228.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28180: tataḥ saparivāras tu paścād bhuṅkte dvijottamāḥ // BrP_228.13 //
GP11brahmppu:28182: gītikābhir vicitrābhir vayaḥ pratigataṃ bahu // BrP_228.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28187: dṛṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasenātha gṛhītaś cāpi bhakṣitum /
GP11brahmppu:28188: cāṇḍālas tam athovāca nādya bhakṣyas tvayā hy aham // BrP_228.17 //
GP11brahmppu:28189: prātar bhokṣyasi kalyāṇa satyam eṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28190: adya kāryaṃ mama mahat tasmān muñcasva rākṣasa // BrP_228.18 //
GP11brahmppu:28191: śvaḥ satyena sameṣyāmi tataḥ khādasi mām iti /
GP11brahmppu:28193: kāryaṃ na vratavighnaṃ me kartum arhasi rākṣasa // BrP_228.19 //
GP11brahmppu:28196: mamābhūd adya ca bhavān mayā labdho mataṅgaja // BrP_228.20 //
GP11brahmppu:28197: na mokṣye bhakṣayiṣyāmi kṣudhayā pīḍito bhṛśam /
GP11brahmppu:28198: niśācaravacaḥ śrutvā mātaṅgas tam uvāca ha /
GP11brahmppu:28199: sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā vācā sa satyavacanair dṛḍhaiḥ // BrP_228.21 //
GP11brahmppu:28201: satyamūlaṃ jagat sarvaṃ brahmarākṣasa tac chṛṇu /
GP11brahmppu:28203: ādityaś candramā vahnir vāyur bhūr dyaur jalaṃ manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28204: ahorātraṃ yamaḥ saṃdhye dve vidur naraceṣṭitam // BrP_228.23 //
GP11brahmppu:28206: yac ca brahmahanaḥ pāpaṃ surāpe gurutalpage // BrP_228.24 //
GP11brahmppu:28207: vandhyāpateś ca yat pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ vṛṣalīpateḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28208: yac ca devalake pāpaṃ matsyamāṃsāśinaś ca yat // BrP_228.25 //
GP11brahmppu:28209: kroḍamāṃsāśino yac ca kūrmamāṃsāśinaś ca yat /
GP11brahmppu:28210: vṛthā māṃsāśino yac ca pṛṣṭhamāṃsāśinaś ca yat // BrP_228.26 //
GP11brahmppu:28212: sūtakasya ca yat pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ krūrakarmaṇaḥ // BrP_228.27 //
GP11brahmppu:28213: kṛpaṇasya ca yat pāpaṃ yac ca vandhyātither api /
GP11brahmppu:28215: tāsu yad gamanāt pāpaṃ yad vipro vrajati striyam /
GP11brahmppu:28216: rajasvalāṃ tathā paścāc chrāddhaṃ kṛtvā striyaṃ vrajet // BrP_228.29 //
GP11brahmppu:28218: mitrabhāryāṃ gacchatāṃ ca yat pāpaṃ piśunasya ca // BrP_228.30 //
GP11brahmppu:28220: brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya yat pāpaṃ tadayacchataḥ // BrP_228.31 //
GP11brahmppu:28221: yac ca kanyānṛte pāpaṃ yac ca gośvatarānṛte /
GP11brahmppu:28222: strībālahantur yat pāpaṃ yac ca mithyābhibhāṣiṇaḥ // BrP_228.32 //
GP11brahmppu:28224: yac ca nindayatāṃ pāpaṃ gurumithyāpacārataḥ // BrP_228.33 //
GP11brahmppu:28225: agnityāgiṣu yat pāpam agnidāyiṣu yad vane /
GP11brahmppu:28226: gṛheṣṭyā pātake yac ca yad goghne yad dvijādhame // BrP_228.34 //
GP11brahmppu:28227: yat pāpaṃ parivitte ca yat pāpaṃ parivedinaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28228: tayor dātṛgrahītroś ca yat pāpaṃ bhrūṇaghātinaḥ // BrP_228.35 //
GP11brahmppu:28229: kiṃ cātra bahubhiḥ proktaiḥ śapathais tava rākṣasa /
GP11brahmppu:28230: śrūyatāṃ śapathaṃ bhīmaṃ durvācyam api kathyate // BrP_228.36 //
GP11brahmppu:28232: ayājyayājake ṣaṇḍhe yat pāpaṃ śravaṇe 'dhame // BrP_228.37 //
GP11brahmppu:28234: etais tu pāpair lipye 'haṃ yadi naiṣyāmi te 'ntikam // BrP_228.38 //
GP11brahmppu:28237: prāha gacchasva satyena samayaṃ caiva pālaya // BrP_228.39 //
GP11brahmppu:28238: ity uktaḥ kuṇapāśena śvapākaḥ kusumāni tu /
GP11brahmppu:28239: samādāyāgamac caiva viṣṇoḥ sa nilayaṃ gataḥ // BrP_228.40 //
GP11brahmppu:28240: tāni prādād brāhmaṇāya so 'pi prakṣālya cāmbhasā /
GP11brahmppu:28241: viṣṇum abhyarcya nilayaṃ jagāma sa tapodhanāḥ // BrP_228.41 //
GP11brahmppu:28242: so 'pi mātaṅgadāyādaḥ sopavāsas tu tāṃ niśām /
GP11brahmppu:28243: gāyan hi bāhyabhūmiṣṭhaḥ prajāgaram upākarot // BrP_228.42 //
GP11brahmppu:28244: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ snātvā devaṃ namasya ca /
GP11brahmppu:28245: satyaṃ sa samayaṃ kartuṃ pratasthe yatra rākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.43 //
GP11brahmppu:28246: taṃ vrajantaṃ pathi naraḥ prāha bhadra kva gacchasi /
GP11brahmppu:28247: sa tathākathayat sarvaṃ so 'py enaṃ punar abravīt // BrP_228.44 //
GP11brahmppu:28249: mahatā tu prayatnena śarīraṃ pālayed budhaḥ // BrP_228.45 //
GP11brahmppu:28253: bhavati mṛtasya kā kathā loke BrP_228.46d
GP11brahmppu:28254: mātaṅgas tad vacaḥ śrutvā pratyuvācātha hetumat //* BrP_228.47 //
GP11brahmppu:28256: bhadra satyaṃ puraskṛtya gacchāmi śapathāḥ kṛtāḥ //* BrP_228.48 //
GP11brahmppu:28258: taṃ bhūyaḥ pratyuvācātha kim evaṃ mūḍhadhīr bhavān /
GP11brahmppu:28259: kiṃ na śrutaṃ tvayā sādho manunā yad udīritam // BrP_228.49 //
GP11brahmppu:28264: dharmavākyaṃ na ca strīṣu na vivāhe tathā ripau /
GP11brahmppu:28266: evaṃ tad vākyam ākarṇya mātaṅgaḥ pratyuvāca ha // BrP_228.51 //
GP11brahmppu:28268: maivaṃ vadasva bhadraṃ te satyaṃ lokeṣu pūjyate /
GP11brahmppu:28269: satyenāvāpyate saukhyaṃ yat kiṃcij jagatīgatam // BrP_228.52 //
GP11brahmppu:28271: jvalaty agniś ca satyena vāti satyena mārutaḥ // BrP_228.53 //
GP11brahmppu:28273: satyena jāyate puṃsāṃ tasmāt satyaṃ na saṃtyajet // BrP_228.54 //
GP11brahmppu:28274: satyaṃ brahma paraṃ loke satyaṃ yajñeṣu cottamam /
GP11brahmppu:28275: satyaṃ svargasamāyātaṃ tasmāt satyaṃ na saṃtyajet // BrP_228.55 //
GP11brahmppu:28277: ity uktvā so 'tha mātaṅgas taṃ prakṣipya narottamam /
GP11brahmppu:28278: jagāma tatra yatrāste prāṇihā brahmarākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.56 //
GP11brahmppu:28283: na mātaṅgam ahaṃ manye bhavantaṃ satyalakṣaṇam // BrP_228.58 //
GP11brahmppu:28284: karmaṇānena manye tvāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śucim avyayam /
GP11brahmppu:28285: yat kiṃcit tvāṃ bhadramukhaṃ pravakṣye dharmasaṃśrayam /
GP11brahmppu:28286: kiṃ tatra bhavatā rātrau kṛtaṃ viṣṇugṛhe vada // BrP_228.59 //
GP11brahmppu:28288: tam abhyuvāca mātaṅgaḥ śṛṇu viṣṇugṛhe mayā /
GP11brahmppu:28289: yat kṛtaṃ rajanībhāge yathātathyaṃ vadāmi te // BrP_228.60 //
GP11brahmppu:28291: prajāgaraḥ kṛto rātrau gāyatā viṣṇugītikām // BrP_228.61 //
GP11brahmppu:28292: taṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ prāha kiyantaṃ kālam ucyatām /
GP11brahmppu:28293: prajāgaro viṣṇugṛhe kṛtaṃ bhaktimatā vada // BrP_228.62 //
GP11brahmppu:28294: tam abhyuvāca prahasan viṃśaty abdāni rākṣasa /
GP11brahmppu:28295: ekādaśyāṃ māsi māsi kṛtas tatra prajāgaraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28298: yad adya tvāṃ pravakṣyāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati /
GP11brahmppu:28299: ekarātrikṛtaṃ sādho mama dehi prajāgaram // BrP_228.64 //
GP11brahmppu:28301: triḥ satyena mahābhāga ity uktvā virarāma ha // BrP_228.65 //
GP11brahmppu:28303: mātaṅgas tam uvācātha mayātmā te niśācara /
GP11brahmppu:28304: niveditaḥ kim uktena khādasva svecchayāpi mām // BrP_228.66 //
GP11brahmppu:28306: sagītaṃ me prayacchasva kṛpāṃ kartuṃ tvam arhasi // BrP_228.67 //
GP11brahmppu:28307: mātaṅgo rākṣasaṃ prāha kim asaṃbaddham ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:28308: khādasva svecchayā māṃ tvaṃ na pradāsye prajāgaram /
GP11brahmppu:28309: mātaṅgavacanaṃ śrutvā prāha taṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.68 //
GP11brahmppu:28311: ko hi duṣṭamatir mando bhavantaṃ draṣṭum utsahet /
GP11brahmppu:28314: narakārtasya mūḍhasya sādhavaḥ syur dayānvitāḥ // BrP_228.70 //
GP11brahmppu:28315: tan mama tvaṃ mahābhāga kṛpāṃ kṛtvā prajāgaram /
GP11brahmppu:28316: yāmasyaikasya me dehi gaccha vā nilayaṃ svakam // BrP_228.71 //
GP11brahmppu:28318: taṃ punaḥ prāha cāṇḍālo na yāsyāmi nijaṃ gṛham /
GP11brahmppu:28319: na cāpi tava dāsyāmi kathaṃcid yāmajāgaram /
GP11brahmppu:28320: taṃ prahasyātha cāṇḍālaṃ provāca brahmarākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.72 //
GP11brahmppu:28323: tasyāḥ phalaṃ prayacchasva trāhi pāpāt samuddhara // BrP_228.73 //
GP11brahmppu:28325: evam uccārite tena mātaṅgas tam uvāca ha //* BrP_228.74 //
GP11brahmppu:28327: kiṃ pūrvaṃ bhavatā karma vikṛtaṃ kṛtam añjasā /
GP11brahmppu:28328: yena tvaṃ doṣajātena saṃbhūto brahmarākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.75 //
GP11brahmppu:28330: tasya tad vākyam ākarṇya mātaṅgaṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28331: provāca duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ saṃsmṛtya svakṛtaṃ kṛtam // BrP_228.76 //
GP11brahmppu:28333: śrūyatāṃ yo 'ham āsaṃ vai pūrvaṃ yac ca mayā kṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:28334: yasmin kṛte pāpayoniṃ gatavān asmi rākṣasīm // BrP_228.77 //
GP11brahmppu:28335: somaśarma iti khyātaḥ pūrvam āsam ahaṃ dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28340: tasmin parisamāpte tu maurkhyād dambham anuṣṭhitaḥ // BrP_228.80 //
GP11brahmppu:28342: pravartamāne tasmiṃs tu kukṣiśūlo 'bhavan mama // BrP_228.81 //
GP11brahmppu:28343: saṃpūrṇe daśarātre tu na samāpte tathā kratau /
GP11brahmppu:28344: virūpākṣasya dīyantyām āhutyāṃ rākṣase kṣaṇe // BrP_228.82 //
GP11brahmppu:28347: ajānatā yajñavidyāṃ yad iṣṭaṃ yājitaṃ ca yat /
GP11brahmppu:28349: tan māṃ pāpamahāmbhodhau nimagnaṃ tvaṃ samuddhara /
GP11brahmppu:28350: prajāgare gītikaikāṃ paścimāṃ dātum arhasi // BrP_228.85 //
GP11brahmppu:28352: tam uvācātha cāṇḍālo yadi prāṇivadhād bhavān /
GP11brahmppu:28353: nivṛttiṃ kurute dadyāṃ tataḥ paścimagītikām // BrP_228.86 //
GP11brahmppu:28354: bāḍham ity avadat so 'pi mātaṅgo 'pi dadau tadā /
GP11brahmppu:28357: praṇamya prayayau hṛṣṭas tīrthavaryaṃ pṛthūdakam // BrP_228.88 //
GP11brahmppu:28362: tasyānte brāhmaṇo jāto babhūva smṛtimān vaśī /
GP11brahmppu:28363: tasyāhaṃ caritaṃ bhūyaḥ kathayiṣyāmi bho dvijāḥ // BrP_228.91 //
GP11brahmppu:28365: rākṣase tu gate dhīmān gṛham etya yatātmavān // BrP_228.92 //
GP11brahmppu:28366: tadvipracaritaṃ smṛtvā nirviṇṇaḥ śucir apy asau /
GP11brahmppu:28367: putreṣu bhāryāṃ nikṣipya dadau bhūmyāḥ pradakṣiṇām // BrP_228.93 //
GP11brahmppu:28369: dṛṣṭvā skandaṃ yayau dhārā- cakre cāpi pradakṣiṇam // BrP_228.94 //
GP11brahmppu:28371: pāpapramocanaṃ tīrtham āsasāda sa tu dvijāḥ // BrP_228.95 //
GP11brahmppu:28372: snānaṃ pāpaharaṃ cakre sa tu cāṇḍālavaṃśajaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28377: bhikṣāvadhūtā rajasā muktā tenātha bhikṣuṇā // BrP_228.98 //
GP11brahmppu:28379: pāpapramocane snātaḥ sa mṛto narmadātaṭe // BrP_228.99 //
GP11brahmppu:28380: mūrkho 'bhūd brāhmaṇavaro vārāṇasyāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28381: tatrāsya vasato 'bdais tu triṃśadbhiḥ siddhapūruṣaḥ // BrP_228.100 //
GP11brahmppu:28383: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sopahāsārtham abhivādyābhyuvāca ha // BrP_228.101 //
GP11brahmppu:28384: kuśalaṃ siddhapuruṣaṃ kutas tv āgamyate tvayā //* BrP_228.102 //
GP11brahmppu:28386: evaṃ saṃbhāṣitas tena jñāto 'ham iti cintya tu /
GP11brahmppu:28387: pratyuvācātha vandyas taṃ svargalokād upāgataḥ // BrP_228.103 //
GP11brahmppu:28388: taṃ siddhaṃ prāha mūrkho 'sau kiṃ tvaṃ vetsi triviṣṭape /
GP11brahmppu:28390: siddhas tam āha tāṃ vedmi śakracāmaradhāriṇīm /
GP11brahmppu:28393: tan mitra matkṛte vārttām urvaśyā bhavatādarāt // BrP_228.106 //
GP11brahmppu:28394: kathanīyā yac ca sā te brūyād ākhyāsyate bhavān /
GP11brahmppu:28395: bāḍham ity abravīt siddhaḥ so 'pi vipro mudānvitaḥ // BrP_228.107 //
GP11brahmppu:28397: sametya corvaśīṃ prāha yad ukto 'sau dvijena tu // BrP_228.108 //
GP11brahmppu:28398: sā prāha taṃ siddhavaraṃ nāhaṃ kāśipatiṃ dvijam /
GP11brahmppu:28399: jānāmi satyam uktaṃ te na cetasi mama sthitam // BrP_228.109 //
GP11brahmppu:28400: ity uktaḥ prayayau so 'pi kālena bahunā punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28401: vārāṇasīṃ yayau siddho dṛṣṭo mūrkheṇa vai punaḥ // BrP_228.110 //
GP11brahmppu:28402: dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kila bhūyaḥ kim āhorubhavā tava /
GP11brahmppu:28403: siddho 'bravīn na jānāmi mām uvācorvaśī svayam // BrP_228.111 //
GP11brahmppu:28405: punaḥ prāha kathaṃ vetsīty evaṃ vācyā tvayorvaśī // BrP_228.112 //
GP11brahmppu:28406: bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmīty uktvā siddho divaṃ gataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28408: provāca tāṃ siddhavaraḥ sā ca taṃ siddham abravīt /
GP11brahmppu:28409: niyamaṃ kaṃcid api hi karotu dvijasattamaḥ // BrP_228.114 //
GP11brahmppu:28410: yenāhaṃ karmaṇā siddha taṃ jānāmi na cānyathā /
GP11brahmppu:28411: tad urvaśīvaco 'bhyetya tasmai mūrkhadvijāya tu // BrP_228.115 //
GP11brahmppu:28412: kathayām āsa siddhas tu so 'pīmaṃ niyamaṃ jagau /
GP11brahmppu:28413: tavāgre siddhapuruṣa niyamo 'yaṃ kṛto mayā // BrP_228.116 //
GP11brahmppu:28414: na bhokṣye 'dyaprabhṛti vai śakaṭaṃ satyam īritam /
GP11brahmppu:28415: ity uktaḥ prayayau siddhaḥ svarge dṛṣṭvorvaśīm atha // BrP_228.117 //
GP11brahmppu:28417: taṃ siddham urvaśī prāha jñāto 'sau sāṃprataṃ mayā // BrP_228.118 //
GP11brahmppu:28419: ity uktvā prayayau śīghraṃ vāsaṃ nārāyaṇātmajā // BrP_228.119 //
GP11brahmppu:28421: urvaśy api varārohā gatvā vārāṇasīṃ purīm // BrP_228.120 //
GP11brahmppu:28423: athāsāv api mūrkhas tu nadīṃ matsyodarīṃ mune // BrP_228.121 //
GP11brahmppu:28425: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vavṛdhe 'thāsya manmathaḥ kṣobhakṛd dṛḍham // BrP_228.122 //
GP11brahmppu:28426: cakāra mūrkhaś ceṣṭāś ca taṃ vivedorvaśī svayam /
GP11brahmppu:28427: taṃ mūrkhaṃ siddhagaditaṃ jñātvā sasmitam āha tam // BrP_228.123 //
GP11brahmppu:28429: kim icchasi mahābhāga mattaḥ śīghram ihocyatām /
GP11brahmppu:28430: kariṣyāmi vacas tubhyaṃ tvaṃ viśrabdhaṃ kariṣyasi // BrP_228.124 //
GP11brahmppu:28432: ātmapradānena mama prāṇān rakṣa śucismite //* BrP_228.125 //
GP11brahmppu:28435: tvaṃ tiṣṭhasva kṣaṇam atha pratīkṣasvāgataṃ mama // BrP_228.126 //
GP11brahmppu:28436: sthito 'smīty abravīd vipraḥ sāpi svargaṃ jagāma ha /
GP11brahmppu:28437: māsamātreṇa sāyātā dadarśa taṃ kṛśaṃ dvijam // BrP_228.127 //
GP11brahmppu:28439: taṃ dṛṣṭvā niścayayutaṃ bhūtvā vṛddhavapus tataḥ // BrP_228.128 //
GP11brahmppu:28441: ghṛtena madhunā caiva nadīṃ matsyodarīṃ gatā // BrP_228.129 //
GP11brahmppu:28442: snātvātha bhūmau vasantī śakaṭaṃ ca yathārthataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28443: taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ samāhūya vākyam āha sulocanā // BrP_228.130 //
GP11brahmppu:28445: mayā tīvraṃ vrataṃ vipra cīrṇaṃ saubhāgyakāraṇāt /
GP11brahmppu:28446: vratānte niṣkṛtiṃ dadyāṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bho dvija // BrP_228.131 //
GP11brahmppu:28448: sa prāha kim idaṃ loke dīyate śarkarāvṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:28449: kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhaḥ pṛcchāmi sādhu bhadre samīraya // BrP_228.132 //
GP11brahmppu:28451: imaṃ tvaṃ samupādāya prāṇaṃ tarpaya mā ciram // BrP_228.133 //
GP11brahmppu:28452: sa tac chrutvātha saṃsmṛtya kṣudhayā pīḍito 'pi san /
GP11brahmppu:28453: prāha bhadre na gṛhṇāmi niyamo hi kṛto mayā // BrP_228.134 //
GP11brahmppu:28454: purataḥ siddhavargasya na bhokṣye śakaṭaṃ tv iti /
GP11brahmppu:28456: sābravīn niyamo bhadra kṛtaḥ kāṣṭhamaye tvayā /
GP11brahmppu:28457: nāsau kāṣṭhamayo bhuṅkṣva kṣudhayā cātipīḍitaḥ // BrP_228.136 //
GP11brahmppu:28458: tāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuvāca na mayā tad viśeṣaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:28459: kṛtaṃ bhadre 'tha niyamaḥ sāmānyenaiva me kṛtaḥ // BrP_228.137 //
GP11brahmppu:28460: taṃ bhūyaḥ prāha sā tanvī na ced bhokṣyasi brāhmaṇa /
GP11brahmppu:28461: gṛhaṃ gṛhītvā gacchasva kuṭumbaṃ tava bhokṣyati // BrP_228.138 //
GP11brahmppu:28462: sa tām uvāca sudati na tāvad yāmi mandiram /
GP11brahmppu:28463: ihāyātā varārohā trailokye 'py adhikā guṇaiḥ // BrP_228.139 //
GP11brahmppu:28465: sthīyatāṃ kṣaṇam ity evaṃ sthāsyāmīti mayoditam // BrP_228.140 //
GP11brahmppu:28466: māsamātraṃ gatāyās tu tasyā bhadre sthitasya ca /
GP11brahmppu:28468: tasya sā vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛtvā svaṃ rūpam uttamam /
GP11brahmppu:28469: vihasya bhāvagambhīram urvaśī prāha taṃ dvijam // BrP_228.142 //
GP11brahmppu:28471: sādhu satyaṃ tvayā vipra vrataṃ niṣṭhitacetasā /
GP11brahmppu:28472: niṣpāditaṃ haṭhād eva mama darśanam icchatā // BrP_228.143 //
GP11brahmppu:28473: aham evorvaśī vipra tvāṃ jijñāsārtham āgatā /
GP11brahmppu:28474: parīkṣito niścitavān bhavān satyatapā ṛṣiḥ // BrP_228.144 //
GP11brahmppu:28476: siddhiṃ yāsyasi viprendra tatas tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi // BrP_228.145 //
GP11brahmppu:28478: ity uktvā divam utpatya sā jagāmorvaśī dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28479: sa ca satyatapā vipro rūpatīrthaṃ jagāma ha // BrP_228.146 //
GP11brahmppu:28481: dehotsarge jagāmāsau gāndharvaṃ lokam uttamam // BrP_228.147 //
GP11brahmppu:28485: putreṣu rājyaṃ nikṣipya yayau śaukaravaṃ punaḥ // BrP_228.149 //
GP11brahmppu:28487: tatra manvantaraśataṃ bhogān bhuktvā tataś cyutaḥ // BrP_228.150 //
GP11brahmppu:28489: babhūva tatra corvaśyāḥ saṃgamāya tapodhanāḥ // BrP_228.151 //
GP11brahmppu:28491: tīrthe prasiddhe sa hi rūpasaṃjñe BrP_228.152b
GP11brahmppu:28492: ārādhya janmany atha cārcya viṣṇum BrP_228.152c
GP11brahmppu:28493: avāpya bhogān atha muktim eti BrP_228.152d
GP11brahmppu:28496: kṛṣṇasya yena cāṇḍālo gato 'sau paramāṃ gatim // BrP_229.1 //
GP11brahmppu:28497: yathā viṣṇau bhaved bhaktis tan no brūhi mahāmate /
GP11brahmppu:28498: tapasā karmaṇā yena śrotum icchāma sāṃpratam // BrP_229.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28501: yathā kṛṣṇe bhaved bhaktiḥ puruṣasya mahāphalā // BrP_229.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28505: kathaṃcil labhate janma dehī mānuṣyakaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_229.5 //
GP11brahmppu:28507: vivekād dharmabuddhis tu buddhyā tu śreyasāṃ grahaḥ // BrP_229.6 //
GP11brahmppu:28508: yāvat pāpakṣayaṃ puṃsāṃ na bhavej janma saṃcitam /
GP11brahmppu:28509: tāvan na jāyate bhaktir vāsudeve jaganmaye // BrP_229.7 //
GP11brahmppu:28510: tasmād vakṣyāmi bho viprā bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe yathā bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:28511: anyadeveṣu yā bhaktiḥ puruṣasyeha jāyate // BrP_229.8 //
GP11brahmppu:28513: tena tasya bhaved bhaktir yajane munisattamāḥ // BrP_229.9 //
GP11brahmppu:28514: sa karoti tato viprā bhaktiṃ cāgneḥ samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28515: tuṣṭe hutāśane tasya bhaktir bhavati bhāskare // BrP_229.10 //
GP11brahmppu:28516: pūjāṃ karoti satatam ādityasya tato dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28517: prasanne bhāskare tasya bhaktir bhavati śaṃkare // BrP_229.11 //
GP11brahmppu:28518: pūjāṃ karoti vidhivat sa tu śaṃbhoḥ prayatnataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28519: tuṣṭe trilocane tasya bhaktir bhavati keśave // BrP_229.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28521: tato bhuktiṃ ca muktiṃ ca sa prāpnoti dvijottamāḥ // BrP_229.13 //
GP11brahmppu:28523: avaiṣṇavā narā ye tu dṛśyante ca mahāmune /
GP11brahmppu:28524: kiṃ te viṣṇuṃ nārcayanti brūhi tatkāraṇaṃ dvija // BrP_229.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28527: āsuraś ca tathā daivaḥ purā sṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvā // BrP_229.15 //
GP11brahmppu:28529: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā dūṣayanti narā harim // BrP_229.16 //
GP11brahmppu:28530: māyayā hatavijñānā viṣṇos te tu narādhamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28531: aprāpya taṃ hariṃ viprās tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim // BrP_229.17 //
GP11brahmppu:28532: tasya yā gahvarī māyā durvijñeyā surāsuraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28535: icchāmas tāṃ mahāmāyāṃ jñātuṃ viṣṇoḥ sudustarām /
GP11brahmppu:28536: vaktum arhasi dharmajña paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ // BrP_229.19 //
GP11brahmppu:28539: kaḥ śaknoti harer māyāṃ jñātuṃ tāṃ keśavād ṛte // BrP_229.20 //
GP11brahmppu:28540: yā vṛttā brāhmaṇasyāsīn māyārthe nāradasya ca /
GP11brahmppu:28541: viḍambanāṃ tu tāṃ viprāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ gadato mama // BrP_229.21 //
GP11brahmppu:28542: prāg āsīn nṛpatiḥ śrīmān āgnīdhra iti viśrutaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28543: nagare kāmadamanas tasyātha tanayaḥ śuciḥ // BrP_229.22 //
GP11brahmppu:28546: pitāsya tv akarod yatnaṃ vivāhāya na caicchata /
GP11brahmppu:28547: taṃ pitā prāha kim iti necchase dārasaṃgraham // BrP_229.24 //
GP11brahmppu:28548: sarvam etat sukhārthaṃ hi vāñchanti manujāḥ kila /
GP11brahmppu:28549: sukhamūlā hi dārāś ca tasmāt taṃ tvaṃ samācara // BrP_229.25 //
GP11brahmppu:28550: sa pitur vacanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīm āste ca gauravāt /
GP11brahmppu:28551: muhur muhus taṃ ca pitā codayām āsa bho dvijāḥ // BrP_229.26 //
GP11brahmppu:28553: mayā samāśritā vyaktā vaiṣṇavī paripālinī // BrP_229.27 //
GP11brahmppu:28554: taṃ pitā prāha saṃgamya naiṣa dharmo 'sti putraka /
GP11brahmppu:28555: na vidhārayitavyā syāt puruṣeṇa vipaścitā // BrP_229.28 //
GP11brahmppu:28556: kuru madvacanaṃ putra prabhur asmi pitā tava /
GP11brahmppu:28557: mā nimajja kulaṃ mahyaṃ narake saṃtatikṣayāt // BrP_229.29 //
GP11brahmppu:28558: sa hi taṃ pitur ādeśaṃ śrutvā prāha suto vaśī /
GP11brahmppu:28559: prītaḥ saṃsmṛtya paurāṇīṃ saṃsārasya vicitratām // BrP_229.30 //
GP11brahmppu:28561: śṛṇu tāta vaco mahyaṃ tattvavākyaṃ sahetukam /
GP11brahmppu:28562: nāmānurūpaṃ kartavyaṃ satyaṃ bhavati pārthiva // BrP_229.31 //
GP11brahmppu:28564: prāptāni dārasaṃyoga- viyogāni ca sarvaśaḥ // BrP_229.32 //
GP11brahmppu:28569: nadīśvarasahasraṃ ca prāptaṃ tāta punaḥ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28570: sṛṣṭas tu bahuśaḥ sṛṣṭau saṃhāre cāpi saṃhṛtaḥ // BrP_229.35 //
GP11brahmppu:28572: itas tṛtīye yad vṛttaṃ mama janmani tac chṛṇu /
GP11brahmppu:28577: jāto hi vaṃśe sutapā maharṣiḥ BrP_229.37d
GP11brahmppu:28578: tato mahābhūd acalā hi bhaktir BrP_229.38a
GP11brahmppu:28585: varo hi yaṃ vāñchasi taṃ pradāsye BrP_229.39d
GP11brahmppu:28587: tuṣṭo 'si cet keśava tad vṛṇomi BrP_229.40b
GP11brahmppu:28588: yā sā tvadīyā paramā hi māyā BrP_229.40c
GP11brahmppu:28591: kiṃ te tayā brahman māyayā vai BrP_229.41b
GP11brahmppu:28594: tato murāriṃ punar uktavān ahaṃ BrP_229.42a
GP11brahmppu:28596: māyā tavemām iha vettum icche BrP_229.42c
GP11brahmppu:28599: śrīśaḥ prabhur viṣṇur idaṃ vaco me BrP_229.43b
GP11brahmppu:28601: māyāṃ madīyāṃ nahi vetti kaścin BrP_229.43c
GP11brahmppu:28602: na cāpi vā vetsyati kaścid eva BrP_229.43d
GP11brahmppu:28607: varaṃ ca dattaṃ gatavān ahaṃ ca BrP_229.45a
GP11brahmppu:28608: sa cāpi vavre varam etad eva BrP_229.45b
GP11brahmppu:28610: bhavān yathaivaṃ vṛtavān varaṃ ca BrP_229.45d
GP11brahmppu:28612: māyāṃ hi me vetsyasi saṃnimagnaḥ BrP_229.46b
GP11brahmppu:28631: bhartur bale tatra pitur bale ca BrP_229.51a
GP11brahmppu:28635: bhartāram eṣā pitaraṃ ca gṛhya BrP_229.52a
GP11brahmppu:28637: kṛtvā hutāśaṃ pradadau svayaṃ ca BrP_229.52c
GP11brahmppu:28640: dhā putra hā putra iti bruvāṇā BrP_229.53b
GP11brahmppu:28641: tadā punaḥ sā munir nārado 'bhūt BrP_229.53c
GP11brahmppu:28646: kas te tu putro vada me maharṣe BrP_229.55a
GP11brahmppu:28647: mṛtaṃ ca kaṃ śocasi naṣṭabuddhiḥ BrP_229.55b
GP11brahmppu:28649: tato 'ham enaṃ punar eva cāha BrP_229.55d
GP11brahmppu:28655: uvāca bhaktiṃ mama dehi viṣṇo BrP_229.57b
GP11brahmppu:28657: sadā ca saṃdarśanam īśa te 'stu BrP_229.57d
GP11brahmppu:28658: yatrāham ārtaś citim adya rūḍhas BrP_229.58a
GP11brahmppu:28663: tīrthaṃ sitode hi citis tavāstu BrP_229.59b
GP11brahmppu:28664: sthāsyāmy ahaṃ cātra sadaiva viṣṇur BrP_229.59c
GP11brahmppu:28673: khyātaṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca bhaviṣyate tat BrP_229.61d
GP11brahmppu:28676: na caiva tasmin dvija saṃpracakṣate BrP_229.62c
GP11brahmppu:28677: tat kṣetram ugraṃ tv atha brahmavadhyā BrP_229.62d
GP11brahmppu:28682: kṛtvā tu pāpāni naro mahānti BrP_229.64a
GP11brahmppu:28684: yadā tu māṃ cintayate sa śuddhaḥ BrP_229.64c
GP11brahmppu:28691: rudro hitaṃ tārakam asya kīrtayet BrP_229.66b
GP11brahmppu:28692: ity evam uktvā dvijavarya nāradaṃ BrP_229.66c
GP11brahmppu:28694: sa cāpi vipras tridivaṃ cacāra BrP_229.67a
GP11brahmppu:28697: māyā madīyā nahi śakyate sā BrP_229.67d
GP11brahmppu:28698: jñātuṃ bhavān icchati cet tato 'dya BrP_229.68a
GP11brahmppu:28699: evaṃ viśasvāpsu ca vetsi yena BrP_229.68b
GP11brahmppu:28702: kokāmukhe tāta tato hi kanyā BrP_229.69a
GP11brahmppu:28708: patir na tasyā hi mato babhūva BrP_229.70c
GP11brahmppu:28711: kanyā ca paścād badhirā tathānyā BrP_229.71b
GP11brahmppu:28712: patir daridras tv atha sāpi mugdhā BrP_229.71c
GP11brahmppu:28715: sāntar jalaṃ snātum atha praviṣṭā BrP_229.72b
GP11brahmppu:28716: yāvad dvijo 'sau punar eva tāvaj BrP_229.72c
GP11brahmppu:28720: dadarśa kumbhaṃ na ca tāṃ taṭasthāṃ BrP_229.73c
GP11brahmppu:28724: te vai rudantaṃ pitaraṃ ca dṛṣṭvā BrP_229.74c
GP11brahmppu:28727: dvijān bhavadbhir yadi yoṣid ekā BrP_229.75b
GP11brahmppu:28729: ākhyāta te procur imāṃ praviṣṭā BrP_229.75d
GP11brahmppu:28730: nadīṃ na bhūyas tu samuttatāra BrP_229.76a
GP11brahmppu:28734: taṃ vai rudantaṃ sasutaṃ sakanyaṃ BrP_229.77a
GP11brahmppu:28736: ārtiś ca me 'bhūd atha saṃsmṛtiś ca BrP_229.77c
GP11brahmppu:28739: kimartham ārtena hi rudyate tvayā BrP_229.78b
GP11brahmppu:28741: ākranditeneha vṛthā hi kiṃ te BrP_229.78d
GP11brahmppu:28746: ity evam uktvā sa sutaiś ca sārdhaṃ BrP_229.80a
GP11brahmppu:28747: phūtkṛtya phūtkṛtya ca roditi sma BrP_229.80b
GP11brahmppu:28748: yathā yathā roditi sa śvapākas BrP_229.80c
GP11brahmppu:28749: tathā tathā me hy abhavat kṛtāpi BrP_229.80d
GP11brahmppu:28750: tato 'ham ārtaṃ tu nivārya taṃ vai BrP_229.81a
GP11brahmppu:28752: tataḥ sa duḥkhāt saha putrakaiḥ BrP_229.81c
GP11brahmppu:28758: tasmin praviṣṭe salile mṛte ca BrP_229.83a
GP11brahmppu:28761: jale praviṣṭas tridivaṃ gataś ca BrP_229.83d
GP11brahmppu:28768: tasmāc cyutas tvadbhavane ca jāto BrP_229.85c
GP11brahmppu:28772: ity evam uktvā pitaraṃ praṇamya BrP_229.86c
GP11brahmppu:28778: tyaktvā tanuṃ doṣamayīṃ tatas tu BrP_229.87c
GP11brahmppu:28783: yayā jagan moham upaiti viprāḥ BrP_229.88d
GP11brahmppu:28785: asmābhis tu śrutaṃ vyāsa yat tvayā samudāhṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:28786: prādurbhāvāśritaṃ puṇyaṃ māyā viṣṇoś ca durvidā // BrP_230.1 //
GP11brahmppu:28788: mahāpralayasaṃjñāṃ ca kalpānte ca mahāmune // BrP_230.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28791: kalpānte prākṛte caiva pralaye jāyate yathā // BrP_230.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28794: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś ceti caturyugam /
GP11brahmppu:28795: daivair varṣasahasrais tu tad dvādaśābhir ucyate // BrP_230.5 //
GP11brahmppu:28797: ādyaṃ kṛtayugaṃ proktaṃ munayo 'ntyaṃ tathā kalim // BrP_230.6 //
GP11brahmppu:28798: ādye kṛtayuge sargo brahmaṇā kriyate yataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28799: kriyate copasaṃhāras tathānte 'pi kalau yuge // BrP_230.7 //
GP11brahmppu:28801: kaleḥ svarūpaṃ bhagavan vistarād vaktum arhasi /
GP11brahmppu:28802: dharmaś catuṣpād bhagavān yasmin vaikalyam ṛcchati // BrP_230.8 //
GP11brahmppu:28804: kalisvarūpaṃ bho viprā yat pṛcchadhvaṃ mamānaghāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28805: nibodhadhvaṃ samāsena vartate yan mahattaram // BrP_230.9 //
GP11brahmppu:28808: vivāhā na kalau dharmā na śiṣyā gurusaṃsthitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28809: na putrā dhārmikāś caiva na ca vahnikriyākramaḥ // BrP_230.11 //
GP11brahmppu:28810: yatra tatra kule jāto balī sarveśvaraḥ kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28811: sarvebhya eva varṇebhyo naraḥ kanyopajīvanaḥ // BrP_230.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28812: yena tenaiva yogena dvijātir dīkṣitaḥ kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28813: yaiva saiva ca viprendrāḥ prāyaścittakriyā kalau // BrP_230.13 //
GP11brahmppu:28814: sarvam eva kalau śāstraṃ yasya yad vacanaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28815: devatāś ca kalau sarvāḥ sarvaḥ sarvasya cāśramaḥ // BrP_230.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28818: vittena bhavitā puṃsāṃ svalpenaiva madaḥ kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28819: strīṇāṃ rūpamadaś caiva keśair eva bhaviṣyati // BrP_230.16 //
GP11brahmppu:28821: kalau striyo bhaviṣyanti tadā keśair alaṃkṛtāḥ // BrP_230.17 //
GP11brahmppu:28823: bhartā bhaviṣyati kalau vittavān eva yoṣitām // BrP_230.18 //
GP11brahmppu:28824: yo yo dadāti bahulaṃ sa sa svāmī tadā nṛṇām /
GP11brahmppu:28826: gṛhāntā dravyasaṃghātā dravyāntā ca tathā matiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28827: arthāś cāthopabhogāntā bhaviṣyanti tadā kalau // BrP_230.20 //
GP11brahmppu:28832: sadā sapauruṣaṃ ceto bhāvi vipra tadā kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28833: kṣīrapradānasaṃbandhi bhāti goṣu ca gauravam // BrP_230.23 //
GP11brahmppu:28838: durbhikṣam eva satataṃ sadā kleśam anīśvarāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28839: prāpsyanti vyāhatasukhaṃ pramādān mānavāḥ kalau // BrP_230.26 //
GP11brahmppu:28841: kariṣyanti kalau prāpte na ca piṇḍodakakriyām // BrP_230.27 //
GP11brahmppu:28843: bahuprajālpabhāgyāś ca bhaviṣyanti kalau striyaḥ // BrP_230.28 //
GP11brahmppu:28845: kurvatyo gurubhartṝṇām ājñāṃ bhetsyanty anāvṛtāḥ // BrP_230.29 //
GP11brahmppu:28851: gṛhasthāś ca na hoṣyanti na dāsyanty ucitāny api // BrP_230.32 //
GP11brahmppu:28853: bhikṣavaś cāpi putrā hi snehasaṃbandhayantrakāḥ // BrP_230.33 //
GP11brahmppu:28855: hāriṇo janavittānāṃ saṃprāpte ca kalau yuge // BrP_230.34 //
GP11brahmppu:28856: yo yo 'śvarathanāgāḍhyaḥ sa sa rājā bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:28857: yaś ca yaś cābalaḥ sarvaḥ sa sa bhṛtyaḥ kalau yuge // BrP_230.35 //
GP11brahmppu:28864: vedamārge pralīne ca pākhaṇḍāḍhye tato jane /
GP11brahmppu:28865: adharmavṛddhyā lokānām alpam āyur bhaviṣyati // BrP_230.39 //
GP11brahmppu:28871: na jīviṣyati vai kaścit kalau varṣāṇi viṃśatim // BrP_230.42 //
GP11brahmppu:28873: yatas tato vinaśyanti kālenālpena mānavāḥ // BrP_230.43 //
GP11brahmppu:28874: yadā yadā hi pākhaṇḍa- vṛttir atropalakṣyate /
GP11brahmppu:28875: tadā tadā kaler vṛddhir anumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // BrP_230.44 //
GP11brahmppu:28877: tadā tadā kaler vṛddhir anumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // BrP_230.45 //
GP11brahmppu:28879: tadānumeyaṃ prādhānyaṃ kaler viprā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // BrP_230.46 //
GP11brahmppu:28880: yadā yadā na yajñānām īśvaraḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28881: ijyate puruṣair yajñais tadā jñeyaṃ kaler balam // BrP_230.47 //
GP11brahmppu:28882: na prītir vedavādeṣu pākhaṇḍeṣu yadā ratiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28883: kaler vṛddhis tadā prājñair anumeyā dvijottamāḥ // BrP_230.48 //
GP11brahmppu:28885: nārcayiṣyanti bho viprāḥ pākhaṇḍopahatā narāḥ // BrP_230.49 //
GP11brahmppu:28886: kiṃ devaiḥ kiṃ dvijair vedaiḥ kiṃ śaucenāmbujalpanā /
GP11brahmppu:28887: ity evaṃ pralapiṣyanti pākhaṇḍopahatā narāḥ // BrP_230.50 //
GP11brahmppu:28888: alpavṛṣṭiś ca parjanyaḥ svalpaṃ sasyaphalaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:28889: phalaṃ tathālpasāraṃ ca viprāḥ prāpte kalau yuge // BrP_230.51 //
GP11brahmppu:28891: śūdraprāyās tathā varṇā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // BrP_230.52 //
GP11brahmppu:28893: bhaviṣyati kalau prāpta auśīraṃ cānulepanam // BrP_230.53 //
GP11brahmppu:28896: kasya mātā pitā kasya yadā karmātmakaḥ pumān /
GP11brahmppu:28899: narāḥ pāpāny anudinaṃ kariṣyanty alpamedhasaḥ // BrP_230.56 //
GP11brahmppu:28901: yad yad duḥkhāya tat sarvaṃ kalikāle bhaviṣyati // BrP_230.57 //
GP11brahmppu:28903: tadā praviralo vipraḥ kaścil loke bhaviṣyati // BrP_230.58 //
GP11brahmppu:28905: karoti yaḥ kṛtayuge kriyate tapasā hi yaḥ // BrP_230.59 //
GP11brahmppu:28908: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa śrotuṃ vāñchā pravartate // BrP_230.60 //
GP11brahmppu:28910: dhanye kalau bhaved viprās tv alpakleśair mahat phalam /
GP11brahmppu:28911: tathā bhavetāṃ strīśūdrau dhanyau cānyan nibodhata // BrP_230.61 //
GP11brahmppu:28912: yat kṛte daśabhir varṣais tretāyāṃ hāyanena tat /
GP11brahmppu:28913: dvāpare tac ca māsena ahorātreṇa tat kalau // BrP_230.62 //
GP11brahmppu:28914: tapaso brahmacaryasya japādeś ca phalaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28915: prāpnoti puruṣas tena kalau sādhv iti bhāṣitum // BrP_230.63 //
GP11brahmppu:28916: dhyāyan kṛte yajan yajñais tretāyāṃ dvāpare 'rcayan /
GP11brahmppu:28917: yad āpnoti tad āpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam // BrP_230.64 //
GP11brahmppu:28919: svalpāyāsena dharmajñās tena tuṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ kalau // BrP_230.65 //
GP11brahmppu:28921: tatas tu dharmasaṃprāptair yaṣṭavyaṃ vidhivad dhanaiḥ // BrP_230.66 //
GP11brahmppu:28922: vṛthā kathā vṛthā bhojyaṃ vṛthā svaṃ ca dvijanmanām /
GP11brahmppu:28923: patanāya tathā bhāvyaṃ tais tu saṃyatibhiḥ saha // BrP_230.67 //
GP11brahmppu:28926: pāratantryāt samasteṣu teṣāṃ kāryeṣu vai tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28927: lokān kleśena mahatā yajanti vinayānvitāḥ // BrP_230.69 //
GP11brahmppu:28929: nijaṃ jayati vai lokaṃ śūdro dhanyataras tataḥ // BrP_230.70 //
GP11brahmppu:28930: bhakṣyābhakṣyeṣu nāśāsti yeṣāṃ pāpeṣu vā yataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28931: niyamo muniśārdūlās tenāsau sādhv itīritam // BrP_230.71 //
GP11brahmppu:28933: pratipādanīyaṃ pātreṣu yaṣṭavyaṃ ca yathāvidhi // BrP_230.72 //
GP11brahmppu:28935: tathā sadviniyogāya vijñeyaṃ gahanaṃ nṛṇām // BrP_230.73 //
GP11brahmppu:28936: ebhir anyais tathā kleśaiḥ puruṣā dvijasattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28937: nijāñ jayanti vai lokān prājāpatyādikān kramāt // BrP_230.74 //
GP11brahmppu:28938: yoṣic chuśrūṣaṇād bhartuḥ karmaṇā manasā girā /
GP11brahmppu:28939: etad viṣayam āpnoti tatsālokyaṃ yato dvijāḥ // BrP_230.75 //
GP11brahmppu:28940: nātikleśena mahatā tān eva puruṣo yathā /
GP11brahmppu:28941: tṛtīyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ tena mayā sādhv iti yoṣitaḥ // BrP_230.76 //
GP11brahmppu:28942: etad vaḥ kathitaṃ viprā yannimittam ihāgatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28943: tat pṛcchadhvaṃ yathākāmam ahaṃ vakṣyāmi vaḥ sphuṭam // BrP_230.77 //
GP11brahmppu:28944: alpenaiva prayatnena dharmaḥ sidhyati vai kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28947: tathā strībhir anāyāsāt patiśuśrūṣayaiva hi // BrP_230.79 //
GP11brahmppu:28948: tatas tritayam apy etan mama dhanyatamaṃ matam /
GP11brahmppu:28950: tathā svalpena tapasā siddhiṃ yāsyanti mānavāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28951: dhanyā dharmaṃ cariṣyanti yugānte munisattamāḥ // BrP_230.81 //
GP11brahmppu:28952: bhavadbhir yad abhipretaṃ tad etat kathitaṃ mayā /
GP11brahmppu:28953: apṛṣṭenāpi dharmajñāḥ kim anyat kriyatāṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_230.82 //
GP11brahmppu:28955: āsannaṃ viprakṛṣṭaṃ vā yadi kālaṃ na vidmahe /
GP11brahmppu:28957: prāptā vayaṃ hi tat kālam anayā dharmatṛṣṇayā /
GP11brahmppu:28958: ādadyāma paraṃ dharmaṃ sukham alpena karmaṇā // BrP_231.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28960: pranaṣṭadharmaṃ dharmajña nimittair vaktum arhasi // BrP_231.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28965: śūdrāś ca brāhmaṇācārā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.5 //
GP11brahmppu:28966: śrotriyāḥ kāṇḍapṛṣṭhāś ca niṣkarmāṇi havīṃṣi ca /
GP11brahmppu:28971: bhṛtyā hy anirdiṣṭabhujo bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.8 //
GP11brahmppu:28973: akutsanā ca patite bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye // BrP_231.9 //
GP11brahmppu:28975: ūnaṣoḍaśavarṣāś ca prasoṣyanti tathā striyaḥ // BrP_231.10 //
GP11brahmppu:28977: pramadāḥ keśaśūlāś ca bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.11 //
GP11brahmppu:28979: śūdrābhā vādinaś caiva brāhmaṇāś cāntyavāsinaḥ // BrP_231.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28983: sādhūnāṃ parivṛttiś ca vidyād antagate yuge // BrP_231.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28985: nirhrīkāś ca prajāḥ sarvā naṣṭās tatra yugakṣaye // BrP_231.15 //
GP11brahmppu:28987: ṛtavo viparītāś ca bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.16 //
GP11brahmppu:28989: citravarṣī ca parjanyo yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // BrP_231.17 //
GP11brahmppu:28990: sarve śūrakule jātāḥ kṣamānāthā bhavanti hi /
GP11brahmppu:28991: yathā nimnāḥ prajāḥ sarvā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.18 //
GP11brahmppu:28993: na ca dharmaṃ cariṣyanti mānavā nirgate yuge // BrP_231.19 //
GP11brahmppu:28995: sarve ... vāṇikāś caiva bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.20 //
GP11brahmppu:28998: saukumārye tathā rūpe ratne copakṣayaṃ gate /
GP11brahmppu:28999: bhaviṣyanti yugasyānte nāryaḥ keśair alaṃkṛtāḥ // BrP_231.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29001: yugānte samanuprāpte nānyā bhāryāsamā ratiḥ // BrP_231.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29003: puruṣālpaṃ bahustrīkaṃ tad yugāntasya lakṣaṇam // BrP_231.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29007: aśīlāḥ sukhino loke bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29009: saṃdigdhaḥ paralokaś ca bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye // BrP_231.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29011: yugāpakramaṇe pūrvaṃ bhaviṣyanti na bāndhavāḥ // BrP_231.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29013: ṛṇaṃ savinayabhraṃśaṃ yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // BrP_231.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29014: bhaviṣyaty aphalo harṣaḥ krodhaś ca saphalo nṛṇām /
GP11brahmppu:29015: ajāś cāpi nirotsyanti payaso 'rthe yugakṣaye // BrP_231.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29019: sarvaḥ sarvaṃ vijānāti vṛddhān anupasevya vai // BrP_231.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29020: na kaścid akavir nāma yugānte samupasthite /
GP11brahmppu:29021: nakṣatrāṇi viyogāni na karmasthā dvijātayaḥ // BrP_231.33 //
GP11brahmppu:29025: yājayiṣyanty ayājyāṃs tu tathābhakṣyasya bhakṣiṇaḥ // BrP_231.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29027: bhoḥśabdam abhidhāsyanti na ca kaścit paṭhiṣyati // BrP_231.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29029: nakṣatrāṇi vivarṇāni viparitā diśo daśa // BrP_231.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29031: preṣayanti pitṝn putrā vadhūḥ śvaśrūḥ svakarmasu // BrP_231.38 //
GP11brahmppu:29032: yugeṣv evaṃ nivatsyanti pramadāś ca narās tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29034: bhikṣāṃ balim adattvā ca bhokṣyanti puruṣāḥ svayam /
GP11brahmppu:29035: vañcayitvā patīn suptān gamiṣyanti striyo 'nyataḥ // BrP_231.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29036: na vyādhitān nāpy arūpān nodyatān nāpy asūyakān /
GP11brahmppu:29037: kṛte na pratikartā ca yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // BrP_231.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29042: kāṃ ca kāṣṭhāṃ samāsādya prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // BrP_231.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29044: ata ūrdhvaṃ cyute dharme guṇahīnāḥ prajās tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29045: śīlavyasanam āsādya prāpsyanti hrāsam āyuṣaḥ // BrP_231.44 //
GP11brahmppu:29049: evaṃ gatvā parāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // BrP_231.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29051: kiṃdharmaśīlāḥ kecit tu kecid atra kutūhalāḥ // BrP_231.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29052: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca pramāṇam iti niścitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29053: apramāṇaṃ kariṣyanti sarvam ity apare janāḥ // BrP_231.48 //
GP11brahmppu:29055: bhaviṣyanti narā mūḍhā dvijāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // BrP_231.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29057: dāmbhikās te bhaviṣyanti narā jñānavilopitāḥ // BrP_231.50 //
GP11brahmppu:29061: bhaviṣyanti tadā loke tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // BrP_231.52 //
GP11brahmppu:29063: siddhim alpena kālena prāpsyanti nirupaskṛtāḥ // BrP_231.53 //
GP11brahmppu:29064: viprāṇāṃ śāśvatīṃ vṛttiṃ yadā varṇāvare janāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29065: saṃśrayiṣyanti bho viprās tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // BrP_231.54 //
GP11brahmppu:29067: bhaviṣyati yuge kṣīṇe tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // BrP_231.55 //
GP11brahmppu:29073: vyavahāropavṛttāś ca cyutā dharmāś ca śāśvatāt // BrP_231.58 //
GP11brahmppu:29076: teṣu prabhavamāṇeṣu janeṣv api ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29078: kalau yuge samutpannāḥ pradhānapuruṣāś ca ye /
GP11brahmppu:29079: kathāyogena tān sarvān pūjayiṣyanti mānavāḥ // BrP_231.61 //
GP11brahmppu:29081: bhokṣyabhojyaharāś caiva karaṇḍānāṃ ca hāriṇaḥ // BrP_231.62 //
GP11brahmppu:29082: caurāś caurasya hartāro hantā hantur bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:29083: cauraiś caurakṣaye cāpi kṛte kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati // BrP_231.63 //
GP11brahmppu:29088: kṣemaṃ subhikṣam ārogyaṃ sāmagryaṃ caiva bandhuṣu /
GP11brahmppu:29089: uddeśeṣu narāḥ śreṣṭhā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.66 //
GP11brahmppu:29091: maṇḍalaiḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti deśe deśe pṛthak pṛthak // BrP_231.67 //
GP11brahmppu:29093: narāḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti tadā kālaparikṣayāt // BrP_231.68 //
GP11brahmppu:29094: tataḥ sarve samādāya kumārān pradrutā bhayāt /
GP11brahmppu:29096: aṅgān vaṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca kāśmīrān atha kośalān /
GP11brahmppu:29098: kṛtsnaṃ ca himavatpārśvaṃ kūlaṃ ca lavaṇāmbhasaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29099: vividhaṃ jīrṇapattraṃ ca valkalāny ajināni ca // BrP_231.71 //
GP11brahmppu:29100: svayaṃ kṛtvā nivatsyanti tasmin bhūte yugakṣaye /
GP11brahmppu:29101: araṇyeṣu ca vatsyanti narā mlecchagaṇaiḥ saha // BrP_231.72 //
GP11brahmppu:29103: agoptāraś ca goptāro bhaviṣyanti narādhipāḥ // BrP_231.73 //
GP11brahmppu:29104: mṛgair matsyair vihaṃgaiś ca śvāpadaiḥ sarpakīṭakaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29107: svayaṃ kṛtvā nivatsyanti yathā munijanas tathā // BrP_231.75 //
GP11brahmppu:29109: ajaiḍakaṃ kharoṣṭraṃ ca pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ // BrP_231.76 //
GP11brahmppu:29115: hīnā hīnaṃ tathā dharmaṃ prajā samanuvatsyati // BrP_231.79 //
GP11brahmppu:29116: āyus tatra ca martyānāṃ paraṃ triṃśad bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:29123: kariṣyanti ca saṃskāraṃ svayaṃ ca kṣayapīḍitāḥ // BrP_231.83 //
GP11brahmppu:29125: tataḥ pādapravṛtte tu dharme śreyo nipatsyate // BrP_231.84 //
GP11brahmppu:29127: svādu kiṃ tv iti vijñāya dharma eva ca dṛśyate // BrP_231.85 //
GP11brahmppu:29128: yathā hānikramaṃ prāptās tathā ṛddhikramaṃ gatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29129: pragṛhīte tato dharme prapaśyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // BrP_231.86 //
GP11brahmppu:29131: eka eva tu kālo 'yaṃ hīnavarṇo yathā śaśī // BrP_231.87 //
GP11brahmppu:29132: channaś ca tamasā somo yathā kaliyugaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29133: muktaś ca tamasā soma evaṃ kṛtayugaṃ ca tat // BrP_231.88 //
GP11brahmppu:29134: arthavādaḥ paraṃ brahma vedārtha iti taṃ viduḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29135: aviviktam avijñātaṃ dāyādyam iha dhāryate // BrP_231.89 //
GP11brahmppu:29136: iṣṭavādas tapo nāma tapo hi sthavirīkṛtaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29137: guṇaiḥ karmābhinirvṛttir guṇāḥ śudhyanti karmaṇā // BrP_231.90 //
GP11brahmppu:29139: yuge yuge yathākālam ṛṣibhiḥ samudāhṛtā // BrP_231.91 //
GP11brahmppu:29141: āśiṣaś ca śivāḥ puṇyās tathaivāyur yuge yuge // BrP_231.92 //
GP11brahmppu:29150: ātyantiko vai mokṣaś ca prākṛto dviparārdhikaḥ // BrP_232.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29155: sthānāt sthānaṃ daśaguṇam ekaikaṃ gaṇyate dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29157: parārdhaṃ dviguṇaṃ yat tu prākṛtaḥ sa layo dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29158: tadāvyakte 'khilaṃ vyaktaṃ sahetau layam eti vai // BrP_232.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29160: taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśat kāṣṭhās tathā kalā // BrP_232.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29161: nāḍikā tu pramāṇena kalā ca daśa pañca ca /
GP11brahmppu:29162: unmānenāmbhasaḥ sā tu palāny ardhatrayodaśa // BrP_232.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29164: māgadhena pramāṇena jalaprasthas tu sa smṛtaḥ // BrP_232.8 //
GP11brahmppu:29166: ahorātraṃ muhūrtās tu triṃśan māso dinais tathā // BrP_232.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29167: māsair dvādaśabhir varṣam ahorātraṃ tu tad divi /
GP11brahmppu:29168: tribhir varṣaśatair varṣaṃ ṣaṣṭyā caivāsuradviṣām // BrP_232.10 //
GP11brahmppu:29170: caturyugasahasraṃ tu kathyate brahmaṇo dinam // BrP_232.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29171: sa kalpas tatra manavaś caturdaśa dvijottamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29172: tadante caiva bho viprā brahmanaimittiko layaḥ // BrP_232.12 //
GP11brahmppu:29173: tasya svarūpam atyugraṃ dvijendrā gadato mama /
GP11brahmppu:29174: śṛṇudhvaṃ prākṛtaṃ bhūyas tato vakṣyāmy ahaṃ layam // BrP_232.13 //
GP11brahmppu:29177: tato yāny alpasārāṇi tāni sattvāny anekaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29178: kṣayaṃ yānti muniśreṣṭhāḥ pārthivāny atipīḍanāt // BrP_232.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29179: tataḥ sa bhagavān kṛṣṇo rudrarūpī tathāvyayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29180: kṣayāya yatate kartum ātmasthāḥ sakalāḥ prajāḥ // BrP_232.16 //
GP11brahmppu:29181: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur bhānoḥ saptasu raśmiṣu /
GP11brahmppu:29182: sthitaḥ pibaty aśeṣāṇi jalāni munisattamāḥ // BrP_232.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29184: śoṣaṃ nayati bho viprāḥ samastaṃ pṛthivītalam // BrP_232.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29186: pātāleṣu ca yat toyaṃ tat sarvaṃ nayati kṣayam // BrP_232.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29188: sahasraraśmayaḥ sapta jāyante tatra bhāskarāḥ // BrP_232.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29189: adhaś cordhvaṃ ca te dīptās tataḥ sapta divākarāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29190: dahanty aśeṣaṃ trailokyaṃ sapātālatalaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_232.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29191: dahyamānaṃ tu tair dīptais trailokyaṃ dīptabhāskaraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29194: bhavaty eṣā ca vasudhā kūrmapṛṣṭhopamākṛtiḥ // BrP_232.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29197: pātālāni samastāni sa dagdhvā jvalano mahān /
GP11brahmppu:29198: bhūmim abhyetya sakalaṃ dagdhvā tu vasudhātalam // BrP_232.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29199: bhuvo lokaṃ tataḥ sarvaṃ svargalokaṃ ca dāruṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29204: hṛtāvakāśā gacchanti maharlokaṃ dvijās tadā // BrP_232.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29205: tasmād api mahātāpa- taptā lokās tataḥ param /
GP11brahmppu:29206: gacchanti janalokaṃ te daśāvṛtyā paraiṣiṇaḥ // BrP_232.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29207: tato dagdhvā jagat sarvaṃ rudrarūpī janārdanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29210: uttiṣṭhanti tadā vyomni ghorāḥ saṃvartakā ghanāḥ // BrP_232.31 //
GP11brahmppu:29212: dhūmavarṇā ghanāḥ kecit kecit pītāḥ payodharāḥ // BrP_232.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29221: varṣantas te mahāsārās tam agnim atibhairavam /
GP11brahmppu:29223: naṣṭe cāgnau śataṃ te 'pi varṣāṇām adhikaṃ ghanāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29224: plāvayanto jagat sarvaṃ varṣanti munisattamāḥ // BrP_232.38 //
GP11brahmppu:29226: bhuvo lokaṃ tathaivordhvaṃ plāvayanti divaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_232.39 //
GP11brahmppu:29228: varṣanti te mahāmeghā varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam // BrP_232.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29231: ekārṇavaṃ bhavaty etat trailokyam akhilaṃ tataḥ // BrP_233.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29232: atha niḥśvāsajo viṣṇor vāyus tāñ jaladāṃs tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29233: nāśaṃ nayati bho viprā varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam // BrP_233.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29235: anādir ādir viśvasya pītvā vāyum aśeṣataḥ // BrP_233.3 //
GP11brahmppu:29237: brahmarūpadharaḥ śete bhagavān ādikṛd dhariḥ // BrP_233.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29243: nimittaṃ tatra yac chete brahmarūpadharo hariḥ // BrP_233.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29244: yadā jāgarti sarvātmā sa tadā ceṣṭate jagat /
GP11brahmppu:29247: ekārṇavakṛte loke tāvatī rātrir ucyate // BrP_233.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29248: tataḥ prabuddho rātryante punaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ karoty ajaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29249: brahmasvarūpadhṛg viṣṇur yathā vaḥ kathitaṃ purā // BrP_233.10 //
GP11brahmppu:29251: naimittiko vaḥ kathitaḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ prākṛtaṃ param // BrP_233.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29253: samasteṣv eva lokeṣu pātāleṣv akhileṣu ca // BrP_233.12 //
GP11brahmppu:29256: āpo grasanti vai pūrvaṃ bhūmer gandhādikaṃ guṇam /
GP11brahmppu:29257: āttagandhā tato bhūmiḥ pralayāya prakalpate // BrP_233.14 //
GP11brahmppu:29259: āpas tadā pravṛttās tu vegavatyo mahāsvanāḥ // BrP_233.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29262: apām api guṇo yas tu jyotiṣā pīyate tu saḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29263: naśyanty āpaḥ sutaptāś ca rasatanmātrasaṃkṣayāt // BrP_233.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29265: agnyavasthe tu salile tejasā sarvato vṛte // BrP_233.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29266: sa cāgniḥ sarvato vyāpya ādatte taj jalaṃ tadā /
GP11brahmppu:29267: sarvam āpūryato cābhis tadā jagad idaṃ śanaiḥ // BrP_233.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29268: arcibhiḥ saṃtate tasmiṃs tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29269: jyotiṣo 'pi paraṃ rūpaṃ vāyur atti prabhākaram // BrP_233.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29272: praśāmyati tadā jyotir vāyur dodhūyate mahān /
GP11brahmppu:29273: nirāloke tadā loke vāyusaṃsthe ca tejasi // BrP_233.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29275: ūrdhvaṃ ca vāyus tiryak ca dodhavīti diśo daśa // BrP_233.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29276: vāyos tv api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29277: praśāmyati tadā vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhaty anāvṛtam // BrP_233.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29279: sarvam āpūrayac caiva sumahat tat prakāśate // BrP_233.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29281: śabdamātraṃ tathākāśaṃ sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati // BrP_233.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29282: tataḥ śabdaguṇaṃ tasya bhūtādir grasate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29283: bhūtendriyeṣu yugapad bhūtādau saṃsthiteṣu vai // BrP_233.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29284: abhimānātmako hy eṣa bhūtādis tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29285: bhūtādiṃ grasate cāpi mahābuddhir vicakṣaṇā // BrP_233.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29286: urvī mahāṃś ca jagataḥ prānte 'ntar bāhyatas tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29287: evaṃ sapta mahābuddhiḥ kramāt prakṛtayas tathā // BrP_233.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29288: pratyāhārais tu tāḥ sarvāḥ praviśanti parasparam /
GP11brahmppu:29289: yenedam āvṛtaṃ sarvam aṇḍam apsu pralīyate // BrP_233.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29291: udakāvaraṇaṃ hy atra jyotiṣā pīyate tu tat // BrP_233.31 //
GP11brahmppu:29292: jyotir vāyau layaṃ yāti yāty ākāśe samīraṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29293: ākāśaṃ caiva bhūtādir grasate taṃ tathā mahān // BrP_233.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29294: mahāntam ebhiḥ sahitaṃ prakṛtir grasate dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29295: guṇasāmyam anudriktam anyūnaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ // BrP_233.33 //
GP11brahmppu:29296: procyate prakṛtir hetuḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ param /
GP11brahmppu:29297: ity eṣā prakṛtiḥ sarvā vyaktāvyaktasvarūpiṇī // BrP_233.34 //
GP11brahmppu:29299: ekaḥ śuddho 'kṣaro nityaḥ sarvavyāpī tathā punaḥ // BrP_233.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29303: sa brahma tat paraṃ dhāma paramātmā pareśvaraḥ // BrP_233.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29304: sa viṣṇuḥ sarvam evedaṃ yato nāvartate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29306: puruṣaś cāpy ubhāv etau līyete paramātmani /
GP11brahmppu:29307: paramātmā ca sarveṣām ādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ // BrP_233.39 //
GP11brahmppu:29308: viṣṇunāmnā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate /
GP11brahmppu:29309: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam // BrP_233.40 //
