GP11brahmppu:29310: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ puruṣair yajñamūrtiḥ sa ijyate /
GP11brahmppu:29311: ṛgyajuḥsāmabhir mārgaiḥ pravṛttair ijyate hy asau // BrP_233.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29313: jñānātmā jñānayogena jñānamūrtiḥ sa ijyate // BrP_233.42 //
GP11brahmppu:29315: hrasvadīrghaplutair yat tu kiṃcid vastv abhidhīyate // BrP_233.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29316: yac ca vācām aviṣayas tat sarvaṃ viṣṇur avyayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29317: vyaktaḥ sa evam avyaktaḥ sa eva puruṣo 'vyayaḥ // BrP_233.44 //
GP11brahmppu:29319: vyaktāvyaktātmikā tasmin prakṛtiḥ sā vilīyate // BrP_233.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29320: puruṣaś cāpi bho viprā yas tad avyākṛtātmani /
GP11brahmppu:29321: dviparārdhātmakaḥ kālaḥ kathito yo mayā dvijāḥ // BrP_233.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29322: tad ahas tasya viprendrā viṣṇor īśasya kathyate /
GP11brahmppu:29323: vyakte tu prakṛtau līne prakṛtyāṃ puruṣe tathā // BrP_233.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29325: naivāhas tasya ca niśā nityasya paramātmanaḥ // BrP_233.48 //
GP11brahmppu:29326: upacārāt tathāpy etat tasyeśasya tu kathyate /
GP11brahmppu:29327: ity eṣa muniśārdūlāḥ kathitaḥ prākṛto layaḥ // BrP_233.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29329: ādhyātmikādi bho viprā jñātvā tāpatrayaṃ budhaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29332: śārīro bahubhir bhedair bhidyate śrūyatāṃ ca saḥ // BrP_234.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29336: bhidyate dehajas tāpo mānasaṃ śrotum arhatha // BrP_234.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29340: ity evamādibhir bhedais tāpo hy ādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_234.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29342: sarīsṛpādyaiś ca nṛṇāṃ janyate cādhibhautikaḥ // BrP_234.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29346: duḥkhaṃ sahasraśo bhedair bhidyate munisattamāḥ // BrP_234.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29358: kleśair niṣkrāntim āpnoti jaṭharān mātur āturaḥ // BrP_234.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29360: vijñānabhraṃśam āpnoti jātas tu munisattamāḥ // BrP_234.16 //
GP11brahmppu:29361: kaṇṭakair iva tunnāṅgaḥ krakacair iva dāritaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29362: pūtivraṇān nipatito dharaṇyāṃ krimiko yathā // BrP_234.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29370: na jānāti kutaḥ ko 'haṃ kutra gantā kimātmakaḥ // BrP_234.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29371: kena bandhena baddho 'haṃ kāraṇaṃ kim akāraṇam /
GP11brahmppu:29372: kiṃ kāryaṃ kim akāryaṃ vā kiṃ vācyaṃ kiṃ na cocyate // BrP_234.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29373: ko dharmaḥ kaś ca vādharmaḥ kasmin varteta vai katham /
GP11brahmppu:29374: kiṃ kartavyam akartavyaṃ kiṃ vā kiṃ guṇadoṣavat // BrP_234.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29378: ajñānināṃ pravartante karmalopas tato dvijāḥ // BrP_234.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29379: narakaṃ karmaṇāṃ lopāt phalam āhur maharṣayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29380: tasmād ajñānināṃ duḥkham iha cāmutra cottamam // BrP_234.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29398: saṃsmaran yauvane dīrghaṃ niśvasity atitāpitaḥ // BrP_234.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29400: maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni prāpnoti śṛṇu tāny api // BrP_234.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29402: muhur glāniparaś cāsau muhur jñānabalānvitaḥ // BrP_234.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29404: ete kathaṃ bhaviṣyantīty atīva mamatākulaḥ // BrP_234.38 //
GP11brahmppu:29410: tāpena mahatā vyāptas tṛṣā vyāptas tathā kṣudhā // BrP_234.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29412: tataś ca yātanādehaṃ kleśena pratipadyate // BrP_234.42 //
GP11brahmppu:29413: etāny anyāni cogrāṇi duḥkhāni maraṇe nṛṇām /
GP11brahmppu:29414: śṛṇudhvaṃ narake yāni prāpyante puruṣair mṛtaiḥ // BrP_234.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29418: pratyekaṃ yātanāyāś ca yātanādi dvijottamāḥ // BrP_234.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29420: kuṭhāraiḥ pāṭyamānānāṃ bhūmau cāpi nikhanyatām // BrP_234.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29426: prāpyante nārakair viprās teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate // BrP_234.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29428: svarge 'pi pātabhītasya kṣayiṣṇor nāsti nirvṛtiḥ // BrP_234.50 //
GP11brahmppu:29429: punaś ca garbho bhavati jāyate ca punar naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29430: garbhe vilīyate bhūyo jāyamāno 'stam eti ca // BrP_234.51 //
GP11brahmppu:29431: jātamātraś ca mriyate bālabhāve ca yauvane /
GP11brahmppu:29432: yad yat prītikaraṃ puṃsāṃ vastu viprāḥ prajāyate // BrP_234.52 //
GP11brahmppu:29435: kriyate na tathā bhūri sukhaṃ puṃsāṃ yathāsukham /
GP11brahmppu:29438: tad asya trividhasyāpi duḥkhajātasya paṇḍitaiḥ // BrP_234.55 //
GP11brahmppu:29442: tasmāt tatprāptaye yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ paṇḍitair naraiḥ // BrP_234.57 //
GP11brahmppu:29443: tatprāptihetur jñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ dvijottamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29444: āgamotthaṃ vivekāc ca dvidhā jñānaṃ tathocyate // BrP_234.58 //
GP11brahmppu:29446: andhaṃ tama ivājñānaṃ dīpavac cendriyodbhavam // BrP_234.59 //
GP11brahmppu:29447: yathā sūryas tathā jñānaṃ yad vai viprā vivekajam /
GP11brahmppu:29448: manur apy āha vedārthaṃ smṛtvā yan munisattamāḥ // BrP_234.60 //
GP11brahmppu:29449: tad etac chrūyatām atra saṃbandhe gadato mama /
GP11brahmppu:29450: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat // BrP_234.61 //
GP11brahmppu:29452: dve vidye vai veditavye iti cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ // BrP_234.62 //
GP11brahmppu:29454: yat tad avyaktam ajaram acintyam ajam avyayam // BrP_234.63 //
GP11brahmppu:29456: vittaṃ sarvagataṃ nityaṃ bhūtayonim akāraṇam // BrP_234.64 //
GP11brahmppu:29457: vyāpyaṃ vyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ tad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29458: tad brahma paramaṃ dhāma tad dheyaṃ mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ // BrP_234.65 //
GP11brahmppu:29459: śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /
GP11brahmppu:29460: utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim // BrP_234.66 //
GP11brahmppu:29461: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti /
GP11brahmppu:29464: sarvāṇi tatra bhūtāni nivasanti parātmani // BrP_234.68 //
GP11brahmppu:29465: bhūteṣu ca sa sarvātmā vāsudevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29466: uvācedaṃ maharṣibhyaḥ purā pṛṣṭaḥ prajāpatiḥ // BrP_234.69 //
GP11brahmppu:29468: bhūteṣu vasate yo 'ntar vasanty atra ca tāni yat /
GP11brahmppu:29469: dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevas tataḥ prabhuḥ // BrP_234.70 //
GP11brahmppu:29471: doṣāṃś ca sarvān saguṇo hy atītaḥ BrP_234.71b
GP11brahmppu:29480: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra BrP_234.73c
GP11brahmppu:29488: saṃdṛśyate vāpy atha gamyate vā BrP_234.75c
GP11brahmppu:29489: taj jñānam ajñānam ato 'nyad uktam BrP_234.75d
GP11brahmppu:29492: yaṃ viditvāvyayaṃ tatra yuñjāmaḥ puruṣottamam // BrP_235.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29493: śrutvā sa vacanaṃ teṣāṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā /
GP11brahmppu:29494: abravīt paramaprīto yogī yogavidāṃ varaḥ // BrP_235.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29496: yogaṃ vakṣyāmi bho viprāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ bhavanāśanam /
GP11brahmppu:29497: yam abhyasyāpnuyād yogī mokṣaṃ paramadurlabham // BrP_235.3 //
GP11brahmppu:29499: itihāsaṃ purāṇaṃ ca vedāṃś caiva vicakṣaṇaḥ // BrP_235.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29500: āhāraṃ yogadoṣāṃś ca deśakālaṃ ca buddhimān /
GP11brahmppu:29501: jñātvā samabhyased yogaṃ nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ // BrP_235.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29502: bhuñjan saktuṃ yavāgūṃ ca takramūlaphalaṃ payaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29504: na manovikale dhmāte na śrānte kṣudhite tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29505: na dvaṃdve na ca śīte ca na coṣṇe nānilātmake // BrP_235.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29507: sarīsṛpe śmaśāne ca na nadyante 'gnisaṃnidhau // BrP_235.8 //
GP11brahmppu:29508: na caitye na ca valmīke sabhaye kūpasaṃnidhau /
GP11brahmppu:29509: na śuṣkaparṇanicaye yogaṃ yuñjīta karhicit // BrP_235.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29510: deśān etān anādṛtya mūḍhatvād yo yunakti vai /
GP11brahmppu:29511: pravakṣye tasya ye doṣā jāyante vighnakārakāḥ // BrP_235.10 //
GP11brahmppu:29512: bādhiryaṃ jaḍatā lopaḥ smṛter mūkatvam andhatā /
GP11brahmppu:29513: jvaraś ca jāyate sadyas tadvad ajñānasaṃbhavaḥ // BrP_235.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29514: tasmāt sarvātmanā kāryā rakṣā yogavidā sadā /
GP11brahmppu:29516: āśrame vijane guhye niḥśabde nirbhaye nage /
GP11brahmppu:29517: śūnyāgāre śucau ramye caikānte devatālaye // BrP_235.13 //
GP11brahmppu:29518: rajanyāḥ paścime yāme pūrve ca susamāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29519: pūrvāhṇe madhyame cāhni yuktāhāro jitendriyaḥ // BrP_235.14 //
GP11brahmppu:29521: nātinīce na cocchrite niḥspṛhaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ // BrP_235.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29524: nābhau nidhāya hastau dvau śāntaḥ padmāsane sthitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29525: saṃsthāpya dṛṣṭiṃ nāsāgre prāṇān āyamya vāgyataḥ // BrP_235.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29527: praṇavaṃ dīrgham udyamya saṃvṛtāsyaḥ suniścalaḥ // BrP_235.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29528: rajasā tamaso vṛttiṃ sattvena rajasas tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29529: saṃchādya nirmale śānte sthitaḥ saṃvṛtalocanaḥ // BrP_235.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29531: yuñjīta satataṃ yogī muktidaṃ puruṣottamam // BrP_235.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29533: kṣetrajñaś ca pare yojyas tato yuñjati yogavit // BrP_235.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29535: saṃtyajya viṣayāṃs tasya yogasiddhiḥ prakāśitā // BrP_235.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29536: yadā nirviṣayaṃ cittaṃ pare brahmaṇi līyate /
GP11brahmppu:29537: samādhau yogayuktasya tadābhyeti paraṃ padam // BrP_235.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29539: bhavaty ānandam āsādya tadā nirvāṇam ṛcchati // BrP_235.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29541: prāpya yogabalād yogī mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_235.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29543: sarvatrānityabuddhis tu yogī mucyeta nānyathā // BrP_235.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29544: indriyāṇi na seveta vairāgyeṇa ca yogavit /
GP11brahmppu:29545: sadā cābhyāsayogena mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_235.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29546: na ca padmāsanād yogo na nāsāgranirīkṣaṇāt /
GP11brahmppu:29547: manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogo yoga ucyate // BrP_235.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29548: evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhā yogaḥ prokto vimuktidaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29549: saṃsāramokṣahetuś ca kim anyac chrotum icchatha // BrP_235.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29551: śrutvā te vacanaṃ tasya sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan /
GP11brahmppu:29552: vyāsaṃ praśasya saṃpūjya punaḥ praṣṭuṃ samudyatāḥ // BrP_235.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29555: pibatāṃ no dvijaśreṣṭha na tṛptir iha dṛśyate // BrP_236.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29556: tasmād yogaṃ mune brūhi vistareṇa vimuktidam /
GP11brahmppu:29557: sāṃkhyaṃ ca dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha śrotum icchāmahe vayam // BrP_236.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29561: sāṃkhye vā yadi vā yoga etat pṛṣṭo vadasva naḥ // BrP_236.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29563: yenopāyena puruṣas tat tvaṃ vyākhyātum arhasi // BrP_236.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29566: nānyatra sarvasaṃtyāgāt siddhiṃ vindati kaścana // BrP_236.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29569: bhūmer deho jalāt sneho jyotiṣaś cakṣuṣī smṛte /
GP11brahmppu:29571: krāntau viṣṇur bale śakraḥ koṣṭhe 'gnir bhoktum icchati /
GP11brahmppu:29572: karṇayoḥ pradiśaḥ śrotre jihvāyāṃ vāk sarasvatī // BrP_236.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29573: karṇau tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī /
GP11brahmppu:29575: śabdasparśau tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ ca pañcamam /
GP11brahmppu:29576: indriyārthān pṛthag vidyād indriyebhyas tu nityadā // BrP_236.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29577: indriyāṇi mano yuṅkte avaśyān iva rājinaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29578: manaś cāpi sadā yuṅkte bhūtātmā hṛdayāśritaḥ // BrP_236.12 //
GP11brahmppu:29580: niyame ca visarge ca bhūtātmā manasas tathā // BrP_236.13 //
GP11brahmppu:29582: prāṇāpānau ca jīvaś ca nityaṃ deheṣu dehinām // BrP_236.14 //
GP11brahmppu:29583: āśrayo nāsti sattvasya guṇaśabdo na cetanāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29584: sattvaṃ hi tejaḥ sṛjati na guṇān vai kathaṃcana // BrP_236.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29585: evaṃ saptadaśaṃ dehaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29586: manīṣī manasā viprāḥ paśyaty ātmānam ātmani // BrP_236.16 //
GP11brahmppu:29587: na hy ayaṃ cakṣuṣā dṛśyo na ca sarvair apīndriyaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29588: manasā tu pradīptena mahān ātmā prakāśate // BrP_236.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29590: aśarīraṃ śarīre sve nirīkṣeta nirindriyam // BrP_236.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29592: yo 'nupaśyati sa pretya kalpate brahmabhūyataḥ // BrP_236.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29594: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ // BrP_236.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29595: sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu jaṅgameṣu dhruveṣu ca /
GP11brahmppu:29596: vasaty eko mahān ātmā yena sarvam idaṃ tatam // BrP_236.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29598: yadā paśyati bhūtātmā brahma saṃpadyate tadā // BrP_236.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29599: yāvān ātmani vedātmā tāvān ātmā parātmani /
GP11brahmppu:29600: ya evaṃ satataṃ veda so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate // BrP_236.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29602: devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ // BrP_236.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29604: yathā gatir na dṛśyeta tathā jñānavidāṃ gatiḥ // BrP_236.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29606: yasmiṃs tu pacyate kālas tan na vedeha kaścana // BrP_236.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29607: na tad ūrdhvaṃ na tiryak ca nādho na ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29608: na madhye pratigṛhṇīte naiva kiṃcin na kaścana // BrP_236.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29609: sarve tatsthā ime lokā bāhyam eṣāṃ na kiṃcana /
GP11brahmppu:29610: yady apy agre samāgacched yathā bāṇo guṇacyutaḥ // BrP_236.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29611: naivāntaṃ kāraṇasyeyād yady api syān manojavaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29612: tasmāt sūkṣmataraṃ nāsti nāsti sthūlataraṃ tathā // BrP_236.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29614: sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati // BrP_236.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29615: tad evāṇor aṇutaraṃ tan mahadbhyo mahattaram /
GP11brahmppu:29616: tad antaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate // BrP_236.31 //
GP11brahmppu:29617: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva dvedhā bhāvo 'yam ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29618: kṣaraḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu divyaṃ tv amṛtam akṣaram // BrP_236.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29619: navadvāraṃ puraṃ kṛtvā haṃso hi niyato vaśī /
GP11brahmppu:29620: īdṛśaḥ sarvabhūtasya sthāvarasya carasya ca // BrP_236.33 //
GP11brahmppu:29623: haṃsoktaṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva kūṭasthaṃ yat tad akṣaram /
GP11brahmppu:29624: tad vidvān akṣaraṃ prāpya jahāti prāṇajanmanī // BrP_236.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29626: bhavatāṃ pṛcchatāṃ viprā yathāvad iha tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29627: sāṃkhyaṃ jñānena saṃyuktaṃ yad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā // BrP_236.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29628: yogakṛtyaṃ tu bho viprāḥ kīrtayiṣyāmy ataḥ param /
GP11brahmppu:29629: ekatvaṃ buddhimanasor indriyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // BrP_236.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29630: ātmano vyāpino jñānaṃ jñānam etad anuttamam /
GP11brahmppu:29633: yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ // BrP_236.39 //
GP11brahmppu:29634: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam /
GP11brahmppu:29635: krodhaṃ śamena jayati kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt // BrP_236.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29637: dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā // BrP_236.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29638: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca karmaṇā /
GP11brahmppu:29639: apramādād bhayaṃ jahyād dambhaṃ prājñopasevanāt // BrP_236.42 //
GP11brahmppu:29640: evam etān yogadoṣāñ jayen nityam atandritaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29641: agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cātha devatāḥ praṇamet sadā // BrP_236.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29643: brahmatejomayaṃ śukraṃ yasya sarvam idaṃ jagat // BrP_236.44 //
GP11brahmppu:29645: dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā // BrP_236.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29646: śaucaṃ caivātmanaḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca nigrahaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29647: etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānaṃ cāpakarṣati // BrP_236.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29649: dhūtapāpmā tu tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ // BrP_236.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29650: kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā niṣeved brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GP11brahmppu:29651: manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca kṛtvaikāgryaṃ samāhitaḥ // BrP_236.48 //
GP11brahmppu:29652: pūrvarātre parārdhe ca dhārayen mana ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29653: jantoḥ pañcendriyasyāsya yady ekaṃ klinnam indriyam // BrP_236.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29654: tato 'sya sravati prajñā gireḥ pādād ivodakam /
GP11brahmppu:29655: manasaḥ pūrvam ādadyāt kūrmāṇām iva matsyahā // BrP_236.50 //
GP11brahmppu:29656: tataḥ śrotraṃ tataś cakṣur jihvā ghrāṇaṃ ca yogavit /
GP11brahmppu:29657: tata etāni saṃyamya manasi sthāpayed yadi // BrP_236.51 //
GP11brahmppu:29658: tathaivāpohya saṃkalpān mano hy ātmani dhārayet /
GP11brahmppu:29659: pañcendriyāṇi manasi hṛdi saṃsthāpayed yadi // BrP_236.52 //
GP11brahmppu:29661: prasīdanti ca saṃsthāyāṃ tadā brahma prakāśate // BrP_236.53 //
GP11brahmppu:29662: vidhūma iva dīptārcir āditya iva dīptimān /
GP11brahmppu:29663: vaidyuto 'gnir ivākāśe paśyanty ātmānam ātmani // BrP_236.54 //
GP11brahmppu:29664: sarvaṃ tatra tu sarvatra vyāpakatvāc ca dṛśyate /
GP11brahmppu:29665: taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_236.55 //
GP11brahmppu:29667: evaṃ parimitaṃ kālam ācaran saṃśitavrataḥ // BrP_236.56 //
GP11brahmppu:29668: āsīno hi rahasy eko gacched akṣarasāmyatām /
GP11brahmppu:29669: pramoho bhrama āvarto ghrāṇaṃ śravaṇadarśane // BrP_236.57 //
GP11brahmppu:29671: pratibhān upasargāś ca pratisaṃgṛhya yogataḥ // BrP_236.58 //
GP11brahmppu:29673: kuryāt paricayaṃ yoge trailokye niyato muniḥ // BrP_236.59 //
GP11brahmppu:29676: ekāgraṃ cintayen nityaṃ yogān nodvijate manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29677: yenopāyena śakyeta niyantuṃ cañcalaṃ manaḥ // BrP_236.61 //
GP11brahmppu:29678: tatra yukto niṣeveta na caiva vicalet tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29680: nātivrajet paraṃ vācā karmaṇā manasāpi vā /
GP11brahmppu:29682: yaś cainam abhinandeta yaś cainam abhivādayet /
GP11brahmppu:29683: samas tayoś cāpy ubhayor nābhidhyāyec chubhāśubham // BrP_236.64 //
GP11brahmppu:29684: na prahṛṣyeta lābheṣu nālābheṣu ca cintayet /
GP11brahmppu:29685: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sadharmā mātariśvanaḥ // BrP_236.65 //
GP11brahmppu:29689: evaṃ tu nirato mārgaṃ viramen na vimohitaḥ // BrP_236.67 //
GP11brahmppu:29690: api varṇāvakṛṣṭas tu nārī vā dharmakāṅkṣiṇī /
GP11brahmppu:29691: tāv apy etena mārgeṇa gacchetāṃ paramāṃ gatim // BrP_236.68 //
GP11brahmppu:29697: yady evaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca /
GP11brahmppu:29698: kāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti kāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇā // BrP_237.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29699: etad vai śrotum icchāmas tad bhavān prabravītu naḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29704: yāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti yāṃ gacchanti ca karmaṇā /
GP11brahmppu:29705: śṛṇudhvaṃ sāṃprataṃ viprā gahanaṃ hy etad uttaram // BrP_237.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29706: asti dharma iti yuktaṃ nāsti tatraiva yo vadet /
GP11brahmppu:29707: yakṣasya sādṛśyam idaṃ yakṣasyedaṃ bhaved atha // BrP_237.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29708: dvāv imāv atha panthānau yatra vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29709: pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo nivṛtto vā vibhāṣitaḥ // BrP_237.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29710: karmaṇā badhyate jantur vidyayā ca vimucyate /
GP11brahmppu:29711: tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāradarśinaḥ // BrP_237.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29713: vidyayā jāyate nityam avyaktaṃ hy akṣarātmakam // BrP_237.8 //
GP11brahmppu:29714: karma tv eke praśaṃsanti svalpabuddhiratā narāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29715: tena te dehajālena ramayanta upāsate // BrP_237.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29716: ye tu buddhiṃ parāṃ prāptā dharmanaipuṇyadarśinaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29717: na te karma praśaṃsanti kūpaṃ nadyāṃ pibann iva // BrP_237.10 //
GP11brahmppu:29719: vidyayā tad avāpnoti yatra gatvā na śocati // BrP_237.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29720: na mriyate yatra gatvā yatra gatvā na jāyate /
GP11brahmppu:29721: na jīryate yatra gatvā yatra gatvā na vardhate // BrP_237.12 //
GP11brahmppu:29722: yatra tad brahma paramam avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvam /
GP11brahmppu:29724: dvaṃdvair na yatra bādhyante mānasena ca karmaṇā /
GP11brahmppu:29725: samāḥ sarvatra maitrāś ca sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ // BrP_237.14 //
GP11brahmppu:29727: viprāś candrasamasparśaḥ sūkṣmayā kalayā sthitaḥ // BrP_237.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29729: na vaktuṃ śakyate draṣṭuṃ cakratantum ivāmbare // BrP_237.16 //
GP11brahmppu:29731: mūrtimān iti taṃ vidyād viprāḥ karmaguṇātmakam // BrP_237.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29732: devo yaḥ saṃśritas tasmin buddhīndur iva puṣkare /
GP11brahmppu:29733: kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīyān nityaṃ yogajitātmakam // BrP_237.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29734: tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca jñeyaṃ jīvaguṇātmakam /
GP11brahmppu:29735: jīvam ātmaguṇaṃ vidyād ātmānaṃ paramātmanaḥ // BrP_237.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29737: sa ceṣṭate jīvaguṇaṃ ca sarvam BrP_237.20b
GP11brahmppu:29741: prakṛtyās tu vikārā ye kṣetrajñās te pariśrutāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29742: te cainaṃ na prajānanti na jānāti sa tān api // BrP_237.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29743: taiś caiva kurute kāryaṃ manaḥṣaṣṭhair ihendriyaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29744: sudāntair iva saṃyantā dṛḍhaḥ paramavājibhiḥ // BrP_237.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29745: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29746: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ // BrP_237.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29748: amṛtān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ // BrP_237.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29749: evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhātmā na prakāśate /
GP11brahmppu:29750: dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ // BrP_237.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29752: indriyair indriyārthāṃś ca bahucittam acintayan // BrP_237.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29754: anīśvaraḥ praśāntātmā tato gacchet paraṃ padam // BrP_237.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29756: ātmanaḥ saṃpradānena martyo mṛtyum upāśnute // BrP_237.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29758: sattve cittaṃ samāveśya tataḥ kālañjaro bhavet // BrP_237.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29760: prasannātmātmani sthitvā sukham atyantam aśnute // BrP_237.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29761: lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya yathā svapne sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:29762: nirvāte vā yathā dīpo dīpyamāno na kampate // BrP_237.31 //
GP11brahmppu:29763: evaṃ pūrvāpare rātre yuñjann ātmānam ātmanā /
GP11brahmppu:29764: laghvāhāro viśuddhātmā paśyaty ātmānam ātmani // BrP_237.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29769: navanītaṃ yathā dadhnaḥ kāṣṭhād agnir yathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:29770: tathaiva viduṣāṃ jñānaṃ muktihetoḥ samuddhṛtam // BrP_237.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29772: tad idaṃ nāpraśāntāya nādāntāya tapasvine // BrP_237.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29778: rahasyadharmaṃ vaktavyaṃ nānyasmai tu kathaṃcana // BrP_237.39 //
GP11brahmppu:29779: yad apy asya mahīṃ dadyād ratnapūrṇām imāṃ naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29780: idam eva tataḥ śreya iti manyeta tattvavit // BrP_237.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29782: yat tan maharṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu ca gīyate // BrP_237.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29783: tad yuṣmabhyaṃ prayacchāmi yan māṃ pṛcchata sattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29784: yan me manasi varteta yas tu vo hṛdi saṃśayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29785: śrutaṃ bhavadbhis tat sarvaṃ kim anyat kathayāmi vaḥ // BrP_237.42 //
GP11brahmppu:29787: adhyātmaṃ vistareṇeha punar eva vadasva naḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29788: yad adhyātmaṃ yathā vidmo bhagavann ṛṣisattama // BrP_237.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29790: adhyātmaṃ yad idaṃ viprāḥ puruṣasyeha paṭhyate /
GP11brahmppu:29792: bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir vāyur ākāśam eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:29793: mahābhūtāni yaś caiva sarvabhūteṣu bhūtakṛt // BrP_237.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29795: ākāraṃ tu bhaved yasya yasmin dehaṃ na paśyati /
GP11brahmppu:29797: indriyāṇāṃ guṇāḥ kecit kathaṃ tān upalakṣayet // BrP_237.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29800: śṛṇudhvaṃ tad ihaikāgryā yathātattvaṃ yathā ca tat // BrP_237.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29801: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśalakṣaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:29802: prāṇaś ceṣṭā tathā sparśa ete vāyuguṇās trayaḥ // BrP_237.48 //
GP11brahmppu:29803: rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca tridhā jyotir vidhīyate /
GP11brahmppu:29804: raso 'tha rasanaṃ svedo guṇās tv ete trayo 'mbhasām // BrP_237.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29805: ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca bhūmer ete guṇās trayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29807: vāyoḥ sparśo raso 'dbhyaś ca jyotiṣo rūpam ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:29808: ākāśaprabhavaḥ śabdo gandho bhūmiguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_237.51 //
GP11brahmppu:29809: mano buddhiḥ svabhāvaś ca guṇā ete svayonijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29810: te guṇān ativartante guṇebhyaḥ paramā matāḥ // BrP_237.52 //
GP11brahmppu:29813: yad ūrdhvaṃ pādatalayor avārkordhvaṃ ca paśyati /
GP11brahmppu:29814: etasminn eva kṛtye sā vartate buddhir uttamā // BrP_237.54 //
GP11brahmppu:29815: guṇais tu nīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy api /
GP11brahmppu:29816: manaḥṣaṣṭhāni sarvāṇi buddhyā bhāvāt kuto guṇāḥ // BrP_237.55 //
GP11brahmppu:29817: indriyāṇi naraiḥ pañca ṣaṣṭhaṃ tan mana ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:29818: saptamīṃ buddhim evāhuḥ kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi cāṣṭamam // BrP_237.56 //
GP11brahmppu:29820: buddhir adhyavasānāya sākṣī kṣetrajña ucyate // BrP_237.57 //
GP11brahmppu:29821: rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca traya ete svayonijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29822: samāḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tān guṇān upalakṣayet // BrP_237.58 //
GP11brahmppu:29823: tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kiṃcid ātmani lakṣayet /
GP11brahmppu:29824: praśāntam iva saṃyuktaṃ sattvaṃ tad upadhārayet // BrP_237.59 //
GP11brahmppu:29825: yat tu saṃtāpasaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:29826: pravṛttaṃ raja ity evaṃ tatra cāpy upalakṣayet // BrP_237.60 //
GP11brahmppu:29827: yat tu saṃmohasaṃyuktam avyaktaṃ viṣamaṃ bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:29828: apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayet // BrP_237.61 //
GP11brahmppu:29830: akasmād yadi vā kasmād vadanti sāttvikān guṇān // BrP_237.62 //
GP11brahmppu:29832: liṅgāni rajasas tāni vartante hetutattvataḥ // BrP_237.63 //
GP11brahmppu:29833: tathā mohaḥ pramādaś ca tandrī nidrāprabodhitā /
GP11brahmppu:29834: kathaṃcid abhivartante vijñeyās tāmasā guṇāḥ // BrP_237.64 //
GP11brahmppu:29836: hṛdayaṃ priyam eveha trividhā karmacodanā // BrP_237.65 //
GP11brahmppu:29837: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29838: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā paraḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_237.66 //
GP11brahmppu:29840: yadā vikurute bhāvaṃ tadā bhavati sā manaḥ // BrP_237.67 //
GP11brahmppu:29841: indriyāṇāṃ pṛthagbhāvād buddhir vikurute hy anu /
GP11brahmppu:29842: śṛṇvatī bhavati śrotraṃ spṛśatī sparśa ucyate // BrP_237.68 //
GP11brahmppu:29843: paśyantī ca bhaved dṛṣṭī rasantī rasanā bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:29844: jighrantī bhavati ghrāṇaṃ buddhir vikurute pṛthak // BrP_237.69 //
GP11brahmppu:29845: indriyāṇi tu tāny āhus teṣāṃ vṛttyā vitiṣṭhati /
GP11brahmppu:29847: kadācil labhate prītiṃ kadācid api śocati /
GP11brahmppu:29848: na sukhena ca duḥkhena kadācid iha muhyate // BrP_237.71 //
GP11brahmppu:29849: svayaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān ativartate /
GP11brahmppu:29850: saritāṃ sāgaro bhartā mahāvelām ivormimān // BrP_237.72 //
GP11brahmppu:29851: yadā prārthayate kiṃcit tadā bhavati sā manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29852: adhiṣṭhāne ca vai buddhyā pṛthag etāni saṃsmaret // BrP_237.73 //
GP11brahmppu:29854: sarvāṇy evānupūrveṇa yad yadā ca vidhīyate // BrP_237.74 //
GP11brahmppu:29856: pravartamānas tu rajaḥ sattvam apy ativartate // BrP_237.75 //
GP11brahmppu:29857: ye vai bhāvena vartante sarveṣv eteṣu te triṣu /
GP11brahmppu:29858: anv arthān saṃpravartante rathanemim arā iva // BrP_237.76 //
GP11brahmppu:29861: evaṃsvabhāvam evedam iti buddhvā na muhyati /
GP11brahmppu:29862: aśocan saṃprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥ // BrP_237.78 //
GP11brahmppu:29863: na hy ātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyaiḥ kāmagocaraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29865: teṣāṃ tu manasā raśmīn yadā samyaṅ niyacchati /
GP11brahmppu:29866: tadā prakāśate śyātmā dīpadīptā yathākṛtiḥ // BrP_237.80 //
GP11brahmppu:29867: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ tamasy upagate yathā /
GP11brahmppu:29868: prakāśaṃ bhavate sarvaṃ tathaivam upadhāryatām // BrP_237.81 //
GP11brahmppu:29869: yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī na lipyati jale caran /
GP11brahmppu:29870: vimuktātmā tathā yogī guṇadoṣair na lipyate // BrP_237.82 //
GP11brahmppu:29871: evam eva kṛtaprajño na doṣair viṣayāṃś caran /
GP11brahmppu:29872: asajjamānaḥ sarveṣu na kathaṃcit pralipyate // BrP_237.83 //
GP11brahmppu:29873: tyaktvā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma ratir yasya sadātmani /
GP11brahmppu:29875: svayam ātmā prasavati guṇeṣv api kadācana /
GP11brahmppu:29876: na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ guṇān veda sa sarvadā // BrP_237.85 //
GP11brahmppu:29877: paridadhyād guṇānāṃ sa draṣṭā caiva yathātatham /
GP11brahmppu:29878: sattvakṣetrajñayor evam antaraṃ lakṣayen naraḥ // BrP_237.86 //
GP11brahmppu:29879: sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇān /
GP11brahmppu:29880: pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyaitau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadā // BrP_237.87 //
GP11brahmppu:29882: maśakodumbarau vāpi saṃprayuktau yathā saha // BrP_237.88 //
GP11brahmppu:29883: iṣikā vā yathā muñje pṛthak ca saha caiva ha /
GP11brahmppu:29884: tathaiva sahitāv etau anyonyasmin pratiṣṭhitau // BrP_237.89 //
GP11brahmppu:29886: sṛjate tu guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñas tv adhitiṣṭhati /
GP11brahmppu:29887: guṇān vikriyataḥ sarvān udāsīnavad īśvaraḥ // BrP_238.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29888: svabhāvayuktaṃ tat sarvaṃ yad imān sṛjate guṇān /
GP11brahmppu:29889: ūrṇanābhir yathā sūtraṃ sṛjate tad guṇāṃs tathā // BrP_238.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29891: evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttim iti cāpare // BrP_238.3 //
GP11brahmppu:29893: anenaiva vidhānena bhaved vai saṃśayo mahān // BrP_238.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29894: anādinidhano hy ātmā taṃ buddhvā viharen naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29895: akrudhyann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥ // BrP_238.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29896: ity evaṃ hṛdaye sarvo buddhicintāmayaṃ dṛḍham /
GP11brahmppu:29897: anityaṃ sukham āsīnam aśocyaṃ chinnasaṃśayaḥ // BrP_238.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29898: tarayet pracyutāṃ pṛthvīṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29899: avagāhya ca vidvāṃso viprā lolam imaṃ tathā // BrP_238.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29900: na tu tapyati vai vidvān sthale carati tattvavit /
GP11brahmppu:29901: evaṃ vicintya cātmānaṃ kevalaṃ jñānam ātmanaḥ // BrP_238.8 //
GP11brahmppu:29902: tāṃ tu buddhvā naraḥ sargaṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim /
GP11brahmppu:29903: samaceṣṭaś ca vai samyag labhate śamam uttamam // BrP_238.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29906: tattvaṃ buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:29908: na bhavati viduṣāṃ mahad bhayaṃ BrP_238.12a
GP11brahmppu:29909: yad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ paratra BrP_238.12b
GP11brahmppu:29911: bhavati hi yā viduṣaḥ sanātanī BrP_238.12d
GP11brahmppu:29914: tatra cet kuśalo na śocate BrP_238.13c
GP11brahmppu:29915: ye vidus tad ubhayaṃ kṛtākṛtam BrP_238.13d
GP11brahmppu:29917: tac ca nindayati yat purā kṛtam BrP_238.14b
GP11brahmppu:29918: yat priyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ na vāpriyaṃ BrP_238.14c
GP11brahmppu:29921: yasmād dharmāt paro dharmo vidyate neha kaścana /
GP11brahmppu:29922: yo viśiṣṭaś ca bhūtebhyas tad bhavān prabravītu naḥ // BrP_238.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29924: dharmaṃ ca saṃpravakṣyāmi purāṇam ṛṣibhiḥ stutam /
GP11brahmppu:29927: sarvataḥ prasṛtānīha pitā bālān ivātmajān // BrP_238.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29928: manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ cāpy aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29929: vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmebhyaḥ sa dharmaḥ para ucyate // BrP_238.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29931: ātmatṛptaḥ sa evāsīd bahucintyam acintayan // BrP_238.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29933: tadā caivātmanātmānaṃ paraṃ drakṣyatha śāśvatam // BrP_238.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29935: prapaśyanti mahātmānaṃ brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_238.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29937: ātmano nābhijānīte kva me puṣpaṃ kva me phalam // BrP_238.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29938: evam ātmā na jānīte kva gamiṣye kuto 'nv aham /
GP11brahmppu:29939: anyo hy asyāntarātmāsti yaḥ sarvam anupaśyati // BrP_238.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29941: dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ tathā yūyaṃ virāgā bhavata dvijāḥ // BrP_238.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29943: parāṃ buddhim avāpyehāpy acintā vigatajvarāḥ // BrP_238.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29949: prataradhvaṃ nadīṃ buddhyā dustarām akṛtātmabhiḥ // BrP_238.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29953: tāṃ tīrṇaḥ sarvato mukto vidhūtātmātmavāñ śuciḥ // BrP_238.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29957: akrudhyann aprasīdaṃś ca nanṛśaṃsamatis tathā // BrP_238.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29959: etad dhi sarvadharmebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ menire budhāḥ // BrP_238.33 //
GP11brahmppu:29961: ātmāno vyāpino viprā iti putrānuśāsanam // BrP_238.34 //
GP11brahmppu:29963: ātmajñānam idaṃ guhyaṃ sarvaguhyatamaṃ mahat // BrP_238.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29964: abravaṃ yad ahaṃ viprā ātmasākṣikam añjasā /
GP11brahmppu:29965: naiva strī na pumān evaṃ na caivedaṃ napuṃsakam // BrP_238.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29967: naitaj jñātvā pumān strī vā punarbhavam avāpnuyāt // BrP_238.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29968: yathā matāni sarvāṇi tathaitāni yathā tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29969: kathitāni mayā viprā bhavanti na bhavanti ca // BrP_238.38 //
GP11brahmppu:29973: brūyāt sutasyeha yad uktam etat BrP_238.39d
GP11brahmppu:29976: tam upāyaṃ yathānyāyaṃ śrotum icchāmahe mune // BrP_238.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29980: ghaṭopakaraṇe buddhir ghaṭotpattau na sā matā /
GP11brahmppu:29982: pūrve samudre yaḥ panthā na sa gacchati paścimam /
GP11brahmppu:29983: ekaḥ panthā hi mokṣasya tac chṛṇudhvaṃ mamānaghāḥ // BrP_238.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29985: sattvasaṃsevanād dhīro nidrām ucchettum arhati // BrP_238.44 //
GP11brahmppu:29986: apramādād bhayaṃ rakṣed rakṣet kṣetraṃ ca saṃvidam /
GP11brahmppu:29987: icchāṃ dveṣaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dhairyeṇa vinivartayet // BrP_238.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29988: nidrāṃ ca pratibhāṃ caiva jñānābhyāsena tattvavit /
GP11brahmppu:29990: lobhaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃtoṣād viṣayāṃs tattvadarśanāt /
GP11brahmppu:29991: anukrośād adharmaṃ ca jayed dharmam upekṣayā // BrP_238.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29992: āyatyā ca jayed āśāṃ sāmarthyaṃ saṅgavarjanāt /
GP11brahmppu:29993: anityatvena ca snehaṃ kṣudhāṃ yogena paṇḍitaḥ // BrP_238.48 //
GP11brahmppu:29995: utthānena jayet tandrāṃ vitarkaṃ niścayāj jayet // BrP_238.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29996: maunena bahubhāṣāṃ ca śauryeṇa ca bhayaṃ jayet /
GP11brahmppu:29997: yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā tāṃ yacchej jñānacakṣuṣā // BrP_238.50 //
GP11brahmppu:29998: jñānam ātmā mahān yacchet taṃ yacchec chāntir ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29999: tad etad upaśāntena boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇā // BrP_238.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30000: yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30001: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam // BrP_238.52 //
GP11brahmppu:30003: dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā // BrP_238.53 //
GP11brahmppu:30004: śaucam ācārataḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30005: etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānam upahanti ca // BrP_238.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30006: sidhyanti cāsya saṃkalpā vijñānaṃ ca pravartate /
GP11brahmppu:30007: dhūtapāpaḥ sa tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ // BrP_238.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30008: kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā nirviśed brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GP11brahmppu:30011: eṣa mārgo hi mokṣasya prasanno vimalaḥ śuciḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30014: sāṃkhyaṃ yogasya no vipra viśeṣaṃ vaktum arhasi /
GP11brahmppu:30015: tava dharmajña sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ munisattama // BrP_239.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30018: vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śreṣṭhaiḥ svapakṣodbhavanāya vai // BrP_239.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30019: anīśvaraḥ kathaṃ mucyed ity evaṃ munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30020: vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yogaṃ samyaṅ manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_239.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30021: vadanti kāraṇaṃ vedaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ samyag dvijātayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30022: vijñāyeha gatīḥ sarvā virakto viṣayeṣu yaḥ // BrP_239.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30023: ūrdhvaṃ sa dehāt suvyaktaṃ vimucyed iti nānyathā /
GP11brahmppu:30024: etad āhur mahāprājñāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ vai mokṣadarśanam // BrP_239.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30025: svapakṣe kāraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ samarthaṃ vacanaṃ hitam /
GP11brahmppu:30026: śiṣṭānāṃ hi mataṃ grāhyaṃ bhavadbhiḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataiḥ // BrP_239.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30028: ubhe caite mate tattve samavete dvijottamāḥ // BrP_239.7 //
GP11brahmppu:30029: ubhe caite mate jñāte munīndrāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmate /
GP11brahmppu:30030: anuṣṭhite yathāśāstraṃ nayetāṃ paramāṃ gatim // BrP_239.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30031: tulyaṃ śaucaṃ tayor yuktaṃ dayā bhūteṣu cānaghāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30032: vratānāṃ dhāraṇaṃ tulyaṃ darśanaṃ tv asamaṃ tayoḥ // BrP_239.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30034: yadi tulyaṃ vrataṃ śaucaṃ dayā cātra mahāmune /
GP11brahmppu:30035: tulyaṃ taddarśanaṃ kasmāt tan no brūhi dvijottama // BrP_239.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30037: rāgaṃ mohaṃ tathā snehaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca kevalam /
GP11brahmppu:30038: yogāsthiroditān doṣān pañcaitān prāpnuvanti tān // BrP_239.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30039: yathā vānimiṣāḥ sthūlaṃ jālaṃ chittvā punar jalam /
GP11brahmppu:30040: prāpnuvanti tathā yogāt tat padaṃ vītakalmaṣāḥ // BrP_239.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30041: tathaiva vāgurāṃ chittvā balavanto yathā mṛgāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30042: prāpnuyur vimalaṃ mārgaṃ vimuktāḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ // BrP_239.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30044: chittvā yogāt paraṃ mārgaṃ gacchanti vimalaṃ śubham // BrP_239.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30045: acalās tv āvilā viprā vāgurāsu tathāpare /
GP11brahmppu:30046: vinaśyanti na saṃdehas tadvad yogabalād ṛte // BrP_239.15 //
GP11brahmppu:30047: balahīnāś ca viprendrā yathā jālaṃ gatā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30048: bandhaṃ na gacchanty anaghā yogās te tu sudurlabhāḥ // BrP_239.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30049: yathā ca śakunāḥ sūkṣmaṃ prāpya jālam ariṃdamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30050: tatrāśaktā vipadyante mucyante tu balānvitāḥ // BrP_239.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30051: karmajair bandhanair baddhās tadvad yogaparā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30052: abalā na vimucyante mucyante ca balānvitāḥ // BrP_239.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30053: alpakaś ca yathā viprā vahniḥ śāmyati durbalaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30054: ākrānta indhanaiḥ sthūlais tadvad yogabalaḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_239.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30055: sa eva ca tadā viprā vahnir jātabalaḥ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30056: samīraṇagataḥ kṛtsnāṃ dahet kṣipraṃ mahīm imām // BrP_239.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30058: antakāla ivādityaḥ kṛtsnaṃ saṃśoṣayej jagat // BrP_239.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30059: durbalaś ca yathā viprāḥ srotasā hriyate naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30060: balahīnas tathā yogī viṣayair hriyate ca saḥ // BrP_239.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30061: tad eva tu yathā sroto viṣkambhayati vāraṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30062: tadvad yogabalaṃ labdhvā na bhaved viṣayair hṛtaḥ // BrP_239.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30063: viśanti vā vaśād vātha yogād yogabalānvitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30064: prajāpatīn manūn sarvān mahābhūtāni ceśvarāḥ // BrP_239.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30065: na yamo nāntakaḥ kruddho na mṛtyur bhīmavikramaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30066: viśante tad dvijāḥ sarve yogasyāmitatejasaḥ // BrP_239.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30068: yogaṃ kuryād balaṃ prāpya taiś ca sarvair mahīṃ caret // BrP_239.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30069: prāpnuyād viṣayān kaścit punaś cograṃ tapaś caret /
GP11brahmppu:30070: saṃkṣipyec ca punar viprāḥ sūryas tejoguṇān iva // BrP_239.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30074: nidarśanārthaṃ sūkṣmāṇi vakṣyāmi ca punar dvijāḥ // BrP_239.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30075: ātmanaś ca samādhāne dhāraṇāṃ prati vā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30077: apramatto yathā dhanvī lakṣyaṃ hanti samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30078: yuktaḥ samyak tathā yogī mokṣaṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam // BrP_239.31 //
GP11brahmppu:30079: snehapātre yathā pūrṇe mana ādhāya niścalam /
GP11brahmppu:30080: puruṣo yukta ārohet sopānaṃ yuktamānasaḥ // BrP_239.32 //
GP11brahmppu:30081: muktas tathāyam ātmānaṃ yogaṃ tadvat suniścalam /
GP11brahmppu:30083: yathā ca nāvaṃ viprendrāḥ karṇadhāraḥ samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30084: mahārṇavagatāṃ śīghraṃ nayed viprāṃs tu pattanam // BrP_239.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30086: durgamaṃ sthānam āpnoti hitvā deham imaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_239.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30087: sārathiś ca yathā yuktaḥ sadaśvān susamāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30088: deśam iṣṭaṃ nayaty āśu dhanvinaṃ puruṣarṣabham // BrP_239.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30089: tathaiva ca dvijā yogī dhāraṇāsu samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30090: prāpnoty āśu paraṃ sthānaṃ lakṣyamukta ivāśugaḥ // BrP_239.37 //
GP11brahmppu:30092: pāśaṃ hatveva mīnānāṃ padam āpnoti so 'jaram // BrP_239.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30093: nābhyāṃ śīrṣe ca kukṣau ca hṛdi vakṣasi pārśvayoḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30094: darśane śravaṇe vāpi ghrāṇe cāmitavikramaḥ // BrP_239.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30096: ātmanā sūkṣmam ātmānaṃ yuṅkte samyag dvijottamāḥ // BrP_239.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30098: uttamaṃ yogam āsthāya yadīcchati vimucyate // BrP_239.41 //
GP11brahmppu:30100: āhārān kīdṛśān kṛtvā kāni jitvā ca sattama /
GP11brahmppu:30101: yogī balam avāpnoti tad bhavān vaktum arhati // BrP_239.42 //
GP11brahmppu:30103: kaṇānāṃ bhakṣaṇe yuktaḥ piṇyākasya ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30104: snehānāṃ varjane yukto yogī balam avāpnuyāt // BrP_239.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30106: ekāhārī viśuddhātmā yogī balam avāpnuyāt // BrP_239.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30107: pakṣān māsān ṛtūṃś citrān saṃcaraṃś ca guhās tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30108: apaḥ pītvā payomiśrā yogī balam avāpnuyāt // BrP_239.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30109: akhaṇḍam api vā māsaṃ satataṃ munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30110: upoṣya samyak śuddhātmā yogī balam avāpnuyāt // BrP_239.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30111: kāmaṃ jitvā tathā krodhaṃ śītoṣṇaṃ varṣam eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30112: bhayaṃ śokaṃ tathā svāpaṃ pauruṣān viṣayāṃs tathā // BrP_239.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30113: aratiṃ durjayāṃ caiva ghorāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30114: sparśaṃ nidrāṃ tathā tandrāṃ durjayāṃ munisattamāḥ // BrP_239.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30117: durgas tv eṣa mataḥ panthā brāhmaṇānāṃ vipaścitām /
GP11brahmppu:30118: yaḥ kaścid vrajati kṣipraṃ kṣemeṇa munipuṃgavāḥ // BrP_239.50 //
GP11brahmppu:30120: śvabhravat toyahīnaṃ ca durgamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam // BrP_239.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30123: yogamārgaṃ samāsādya yaḥ kaścid vrajate dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30126: dhāraṇā sā tu yogasya durgeyam akṛtātmabhiḥ // BrP_239.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30127: viṣamā dhāraṇā viprā yānti vai na śubhāṃ gatim /
GP11brahmppu:30128: netṛhīnā yathā nāvaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ tu vai dvijāḥ // BrP_239.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30129: yas tu tiṣṭhati yogādhau dhāraṇāsu yathāvidhi /
GP11brahmppu:30130: maraṇaṃ janmaduḥkhitvaṃ sukhitvaṃ sa viśiṣyate // BrP_239.56 //
GP11brahmppu:30132: paraṃ yogasya panthānaṃ niścitaṃ taṃ dvijātiṣu // BrP_239.57 //
GP11brahmppu:30133: paraṃ hi tad brahmamayaṃ munīndrā BrP_239.58a
GP11brahmppu:30134: brahmāṇam īśaṃ varadaṃ ca viṣṇum BrP_239.58b
GP11brahmppu:30135: bhavaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca mahānubhāvaṃ BrP_239.58c
GP11brahmppu:30137: tamaś ca kaṣṭaṃ sumahad rajaś ca BrP_239.59a
GP11brahmppu:30138: sattvaṃ ca śuddhaṃ prakṛtiṃ parāṃ ca BrP_239.59b
GP11brahmppu:30139: siddhiṃ ca devīṃ varuṇasya patnīṃ BrP_239.59c
GP11brahmppu:30140: tejaś ca kṛtsnaṃ sumahac ca dhairyam BrP_239.59d
GP11brahmppu:30142: viśvāṃś ca devān uragān pitṝṃś ca BrP_239.60b
GP11brahmppu:30143: śailāṃś ca kṛtsnān udadhīṃś ca vācalān BrP_239.60c
GP11brahmppu:30144: nadīś ca sarvāḥ sanagāṃś ca nāgān BrP_239.60d
GP11brahmppu:30145: sādhyāṃs tathā yakṣagaṇān diśaś ca BrP_239.61a
GP11brahmppu:30149: kathā ca yā vipravarāḥ prasaktā BrP_239.62a
GP11brahmppu:30151: yogān sa sarvān anubhūya martyā BrP_239.62c
GP11brahmppu:30156: sāṃkhye tv idānīṃ dharmasya vidhiṃ prabrūhi tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30157: triṣu lokeṣu yaj jñānaṃ sarvaṃ tad viditaṃ hi te // BrP_240.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30160: vihitaṃ yatibhir vṛddhaiḥ kapilādibhir īśvaraiḥ // BrP_240.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30162: guṇāś ca yasmin bahavo doṣahāniś ca kevalā // BrP_240.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30164: mānuṣān durjayān kṛtsnān paiśācān viṣayāṃs tathā // BrP_240.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30166: pitṝṇāṃ viṣayāñ jñātvā tiryaktvaṃ caratāṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_240.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30169: āsurān viṣayāñ jñātvā vaiśvadevāṃs tathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30170: devarṣiviṣayāñ jñātvā yogānām api vai parān // BrP_240.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30171: viṣayāṃś ca pramāṇasya brahmaṇo viṣayāṃs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30172: āyuṣaś ca paraṃ kālaṃ lokair vijñāya tattvataḥ // BrP_240.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30173: sukhasya ca paraṃ kālaṃ vijñāya munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30174: prāptakāle ca yad duḥkhaṃ patatāṃ viṣayaiṣiṇām // BrP_240.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30175: tiryaktve patatāṃ viprās tathaiva narakeṣu yat /
GP11brahmppu:30176: svargasya ca guṇāñ jñātvā doṣān sarvāṃś ca bho dvijāḥ // BrP_240.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30177: vedavāde ca ye doṣā guṇā ye cāpi vaidikāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30178: jñānayoge ca ye doṣā jñānayoge ca ye guṇāḥ // BrP_240.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30179: sāṃkhyajñāne ca ye doṣāṃs tathaiva ca guṇā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30180: sattvaṃ daśaguṇaṃ jñātvā rajo navaguṇaṃ tathā // BrP_240.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30181: tamaś cāṣṭaguṇaṃ jñātvā buddhiṃ saptaguṇāṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30182: ṣaḍguṇaṃ ca nabho jñātvā tamaś ca triguṇaṃ mahat // BrP_240.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30183: dviguṇaṃ ca rajo jñātvā sattvaṃ caikaguṇaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30184: mārgaṃ vijñāya tattvena pralayaprekṣaṇena tu // BrP_240.15 //
GP11brahmppu:30186: prāpnuvanti śubhaṃ mokṣaṃ sūkṣmā iva nabhaḥ param // BrP_240.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30187: rūpeṇa dṛṣṭiṃ saṃyuktāṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhaguṇena ca /
GP11brahmppu:30188: śabdagrāhyaṃ tathā śrotraṃ jihvāṃ rasaguṇena ca // BrP_240.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30189: tvacaṃ sparśaṃ tathā śakyaṃ vāyuṃ caiva tadāśritam /
GP11brahmppu:30190: mohaṃ tamasi saṃyuktaṃ lobhaṃ moheṣu saṃśritam // BrP_240.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30191: viṣṇuṃ krānte bale śakraṃ koṣṭhe saktaṃ tathānalam /
GP11brahmppu:30192: apsu devīṃ samāyuktām āpas tejasi saṃśritāḥ // BrP_240.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30193: tejo vāyau tu saṃyuktaṃ vāyuṃ nabhasi cāśritam /
GP11brahmppu:30194: nabho mahati saṃyuktaṃ tamo mahasi saṃsthitam // BrP_240.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30195: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tathā saktaṃ sattvaṃ saktaṃ tathātmani /
GP11brahmppu:30196: saktam ātmānam īśe ca deve nārāyaṇe tathā // BrP_240.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30197: devaṃ mokṣe ca saṃyuktaṃ tato mokṣaṃ ca na kvacit /
GP11brahmppu:30198: jñātvā sattvaguṇaṃ dehaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ // BrP_240.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30200: madhyastham iva cātmānaṃ pāpaṃ yasmin na vidyate // BrP_240.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30201: dvitīyaṃ karma vai jñātvā viprendrā viṣayaiṣiṇām /
GP11brahmppu:30202: indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃś ca sarvān ātmani saṃśritān // BrP_240.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30204: prāṇāpānau samānaṃ ca vyānodānau ca tattvataḥ // BrP_240.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30205: ādyaṃ caivānilaṃ jñātvā prabhavaṃ cānilaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30206: saptadhā tāṃs tathā śeṣān saptadhā vidhivat punaḥ // BrP_240.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30207: prajāpatīn ṛṣīṃś caiva sargāṃś ca subahūn varān /
GP11brahmppu:30208: saptarṣīṃś ca bahūñ jñātvā rājarṣīṃś ca paraṃtapān // BrP_240.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30210: aiśvaryāc cyāvitān dṛṣṭvā kālena mahatā dvijāḥ // BrP_240.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30211: mahatāṃ bhūtasaṃghānāṃ śrutvā nāśaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30212: gatiṃ vācāṃ śubhāṃ jñātvā arcārhāḥ pāpakarmaṇām // BrP_240.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30213: vaitaraṇyāṃ ca yad duḥkhaṃ patitānāṃ yamakṣaye /
GP11brahmppu:30214: yoniṣu ca vicitrāsu saṃcārān aśubhāṃs tathā // BrP_240.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30219: vijñāya hitam ātmānaṃ yogāṃś ca vividhān dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30222: garhitaṃ mahatām arthe sāṃkhyānāṃ viditātmanām // BrP_240.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30223: upaplavāṃs tathā ghorāñ śaśinas tejasas tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30224: tārāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca paryayam // BrP_240.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30225: dvaṃdvānāṃ viprayogaṃ ca vijñāya kṛpaṇaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30226: anyonyabhakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūtānām api cāśubham // BrP_240.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30227: bālye mohaṃ ca vijñāya pakṣadehasya cāśubham /
GP11brahmppu:30228: rāgaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃprāptaṃ kvacit sattvaṃ samāśritam // BrP_240.37 //
GP11brahmppu:30230: durlabhatvaṃ ca mokṣasya vijñānaṃ śrutipūrvakam // BrP_240.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30232: viṣayāṇāṃ ca daurātmyaṃ vijñāya ca punar dvijāḥ // BrP_240.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30233: gatāsūnāṃ ca sattvānāṃ dehān bhittvā tathā śubhān /
GP11brahmppu:30234: vāsaṃ kuleṣu jantūnāṃ maraṇāya dhṛtātmanām // BrP_240.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30235: sāttvikānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ duḥkhaṃ vijñāya bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30236: brahmaghnānāṃ gatiṃ jñātvā patitānāṃ sudāruṇām // BrP_240.41 //
GP11brahmppu:30239: jananīṣu ca vartante yena samyag dvijottamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30240: sadevakeṣu lokeṣu yena vartanti mānavāḥ // BrP_240.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30242: tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca vijñāya ca gatīḥ pṛthak // BrP_240.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30243: vedavādāṃs tathā citrān ṛtūnāṃ paryayāṃs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30244: kṣayaṃ saṃvatsarāṇāṃ ca māsānāṃ ca kṣayaṃ tathā // BrP_240.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30245: pakṣakṣayaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā divasānāṃ ca saṃkṣayam /
GP11brahmppu:30246: kṣayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca candrasya dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣatas tathā // BrP_240.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30247: vṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā samudrāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ teṣāṃ tathā punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30248: kṣayaṃ dhanānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar vṛddhiṃ tathaiva ca // BrP_240.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30249: saṃyogānāṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā yugānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30250: dehavaiklavyatāṃ caiva samyag vijñāya tattvataḥ // BrP_240.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30251: ātmadoṣāṃś ca vijñāya sarvān ātmani saṃsthitān /
GP11brahmppu:30252: svadehād utthitān gandhāṃs tathā vijñāya cāśubhān // BrP_240.49 //
GP11brahmppu:30255: etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ // BrP_240.50 //
GP11brahmppu:30257: pañca doṣān dvijā dehe pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30258: mārgajñāḥ kāpilāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ munisattamāḥ // BrP_240.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30259: kāmakrodhau bhayaṃ nidrā pañcamaḥ śvāsa ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:30260: ete doṣāḥ śarīreṣu dṛśyante sarvadehinām // BrP_240.52 //
GP11brahmppu:30262: sattvasaṃsevanān nidrām apramādād bhayaṃ tathā // BrP_240.53 //
GP11brahmppu:30264: guṇān guṇaśatair jñātvā doṣān doṣaśatair api // BrP_240.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30265: hetūn hetuśataiś citraiś citrān vijñāya tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30266: apāṃ phenopamaṃ lokaṃ viṣṇor māyāśataiḥ kṛtam // BrP_240.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30270: rajas tamasi saṃmagnaṃ paṅke dvipam ivāvaśam // BrP_240.57 //
GP11brahmppu:30271: sāṃkhyā viprā mahāprājñās tyaktvā snehaṃ prajākṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:30272: jñānajñeyena sāṃkhyena vyāpinā mahatā dvijāḥ // BrP_240.58 //
GP11brahmppu:30273: rājasān aśubhān gandhāṃs tāmasāṃś ca tathāvidhān /
GP11brahmppu:30274: puṇyāṃś ca sāttvikān gandhān sparśajān dehasaṃśritān // BrP_240.59 //
GP11brahmppu:30278: tamaḥkūrmaṃ rajomīnaṃ prajñayā saṃtaranty uta // BrP_240.61 //
GP11brahmppu:30292: taranti yatayaḥ siddhā jñānayogena cānaghāḥ // BrP_240.68 //
GP11brahmppu:30293: tīrtvā ca dustaraṃ janma viśanti vimalaṃ nabhaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30294: tatas tān sukṛtīñ jñātvā sūryo vahati raśmibhiḥ // BrP_240.69 //
GP11brahmppu:30296: tatra tān pravaho vāyuḥ pratigṛhṇāti cānaghāḥ // BrP_240.70 //
GP11brahmppu:30298: sūkṣmaḥ śītaḥ sugandhaś ca sukhasparśaś ca bho dvijāḥ // BrP_240.71 //
GP11brahmppu:30299: saptānāṃ marutāṃ śreṣṭho lokān gacchati yaḥ śubhān /
GP11brahmppu:30300: sa tān vahati viprendrā nabhasaḥ paramāṃ gatim // BrP_240.72 //
GP11brahmppu:30301: nabho vahati lokeśān rajasaḥ paramāṃ gatim /
GP11brahmppu:30302: rajo vahati viprendrāḥ sattvasya paramāṃ gatim // BrP_240.73 //
GP11brahmppu:30303: sattvaṃ vahati śuddhātmā paraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
GP11brahmppu:30304: prabhur vahati śuddhātmā paramātmānam ātmanā // BrP_240.74 //
GP11brahmppu:30306: amṛtatvāya kalpante na nivartanti ca dvijāḥ // BrP_240.75 //
GP11brahmppu:30307: paramā sā gatir viprā nirdvaṃdvānāṃ mahātmanām /
GP11brahmppu:30311: ājanmamaraṇaṃ vā te ramante tatra vā na vā // BrP_240.77 //
GP11brahmppu:30312: yad atra tathyaṃ tattvaṃ no yathāvad vaktum arhasi /
GP11brahmppu:30313: tvadṛte mānavaṃ nānyaṃ praṣṭum arhāma sattama // BrP_240.78 //
GP11brahmppu:30314: mokṣadoṣo mahān eṣa prāpya siddhiṃ gatān ṛṣīn /
GP11brahmppu:30315: yadi tatraiva vijñāne vartante yatayaḥ pare // BrP_240.79 //
GP11brahmppu:30317: magnasya hi pare jñāne kiṃtu duḥkhāntaraṃ bhavet // BrP_240.80 //
GP11brahmppu:30319: yathānyāyaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ praśnaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca saṃkaṭaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30320: budhānām api saṃmohaḥ praśne 'smin munisattamāḥ // BrP_240.81 //
GP11brahmppu:30321: atrāpi tattvaṃ paramaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ vacanaṃ mama /
GP11brahmppu:30322: buddhiś ca paramā yatra kapilānāṃ mahātmanām // BrP_240.82 //
GP11brahmppu:30323: indriyāṇy api budhyante svadehaṃ dehināṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30324: karaṇāny ātmanas tāni sūkṣmaṃ paśyanti tais tu saḥ // BrP_240.83 //
GP11brahmppu:30326: vinaśyanti na saṃdeho velā iva mahārṇave // BrP_240.84 //
GP11brahmppu:30328: sūkṣmaś carati sarvatra nabhasīva samīraṇaḥ // BrP_240.85 //
GP11brahmppu:30329: sa paśyati yathānyāyaṃ smṛtvā spṛśati cānaghāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30330: budhyamāno yathāpūrvam akhileneha bho dvijāḥ // BrP_240.86 //
GP11brahmppu:30331: indriyāṇi ha sarvāṇi sve sve sthāne yathāvidhi /
GP11brahmppu:30332: anīśatvāt pralīyante sarpā viṣahatā iva // BrP_240.87 //
GP11brahmppu:30333: indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ svasthāneṣv eva sarvaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30334: ākramya gatayaḥ sūkṣmā varaty ātmā na saṃśayaḥ // BrP_240.88 //
GP11brahmppu:30335: sattvasya ca guṇān kṛtsnān rajasaś ca guṇān punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30336: guṇāṃś ca tamasaḥ sarvān guṇān buddheś ca sattamāḥ // BrP_240.89 //
GP11brahmppu:30337: guṇāṃś ca manasaś cāpi nabhasaś ca guṇāṃs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30338: guṇān vāyoś ca sarvajñāḥ snehajāṃś ca guṇān punaḥ // BrP_240.90 //
GP11brahmppu:30339: apāṃ guṇās tathā viprāḥ pārthivāṃś ca guṇān api /
GP11brahmppu:30340: sarvān eva guṇair vyāpya kṣetrajñeṣu dvijottamāḥ // BrP_240.91 //
GP11brahmppu:30341: ātmā carati kṣetrajñaḥ karmaṇā ca śubhāśubhe /
GP11brahmppu:30342: śiṣyā iva mahātmānam indriyāṇi ca taṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_240.92 //
GP11brahmppu:30343: prakṛtiṃ cāpy atikramya śuddhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ parāt param /
GP11brahmppu:30344: nārāyaṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ nirvikāraṃ parāt param // BrP_240.93 //
GP11brahmppu:30345: vimuktaṃ sarvapāpebhyaḥ praviṣṭaṃ ca hy anāmayam /
GP11brahmppu:30346: paramātmānam aguṇaṃ nirvṛtaṃ taṃ ca sattamāḥ // BrP_240.94 //
GP11brahmppu:30347: śreṣṭhaṃ tatra mano viprā indriyāṇi ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30349: śakyaṃ vālpena kālena śāntiṃ prāptuṃ guṇāṃs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30350: evam uktena viprendrāḥ sāṃkhyayogena mokṣiṇīm // BrP_240.96 //
GP11brahmppu:30351: sāṃkhyā viprā mahāprājñā gacchanti paramāṃ gatim /
GP11brahmppu:30352: jñānenānena viprendrās tulyaṃ jñānaṃ na vidyate // BrP_240.97 //
GP11brahmppu:30353: atra vaḥ saṃśayo mā bhūj jñānaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ paraṃ matam /
GP11brahmppu:30354: akṣaraṃ dhruvam evoktaṃ pūrvaṃ brahma sanātanam // BrP_240.98 //
GP11brahmppu:30356: kūṭasthaṃ caiva nityaṃ ca yad vadanti śamātmakāḥ // BrP_240.99 //
GP11brahmppu:30358: evaṃ śaṃsanti śāstreṣu pravaktāro maharṣayaḥ // BrP_240.100 //
GP11brahmppu:30359: sarve viprāś ca vedāś ca tathā sāmavido janāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30360: brahmaṇyaṃ paramaṃ devam anantaṃ paramācyutam // BrP_240.101 //
GP11brahmppu:30361: prārthayantaś ca taṃ viprā vadanti guṇabuddhayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30362: samyag uktās tathā yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś cāmitadarśanāḥ // BrP_240.102 //
GP11brahmppu:30363: amūrtis tasya viprendrāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ mūrtir iti śrutiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30367: jñānaṃ mahad vai mahataś ca viprā BrP_240.105a
GP11brahmppu:30369: yac cāpi dṛṣṭaṃ vidhivat purāṇe BrP_240.105c
GP11brahmppu:30373: jñānaṃ ca loke yad ihāsti kiṃcit BrP_240.106c
GP11brahmppu:30376: jñānaṃ ca mokṣaś ca yathāvad uktam BrP_240.107b
GP11brahmppu:30377: tapāṃsi sūkṣmāṇi ca yāni caiva BrP_240.107c
GP11brahmppu:30381: tāṃś cāpi saṃdhārya tataḥ kṛtārthāḥ BrP_240.108c
GP11brahmppu:30383: hitvā ca dehaṃ praviśanti mokṣaṃ BrP_240.109a
GP11brahmppu:30386: sāṃkhye dvijā bho iha śiṣṭajuṣṭe BrP_240.109d
GP11brahmppu:30387: teṣāṃ tu tiryaggamanaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ BrP_240.110a
GP11brahmppu:30389: na vā pradhānā api te dvijātayo BrP_240.110c
GP11brahmppu:30390: ye jñānam etan munayo na saktāḥ BrP_240.110d
GP11brahmppu:30393: kṛtsnaṃ hi sāṃkhyā munayo mahātma BrP_240.111c
GP11brahmppu:30395: etan mayoktaṃ paramaṃ hi tattvaṃ BrP_240.112a
GP11brahmppu:30397: sa sargakāle ca karoti sargaṃ BrP_240.112c
GP11brahmppu:30400: kiṃ tad akṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30401: kiṃsvit tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmād āvartate punaḥ // BrP_241.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30404: tvaṃ hi jñānavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ procyase vedapāragaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30405: ṛṣibhiś ca mahābhāgair yatibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ // BrP_241.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30406: tad etac chrotum icchāmas tvattaḥ sarvaṃ mahāmate /
GP11brahmppu:30407: na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ śṛṇvanto 'mṛtam uttamam // BrP_241.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30410: vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃvādaṃ karālajanakasya ca // BrP_241.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30412: papraccha janako rājā jñānaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ param // BrP_241.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30415: svacchandaṃ sukṛtaṃ caiva madhuraṃ cāpy anulbaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:30418: bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi paraṃ brahma sanātanam /
GP11brahmppu:30419: yasmin na punarāvṛttiṃ prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_241.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30420: yac ca tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yatredaṃ kṣarate jagat /
GP11brahmppu:30421: yac cākṣaram iti proktaṃ śivaṃ kṣemam anāmayam // BrP_241.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30424: yatra kṣarati pūrveṇa yāvatkālena cāpy atha // BrP_241.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30426: daśakalpaśatāvartam ahas tad brāhmam ucyate // BrP_241.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30428: sṛjaty anantakarmāṇi mahāntaṃ bhūtam agrajam // BrP_241.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30431: aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśānaṃ jyotir avyayam /
GP11brahmppu:30434: hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān eṣa buddhir iti smṛtiḥ // BrP_241.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30435: mahān iti ca yogeṣu viriñcir iti cāpy atha /
GP11brahmppu:30436: sāṃkhye ca paṭhyate śāstre nāmabhir bahudhātmakaḥ // BrP_241.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30438: dhṛtam ekātmakaṃ yena kṛtsnaṃ trailokyam ātmanā // BrP_241.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30440: eṣa vai vikriyāpannaḥ sṛjaty ātmānam ātmanā // BrP_241.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30441: pradhānaṃ tasya saṃyogād utpannaṃ sumahat puram /
GP11brahmppu:30443: avyaktād vyaktim āpannaṃ vidyāsargaṃ vadanti tam /
GP11brahmppu:30444: mahāntaṃ cāpy ahaṃkāram avidyāsarga eva ca // BrP_241.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30445: acaraś ca caraś caiva samutpannau tathaikataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30448: ahaṃkāreṣu nṛpate caturthaṃ viddhi vaikṛtam // BrP_241.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30449: vāyur jyotir athākāśam āpo 'tha pṛthivī tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30450: śabdasparśau ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca // BrP_241.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30452: pañcamaṃ viddhi rājendra bhautikaṃ sargam arthakṛt // BrP_241.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30453: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇam eva ca pañcamam /
GP11brahmppu:30454: vāg hastau caiva pādau ca pāyur meḍhraṃ tathaiva ca // BrP_241.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30456: saṃbhūtānīha yugapan manasā saha pārthiva // BrP_241.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30458: yāṃ jñātvā nābhiśocanti brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥ // BrP_241.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30459: evam etat samutpannaṃ trailokyam idam uttamam /
GP11brahmppu:30464: śuni śvapāke caiṇeye sacāṇḍāle sapulkase // BrP_241.31 //
GP11brahmppu:30466: yā ca mūrtiś ca yat kiṃcit sarvatraitan nidarśanam // BrP_241.32 //
GP11brahmppu:30468: sthānaṃ dehavatām āsīd ity evam anuśuśruma // BrP_241.33 //
GP11brahmppu:30470: ahany ahani bhūtātmā yac cākṣara iti smṛtam // BrP_241.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30471: tatas tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ kṣaratīdaṃ yathā jagat /
GP11brahmppu:30472: jagan mohātmakaṃ cāhur avyaktād vyaktasaṃjñakam // BrP_241.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30474: kathitaṃ te mahārāja yasmān nāvartate punaḥ // BrP_241.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30476: sattvasaṃśrayaṇāt tattvaṃ sattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_241.37 //
GP11brahmppu:30477: yad amūrtiḥ sṛjad vyaktaṃ tan mūrtim adhitiṣṭhati /
GP11brahmppu:30478: caturviṃśatimo vyakto hy amūrtiḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ // BrP_241.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30479: sa eva hṛdi sarvāsu mūrtiṣv ātiṣṭhatātmavān /
GP11brahmppu:30480: cetayaṃś cetano nityaṃ sarvamūrtir amūrtimān // BrP_241.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30482: gocare vartate nityaṃ nirguṇo guṇasaṃjñitaḥ // BrP_241.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30488: yo 'haṃ na so 'ham ity ukto guṇān evānuvartate // BrP_241.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30490: rajasā rājasāṃś caiva sāttvikān sattvasaṃśrayāt // BrP_241.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30492: sarvāṇy etāni rūpāṇi jānīhi prākṛtāni tu // BrP_241.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30493: tāmasā nirayaṃ yānti rājasā mānuṣān atha /
GP11brahmppu:30498: pañcaviṃśatimo yo 'yaṃ jñānād eva pravartate // BrP_241.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30501: dehād dehasahasrāṇi tathā ca na sa bhidyate // BrP_242.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30503: utpadyati tapoyogād guṇaiḥ saha guṇakṣayāt // BrP_242.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30504: manuṣyatvād divaṃ yāti devo mānuṣyam eti ca /
GP11brahmppu:30507: sūtratantuguṇair nityaṃ tathāyam aguṇo guṇaiḥ // BrP_242.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30508: dvaṃdvam eti ca nirdvaṃdvas tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu /
GP11brahmppu:30515: ekavāsāś caturvāsāḥ śāyī nityam adhas tathā // BrP_242.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30517: vīram āsanam ākāśe tathā śayanam eva ca // BrP_242.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30521: vividhāsu ca śayyāsu phalagṛhyānvitāsu ca // BrP_242.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30525: phalakaṃ paridhānaś ca tathā kaṭakavastradhṛk // BrP_242.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30527: vastrāṇi cānyāni bahūny abhimatya ca buddhimān // BrP_242.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30535: śaivālabhojanaś caiva tathā cānyena vartayan // BrP_242.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30537: vividhāni ca kṛcchrāṇi sevate siddhikāṅkṣayā // BrP_242.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30540: upāśrayān apy aparān pākhaṇḍān vividhān api /
GP11brahmppu:30541: viviktāś ca śilāchāyās tathā prasravaṇāni ca // BrP_242.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30543: kānaneṣu viviktāś ca śailānāṃ mahatīr guhāḥ // BrP_242.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30544: niyamān vividhāṃś cāpi vividhāni tapāṃsi ca /
GP11brahmppu:30545: yajñāṃś ca vividhākārān vidyāś ca vividhās tathā // BrP_242.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30549: sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva dharmārthau kāma eva ca // BrP_242.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30553: yājanādhyāpane caiva tathānyad api kiṃcana // BrP_242.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30555: śubhāśubhabhayaṃ sarvam etad āhuḥ sanātanam // BrP_242.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30556: prakṛtiḥ kurute devī bhayaṃ pralayam eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30559: evam evaiṣa tat sarvaṃ krīḍārtham abhimanyate // BrP_242.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30563: kriyākriyāpathopetas tathā tad iti manyate // BrP_242.32 //
GP11brahmppu:30564: prakṛtyā sarvam evedaṃ jagad andhīkṛtaṃ vibho /
GP11brahmppu:30565: rajasā tamasā caiva vyāptaṃ sarvam anekadhā // BrP_242.33 //
GP11brahmppu:30566: evaṃ dvaṃdvāny atītāni mama vartanti nityaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30567: matta etāni jāyante pralaye yānti mām api // BrP_242.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30569: manyate pakṣabuddhitvāt tathaiva sukṛtāny api // BrP_242.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30572: sukham evaṃ tu kartavyaṃ sakṛt kṛtvā sukhaṃ mama /
GP11brahmppu:30573: yāvad eva tu me saukhyaṃ jātyāṃ jātyāṃ bhaviṣyati // BrP_242.37 //
GP11brahmppu:30574: bhaviṣyati na me duḥkhaṃ kṛtenehāpy anantakam /
GP11brahmppu:30575: sukhaduḥkhaṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ niraye cāpi majjanam // BrP_242.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30576: nirayāc cāpi mānuṣyaṃ kālenaiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30577: manuṣyatvāc ca devatvaṃ devatvāt pauruṣaṃ punaḥ // BrP_242.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30579: eṣa evaṃ dvijātīnām ātmā vai sa guṇair vṛtaḥ // BrP_242.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30583: ya evaṃ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakam // BrP_242.42 //
GP11brahmppu:30584: sa evaṃ phalam āpnoti triṣu lokeṣu mūrtimān /
GP11brahmppu:30586: prakṛtiś ca tathāpnoti triṣu lokeṣu kāmagā /
GP11brahmppu:30588: trīṇi sthānāni caitāni jānīyāt prākṛtāni ha /
GP11brahmppu:30589: aliṅgaprakṛtitvāc ca liṅgair apy anumīyate // BrP_242.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30590: tathaiva pauruṣaṃ liṅgam anumānād dhi manyate /
GP11brahmppu:30591: sa liṅgāntaram āsādya prākṛtaṃ liṅgam avraṇam // BrP_242.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30593: śrotrādīni tu sarvāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇy atha // BrP_242.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30594: rāgādīni pravartante guṇeṣv iha guṇaiḥ saha /
GP11brahmppu:30595: aham etāni vai kurvan mamaitānīndriyāṇi ha // BrP_242.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30596: nirindriyo hi manyeta vraṇavān asmi nirvraṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30597: aliṅgo liṅgam ātmānam akālaṃ kālam ātmanaḥ // BrP_242.49 //
GP11brahmppu:30598: asattvaṃ sattvam ātmānam amṛtaṃ mṛtam ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30599: amṛtyuṃ mṛtyum ātmānam acaraṃ caram ātmanaḥ // BrP_242.50 //
GP11brahmppu:30600: akṣetraṃ kṣetram ātmānam asaṅgaṃ saṅgam ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30601: atattvaṃ tattvam ātmānam abhavaṃ bhavam ātmanaḥ // BrP_242.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30602: akṣaraṃ kṣaram ātmānam abuddhatvād dhi manyate /
GP11brahmppu:30607: candramā iva kośānāṃ punas tatra sahasraśaḥ // BrP_242.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30609: kalā pañcadaśī yonis tad dhāma iti paṭhyate // BrP_242.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30610: nityam eva vijānīhi somaṃ vai ṣoḍaśāṃśakaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30611: kalayā jāyate 'jasraṃ punaḥ punar abuddhimān // BrP_242.56 //
GP11brahmppu:30612: dhīmāṃś cāyaṃ na bhavati nṛpa evaṃ hi jāyate /
GP11brahmppu:30613: ṣoḍaśī tu kalā sūkṣmā sa soma upadhāryatām // BrP_242.57 //
GP11brahmppu:30614: na tūpayujyate devair devān api yunakti saḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30616: prakṛtes triguṇāyās tu sa eva triguṇo bhavet // BrP_242.58 //
GP11brahmppu:30619: strīpuṃsayor vā saṃbandhaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate // BrP_243.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30620: ṛte tu puruṣaṃ neha strī garbhān dhārayaty uta /
GP11brahmppu:30621: ṛte striyaṃ na puruṣo rūpaṃ nirvartate tathā // BrP_243.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30623: rūpaṃ nirvartayed etad evaṃ sarvāsu yoniṣu // BrP_243.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30625: ṛtau nirvartate rūpaṃ tad vakṣyāmi nidarśanam // BrP_243.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30626: ye guṇāḥ puruṣasyeha ye ca mātur guṇās tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30627: asthi snāyu ca majjā ca jānīmaḥ pitṛto dvija // BrP_243.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30629: evam etad dvijaśreṣṭha vedaśāstreṣu paṭhyate // BrP_243.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30630: pramāṇaṃ yac ca vedoktaṃ śāstroktaṃ yac ca paṭhyate /
GP11brahmppu:30631: vedaśāstrapramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tat sanātanam // BrP_243.7 //
GP11brahmppu:30633: yac cāpi bhagavaṃs tasmān mokṣadharmo na vidyate // BrP_243.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30635: tan mamācakṣva tattvena pratyakṣo hy asi sarvadā // BrP_243.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30636: mokṣakāmā vayaṃ cāpi kāṅkṣāmo yad anāmayam /
GP11brahmppu:30637: ajeyam ajaraṃ nityam atīndriyam anīśvaram // BrP_243.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30640: evam etad yathā vakṣye tattvagrāhī yathā bhavān // BrP_243.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30641: dhāryate hi tvayā grantha ubhayor vedaśāstrayoḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30642: na ca granthasya tattvajño yathātattvaṃ nareśvara // BrP_243.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30643: yo hi vede ca śāstre ca granthadhāraṇatatparaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30644: na ca granthārthatattvajñas tasya taddhāraṇaṃ vṛthā // BrP_243.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30645: bhāraṃ sa vahate tasya granthasyārthaṃ na vetti yaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30646: yas tu granthārthatattvajño nāsya granthāgamo vṛthā // BrP_243.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30647: granthasyārthaṃ sa pṛṣṭas tu mādṛśo vaktum arhati /
GP11brahmppu:30648: yathātattvābhigamanād arthaṃ tasya sa vindati // BrP_243.15 //
GP11brahmppu:30649: na yaḥ samutsukaḥ kaścid granthārthaṃ sthūlabuddhimān /
GP11brahmppu:30650: sa kathaṃ mandavijñāno granthaṃ vakṣyati nirṇayāt // BrP_243.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30651: ajñātvā granthatattvāni vādaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30652: lobhād vāpy athavā dambhāt sa pāpī narakaṃ vrajet // BrP_243.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30653: nirṇayaṃ cāpi cchidrātmā na tad vakṣyati tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30655: tasmāt tvaṃ śṛṇu rājendra yathaitad anudṛśyate /
GP11brahmppu:30656: yathā tattvena sāṃkhyeṣu yogeṣu ca mahātmasu // BrP_243.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30657: yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti sāṃkhyaṃ tad anugamyate /
GP11brahmppu:30658: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa buddhimān // BrP_243.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30659: tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca /
GP11brahmppu:30660: etad aindriyakaṃ tāta yad bhavān ittham āttha mām // BrP_243.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30661: dravyād dravyasya nirvṛttir indriyād indriyaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30662: dehād deham avāpnoti bījād bījaṃ tathaiva ca // BrP_243.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30664: kathaṃ guṇā bhaviṣyanti nirguṇatvān mahātmanaḥ // BrP_243.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30665: guṇā guṇeṣu jāyante tatraiva viramanti ca /
GP11brahmppu:30666: evaṃ guṇāḥ prakṛtijā jāyante na ca yānti ca // BrP_243.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30667: tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca /
GP11brahmppu:30668: aṣṭau tāny atha śukreṇa jānīhi prākṛtena vai // BrP_243.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30669: pumāṃś caivāpumāṃś caiva strīliṅgaṃ prākṛtaṃ smṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:30670: vāyur eṣa pumāṃś caiva rasa ity abhidhīyate // BrP_243.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30672: yathā puṣpaphalair nityaṃ mūrtaṃ cāmūrtayas tathā // BrP_243.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30673: evam apy anumānena sa liṅgam upalabhyate /
GP11brahmppu:30676: kevalaṃ tv abhimānitvād guṇeṣu guṇa ucyate // BrP_243.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30677: guṇā guṇavataḥ santi nirguṇasya kuto guṇāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30678: tasmād evaṃ vijānanti ye janā guṇadarśinaḥ // BrP_243.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30679: yadā tv eṣa guṇān etān prākṛtān abhimanyate /
GP11brahmppu:30680: tadā sa guṇavān eva guṇabhedān prapaśyati // BrP_243.31 //
GP11brahmppu:30681: yat tad buddheḥ paraṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30683: aprabuddhaṃ yathā vyaktaṃ svaguṇaiḥ prāhur īśvaram /
GP11brahmppu:30684: nirguṇaṃ ceśvaraṃ nityam adhiṣṭhātāram eva ca // BrP_243.33 //
GP11brahmppu:30685: prakṛteś ca guṇānāṃ ca pañcaviṃśatikaṃ budhāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30686: sāṃkhyayoge ca kuśalā budhyante paramaiṣiṇaḥ // BrP_243.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30688: budhyamānaṃ na budhyante 'vagacchanti samaṃ tadā // BrP_243.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30689: etan nidarśanaṃ samyaṅ na samyag anudarśanam /
GP11brahmppu:30690: budhyamānaṃ prabudhyante dvābhyāṃ pṛthag ariṃdama // BrP_243.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30692: ekatvam akṣaraṃ prāhur nānātvaṃ kṣaram ucyate // BrP_243.37 //
GP11brahmppu:30694: ekatvadarśanaṃ cāsya nānātvaṃ cāsya darśanam // BrP_243.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30695: tattvavit tattvayor eva pṛthag etan nidarśanam /
GP11brahmppu:30696: pañcaviṃśatibhis tattvaṃ tattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_243.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30698: varjyasya varjyam ācāraṃ tattvaṃ tattvāt sanātanam // BrP_243.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30701: paśyatas tad dhi saṃdigdham etayor vai nidarśanam // BrP_243.41 //
GP11brahmppu:30703: sthūlabuddhyā na paśyāmi tattvam etan na saṃśayaḥ // BrP_243.42 //
GP11brahmppu:30704: akṣarakṣarayor uktaṃ tvayā yad api kāraṇam /
GP11brahmppu:30705: tad apy asthirabuddhitvāt pranaṣṭam iva me 'nagha // BrP_243.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30707: dvaṃdvaṃ caivāniruddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ // BrP_243.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30708: vidyāvidye ca bhagavann akṣaraṃ kṣaram eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30709: sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca kṛtsnena buddhābuddhiṃ pṛthak pṛthak // BrP_243.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30711: hanta te saṃpravakṣyāmi yad etad anupṛcchasi /
GP11brahmppu:30712: yogakṛtyaṃ mahārāja pṛthag eva śṛṇuṣva me // BrP_243.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30713: yogakṛtyaṃ tu yogānāṃ dhyānam eva paraṃ balam /
GP11brahmppu:30714: tac cāpi dvividhaṃ dhyānam āhur vidyāvido janāḥ // BrP_243.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30715: ekāgratā ca manasaḥ prāṇāyāmas tathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30716: prāṇāyāmas tu saguṇo nirguṇo mānasas tathā // BrP_243.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30717: mūtrotsarge purīṣe ca bhojane ca narādhipa /
GP11brahmppu:30718: dvikālaṃ nopabhuñjīta śeṣaṃ bhuñjīta tatparaḥ // BrP_243.49 //
GP11brahmppu:30720: daśadvādaśabhir vāpi caturviṃśāt paraṃ yataḥ // BrP_243.50 //
GP11brahmppu:30721: sa codanābhir matimān nātmānaṃ codayed atha /
GP11brahmppu:30722: tiṣṭhantam ajaraṃ taṃ tu yat tad uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // BrP_243.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30723: viśvātmā satataṃ jñeya ity evam anuśuśruma /
GP11brahmppu:30724: dravyaṃ hy ahīnamanaso nānyatheti viniścayaḥ // BrP_243.52 //
GP11brahmppu:30726: pūrvarātre parārdhe ca dhārayīta mano hṛdi // BrP_243.53 //
GP11brahmppu:30728: mano buddhyā sthiraṃ kṛtvā pāṣāṇa iva niścalaḥ // BrP_243.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30729: sthāṇuvac cāpy akampyaḥ syād dāruvac cāpi niścalaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30730: buddhyā vidhividhānajñas tato yuktaṃ pracakṣate // BrP_243.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30731: na śṛṇoti na cāghrāti na ca paśyati kiṃcana /
GP11brahmppu:30732: na ca sparśaṃ vijānāti na ca saṃkalpate manaḥ // BrP_243.56 //
GP11brahmppu:30733: na cāpi manyate kiṃcin na ca budhyeta kāṣṭhavat /
GP11brahmppu:30734: tadā prakṛtim āpannaṃ yuktam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_243.57 //
GP11brahmppu:30735: na bhāti hi yathā dīpo dīptis tadvac ca dṛśyate /
GP11brahmppu:30736: niliṅgaś cādhaś cordhvaṃ ca tiryaggatim avāpnuyāt // BrP_243.58 //
GP11brahmppu:30737: tadā tadupapannaś ca yasmin dṛṣṭe ca kathyate /
GP11brahmppu:30738: hṛdayastho 'ntarātmeti jñeyo jñas tāta madvidhaiḥ // BrP_243.59 //
GP11brahmppu:30739: nirdhūma iva saptārcir āditya iva raśmivān /
GP11brahmppu:30740: vaidyuto 'gnir ivākāśe paśyaty ātmānam ātmani // BrP_243.60 //
GP11brahmppu:30742: brāhmaṇā brahmayonisthā hy ayonim amṛtātmakam // BrP_243.61 //
GP11brahmppu:30743: tad evāhur aṇubhyo 'ṇu tan mahadbhyo mahattaram /
GP11brahmppu:30744: sarvatra sarvabhūteṣu dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate // BrP_243.62 //
GP11brahmppu:30746: mahatas tamasas tāta pāre tiṣṭhan na tāmasaḥ // BrP_243.63 //
GP11brahmppu:30747: tamaso dūra ity uktas tattvajñair vedapāragaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30749: yoga eṣa hi lokānāṃ kim anyad yogalakṣaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:30750: evaṃ paśyan prapaśyeta ātmānam ajaraṃ param // BrP_243.65 //
GP11brahmppu:30751: yogadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te tattvato mayā /
GP11brahmppu:30753: avyaktam āhuḥ prakhyānaṃ parāṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30754: tasmān mahat samutpannaṃ dvitīyaṃ rājasattama // BrP_243.67 //
GP11brahmppu:30755: ahaṃkāras tu mahatas tṛtīya iti naḥ śrutam /
GP11brahmppu:30757: etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa /
GP11brahmppu:30758: pañca caiva viśeṣāś ca tathā pañcendriyāṇi ca // BrP_243.69 //
GP11brahmppu:30759: etāvad eva tattvānāṃ sāṃkhyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30760: sāṃkhye sāṃkhyavidhānajñā nityaṃ sāṃkhyapathe sthitāḥ // BrP_243.70 //
GP11brahmppu:30761: yasmād yad abhijāyeta tat tatraiva pralīyate /
GP11brahmppu:30764: guṇā guṇeṣu satataṃ sāgarasyormayo yathā // BrP_243.72 //
GP11brahmppu:30766: ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca tathā sṛji // BrP_243.73 //
GP11brahmppu:30767: evam eva ca rājendra vijñeyaṃ jñānakovidaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30768: adhiṣṭhātāram avyaktam asyāpy etan nidarśanam // BrP_243.74 //
GP11brahmppu:30769: ekatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca prakṛter anu tattvavān /
GP11brahmppu:30770: ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca pravartanāt // BrP_243.75 //
GP11brahmppu:30772: tac ca kṣetraṃ mahān ātmā pañcaviṃśo 'dhitiṣṭhati // BrP_243.76 //
GP11brahmppu:30774: adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā kṣetrāṇām iti naḥ śrutam // BrP_243.77 //
GP11brahmppu:30775: kṣetraṃ jānāti cāvyaktaṃ kṣetrajña iti cocyate /
GP11brahmppu:30776: avyaktike pure śete puruṣaś ceti kathyate // BrP_243.78 //
GP11brahmppu:30777: anyad eva ca kṣetraṃ syād anyaḥ kṣetrajña ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:30778: kṣetram avyakta ity uktaṃ jñātāraṃ pañcaviṃśakam // BrP_243.79 //
GP11brahmppu:30779: anyad eva ca jñānaṃ syād anyaj jñeyaṃ tad ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:30780: jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyo vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ // BrP_243.80 //
GP11brahmppu:30781: avyaktaṃ kṣetram ity uktaṃ tathā sattvaṃ tatheśvaram /
GP11brahmppu:30782: anīśvaram atattvaṃ ca tattvaṃ tat pañcaviṃśakam // BrP_243.81 //
GP11brahmppu:30784: saṃkhyā prakurute caiva prakṛtiṃ ca pravakṣyate // BrP_243.82 //
GP11brahmppu:30786: saṃkhyā sahasrakṛtyā tu nistattvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ // BrP_243.83 //
GP11brahmppu:30788: yadā budhyati ātmānaṃ tadā bhavati kevalaḥ // BrP_243.84 //
GP11brahmppu:30790: evam etad vijānantaḥ sāmyatāṃ pratiyānty uta // BrP_243.85 //
GP11brahmppu:30792: guṇavattvād yathaitāni nirguṇebhyas tathā bhavet // BrP_243.86 //
GP11brahmppu:30793: na tv evaṃ vartamānānām āvṛttir vartate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30794: vidyate kṣarabhāvaś ca na parasparam avyayam // BrP_243.87 //
GP11brahmppu:30795: paśyanty amatayo ye na samyak teṣu ca darśanam /
GP11brahmppu:30796: te vyaktiṃ pratipadyante punaḥ punar ariṃdama // BrP_243.88 //
GP11brahmppu:30797: sarvam etad vijānanto na sarvasya prabodhanāt /
GP11brahmppu:30799: sarvam avyaktam ity uktam asarvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30800: ya evam abhijānanti na bhayaṃ teṣu vidyate // BrP_243.90 //
GP11brahmppu:30803: vidyāvidye tv idānīṃ me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ // BrP_244.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30805: sargapralaya ity uktaṃ vidyāvidye ca viṃśakaḥ // BrP_244.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30809: buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca tathā viśeṣā iti naḥ śrutam // BrP_244.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30810: viṣayāṇāṃ manas teṣāṃ vidyām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30811: manasaḥ pañca bhūtāni vidyā ity abhicakṣate // BrP_244.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30812: ahaṃkāras tu bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30813: ahaṃkāras tathā vidyā buddhir vidyā nareśvara // BrP_244.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30815: vidyā jñeyā naraśreṣṭha vidhiś ca paramaḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_244.7 //
GP11brahmppu:30816: avyaktam aparaṃ prāhur vidyā vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30817: sarvasya sarvam ity uktaṃ jñeyajñānasya pāragaḥ // BrP_244.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30818: jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam /
GP11brahmppu:30819: tathaiva jñānam avyaktaṃ vijñātā pañcaviṃśakaḥ // BrP_244.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30820: vidyāvidye tu tattvena mayokte vai viśeṣataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30821: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yad uktaṃ tan nibodha me // BrP_244.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30822: ubhāv etau kṣarāv uktau ubhāv etāv anakṣarau /
GP11brahmppu:30823: kāraṇaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathājñānaṃ tu jñānataḥ // BrP_244.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30825: tattvasaṃjñāv ubhāv eva procyete jñānacintakaiḥ // BrP_244.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30827: tad etad guṇasargāya vikurvāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // BrP_244.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30829: adhiṣṭhānaṃ kṣetram āhur etad vai pañcaviṃśakam // BrP_244.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30830: yad antarguṇajālaṃ tu tad vyaktātmani saṃkṣipet /
GP11brahmppu:30831: tad ahaṃ tad guṇais tais tu pañcaviṃśe vilīyate // BrP_244.15 //
GP11brahmppu:30832: guṇā guṇeṣu līyante tad ekā prakṛtir bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:30833: kṣetrajño 'pi tadā tāvat kṣetrajñaḥ saṃpraṇīyate // BrP_244.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30835: nirguṇatvaṃ ca vai dehe guṇeṣu parivartanāt // BrP_244.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30837: prakṛtyā nirguṇas tv eṣa ity evam anuśuśruma // BrP_244.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30838: kṣaro bhavaty eṣa yadā guṇavatī guṇeṣv atha /
GP11brahmppu:30839: prakṛtiṃ tv atha jānāti nirguṇatvaṃ tathātmanaḥ // BrP_244.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30841: anyo 'ham anyeyam iti yadā budhyati buddhimān // BrP_244.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30842: tadaiṣo 'vyathatām eti na ca miśratvam āvrajet /
GP11brahmppu:30843: prakṛtyā caiṣa rājendra miśro 'nyo 'nyasya dṛśyate // BrP_244.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30844: yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tat prākṛtaṃ vijugupsate /
GP11brahmppu:30845: paśyate ca paraṃ paśyaṃs tadā paśyan nu saṃsṛjet // BrP_244.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30846: kiṃ mayā kṛtam etāvad yo 'haṃ kālanimajjanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30847: yathā matsyo hy abhijñānād anuvartitavāñ jalam // BrP_244.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30848: aham eva hi saṃmohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam /
GP11brahmppu:30851: ātmānaṃ tad avajñānād anyaṃ caiva na vedmy aham // BrP_244.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30852: mamāstu dhik kubuddhasya yo 'haṃ magna imaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30853: anuvartitavān mohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam // BrP_244.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30854: ayam anubhaved bandhur anena saha me kṣayam /
GP11brahmppu:30855: sāmyam ekatvatāṃ yāto yādṛśas tādṛśas tv aham // BrP_244.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30856: tulyatām iha paśyāmi sadṛśo 'ham anena vai /
GP11brahmppu:30857: ayaṃ hi vimalo vyaktam aham īdṛśakas tadā // BrP_244.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30859: saṃsargād atisaṃsargāt sthitaḥ kālam imaṃ tv aham // BrP_244.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30860: so 'ham evaṃ vaśībhūtaḥ kālam etaṃ na buddhavān /
GP11brahmppu:30861: uttamādhamamadhyānāṃ tām ahaṃ katham āvase // BrP_244.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30863: gacchāmy abuddhabhāvatvād ihedānīṃ sthiro bhava // BrP_244.31 //
GP11brahmppu:30864: sahavāsaṃ na yāsyāmi kālam etaṃ vivañcanāt /
GP11brahmppu:30865: vañcito hy anayā yad dhi nirvikāro vikārayā // BrP_244.32 //
GP11brahmppu:30866: na tat tadaparāddhaṃ syād aparādho hy ayaṃ mama /
GP11brahmppu:30867: yo 'ham atrābhavaṃ saktaḥ parāṅmukham upasthitaḥ // BrP_244.33 //
GP11brahmppu:30869: amūrtiś cāpy amūrtātmā mamatvena pradharṣitaḥ // BrP_244.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30870: prakṛtyā ca tayā tena tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu /
GP11brahmppu:30871: nirmamasya mamatvena vikṛtaṃ tāsu tāsu ca // BrP_244.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30873: samatā na mayā kācid ahaṃkāre kṛtā mayā // BrP_244.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30874: ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā so 'yaṃ bhūyo yunakti mām /
GP11brahmppu:30877: apalagnām imāṃ hitvā saṃśrayiṣye nirāmayam // BrP_244.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30879: kṣemaṃ mama sahānena naivaikam anayā saha // BrP_244.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30881: akṣaratvaṃ nigacchati tyaktvā kṣaram anāmayam // BrP_244.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30883: nirguṇaṃ prathamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛg bhavati maithila // BrP_244.41 //
GP11brahmppu:30886: niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca viśuddhaṃ vimalaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30887: pravakṣyāmi tu te bhūyas tan nibodha yathāśrutam // BrP_244.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30889: yad eva sāṃkhyaśāstroktaṃ yogadarśanam eva tat // BrP_244.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30891: vispaṣṭaṃ procyate tatra śiṣyāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā // BrP_244.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30892: bṛhac caivam idaṃ śāstram ity āhur viduṣo janāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30893: asmiṃś ca śāstre yogānāṃ punarbhavapuraḥsaram // BrP_244.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30894: pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ tattvaṃ paṭhyate ca narādhipa /
GP11brahmppu:30895: sāṃkhyānāṃ tu paraṃ tattvaṃ yathāvad anuvarṇitam // BrP_244.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30896: buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30897: budhyamānaṃ ca buddhatvaṃ prāhur yoganidarśanam // BrP_244.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30900: guṇānāṃ dhāryatāṃ tattvaṃ sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā // BrP_245.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30901: ajo hi krīḍayā bhūpa vikriyāṃ prāpta ity uta /
GP11brahmppu:30902: ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā nāneva praticakṣate // BrP_245.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30903: etad evaṃ vikurvāṇo budhyamāno na budhyate /
GP11brahmppu:30904: guṇān ācarate hy eṣa sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā // BrP_245.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30906: na tv evaṃ budhyate 'vyaktaṃ saguṇaṃ tāta nirguṇam // BrP_245.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30907: kadācit tv eva khalv etat tad āhuḥ pratibuddhakam /
GP11brahmppu:30908: budhyate yadi cāvyaktam etad vai pañcaviṃśakam // BrP_245.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30909: budhyamāno bhavaty eṣa mamātmaka iti śrutaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30912: pañcaviṃśaṃ mahātmānaṃ na cāsāv api budhyate // BrP_245.7 //
GP11brahmppu:30914: satataṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ tu caturviṃśaṃ vibudhyate // BrP_245.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30916: avyaktaṃ caiva tad brahma budhyate tāta kevalam // BrP_245.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30918: budhyamāno yadātmānam anyo 'ham iti manyate // BrP_245.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30920: budhyate ca parāṃ buddhiṃ viśuddhām amalāṃ yathā // BrP_245.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30921: ṣaḍviṃśaṃ rājaśārdūla tadā buddhaḥ kṛto vrajet /
GP11brahmppu:30926: etat tu tattvam ity āhur nistattvam ajarāmaram // BrP_245.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30929: na caiva tattvavāṃs tāta saṃsāreṣu nimajjati /
GP11brahmppu:30930: eṣām upaiti tattvaṃ hi kṣipraṃ budhyasva lakṣaṇam // BrP_245.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30932: kevalena balenaiva samatāṃ yāty asaṃśayam // BrP_245.17 //
