GP11brahmppu:30934: etan nānātvam ity uktaṃ sāṃkhyaśrutinidarśanāt // BrP_245.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30936: ekatvaṃ vai bhavet tasya yadā buddhyānubudhyate // BrP_245.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30938: saṅgadharmā bhavaty eṣa niḥsaṅgātmā narādhipa // BrP_245.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30940: vibhus tyajati cāvyaktaṃ yadā tv etad vibudhyate // BrP_245.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30942: eṣa hy apratibuddhaś ca budhyamānas tu te 'nagha // BrP_245.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30944: maśakodumbare yadvad anyatvaṃ tadvad etayoḥ // BrP_245.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30946: evam eva ca gantavyaṃ nānātvaikatvam etayoḥ // BrP_245.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30950: so 'yam evaṃ vimucyeta nānyatheti viniścayaḥ // BrP_245.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30951: paraś ca paradharmā ca bhavaty eva sametya vai /
GP11brahmppu:30952: viśuddhadharmā śuddhena nāśuddhena ca buddhimān // BrP_245.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30954: viyogadharmiṇā caiva vimuktātmā bhavaty atha // BrP_245.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30955: vimokṣiṇā vimokṣaś ca sametyeha tathā bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:30956: śucikarmā śuciś caiva bhavaty amitabuddhimān // BrP_245.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30958: kevalātmā tathā caiva kevalena sametya vai /
GP11brahmppu:30959: svatantraś ca svatantreṇa svatantratvam avāpyate // BrP_245.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30960: etāvad etat kathitaṃ mayā te BrP_245.31a
GP11brahmppu:30965: pradeyam etat paramaṃ tvayā bhavet BrP_245.32b
GP11brahmppu:30968: na deyam etac ca yathānṛtātmane BrP_245.33a
GP11brahmppu:30979: sadaiva guhyaṃ tv idam eva deyam BrP_245.35d
GP11brahmppu:30980: etair guṇair hīnatame na deyam BrP_245.36a
GP11brahmppu:30981: etat paraṃ brahma viśuddham āhuḥ BrP_245.36b
GP11brahmppu:30982: na śreyase yokṣyati tādṛśe kṛtaṃ BrP_245.36c
GP11brahmppu:30984: pṛthvīm imāṃ vā yadi ratnapūrṇāṃ BrP_245.37a
GP11brahmppu:30985: dadyād adeyaṃ tv idam avratāya BrP_245.37b
GP11brahmppu:30988: karāla mā te bhayam asti kiṃcid BrP_245.38a
GP11brahmppu:30989: etac chrutaṃ brahma paraṃ tvayādya BrP_245.38b
GP11brahmppu:30996: avāptam etad dhi purā sanātanād BrP_245.40a
GP11brahmppu:31000: pṛṣṭas tvayā cāsmi yathā narendra BrP_245.41a
GP11brahmppu:31001: tathā mayedaṃ tvayi noktam anyat BrP_245.41b
GP11brahmppu:31005: etad uktaṃ paraṃ brahma yasmān nāvartate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31006: pañcaviṃśaṃ muniśreṣṭhā vasiṣṭhena yathā purā // BrP_245.42 //
GP11brahmppu:31009: etan niḥśreyasakaraṃ jñānaṃ bhoḥ paramaṃ mayā /
GP11brahmppu:31010: kathitaṃ tattvato viprāḥ śrutvā devarṣito dvijāḥ // BrP_245.44 //
GP11brahmppu:31013: nāradād viditaṃ mahyam etad uktaṃ sanātanam /
GP11brahmppu:31014: mā śucadhvaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ śrutvaitat paramaṃ padam // BrP_245.46 //
GP11brahmppu:31015: yena kṣarākṣare bhinne na bhayaṃ tasya vidyate /
GP11brahmppu:31016: vidyate tu bhayaṃ yasya yo nainaṃ vetti tattvataḥ // BrP_245.47 //
GP11brahmppu:31017: avijñānāc ca mūḍhātmā punaḥ punar upadravān /
GP11brahmppu:31019: devalokaṃ tathā tiryaṅ mānuṣyam api cāśnute /
GP11brahmppu:31020: yadi vā mucyate vāpi tasmād ajñānasāgarāt // BrP_245.49 //
GP11brahmppu:31022: ahany ahani majjanti yatra bhūtāni bho dvijāḥ // BrP_245.50 //
GP11brahmppu:31024: tasmād yūyaṃ virajaskā vitamaskāś ca bho dvijāḥ // BrP_245.51 //
GP11brahmppu:31025: evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhāḥ sārāt sārataraṃ param /
GP11brahmppu:31026: kathitaṃ paramaṃ mokṣaṃ yaṃ jñātvā na nivartate // BrP_245.52 //
GP11brahmppu:31028: na duṣṭamataye viprā na śraddhāvimukhāya ca // BrP_245.53 //
GP11brahmppu:31030: evaṃ purā munīn vyāsaḥ purāṇaṃ ślakṣṇayā girā /
GP11brahmppu:31038: hṛṣṭā babhūvuḥ suprītā vismitāś ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31039: praśaśaṃsus tadā vyāsaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ munim // BrP_246.5 //
GP11brahmppu:31044: na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃcit triṣu lokeṣu vai prabho // BrP_246.7 //
GP11brahmppu:31045: sarvajñas tvaṃ mahābhāga deveṣv iva bṛhaspatiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31046: namasyāmo mahāprājñaṃ brahmiṣṭhaṃ tvāṃ mahāmunim // BrP_246.8 //
GP11brahmppu:31047: yena tvayā tu vedārthā bhārate prakaṭīkṛtāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31048: kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ tava sarvān mahāmune // BrP_246.9 //
GP11brahmppu:31049: adhītya caturo vedān sāṅgān vyākaraṇāni ca /
GP11brahmppu:31050: kṛtavān bhārataṃ śāstraṃ tasmai jñānātmane namaḥ // BrP_246.10 //
GP11brahmppu:31057: evam uktvā samabhyarcya vyāsaṃ te caiva pūjitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31058: jagmur yathāgataṃ sarve kṛtakṛtyāḥ svam āśramam // BrP_246.13 //
GP11brahmppu:31059: tathā mayā muniśreṣṭhā kathitaṃ hi sanātanam /
GP11brahmppu:31062: vyāsaprasādāt tat sarvaṃ mayā saṃparikīrtitam // BrP_246.15 //
GP11brahmppu:31067: prāpnoti brāhmaṇo vidyāṃ kṣatriyo vijayaṃ raṇe /
GP11brahmppu:31068: vaiśyas tu dhanam akṣayyaṃ śūdraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt // BrP_246.18 //
GP11brahmppu:31069: yaṃ yaṃ kāmam abhidhyāyañ śṛṇoti puruṣaḥ śuciḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31070: taṃ taṃ kāmam avāpnoti naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_246.19 //
GP11brahmppu:31073: etad vo yan mayākhyātaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam /
GP11brahmppu:31076: upoṣya yad avāpnoti tad asya śravaṇān naraḥ // BrP_246.22 //
GP11brahmppu:31077: yad agnihotre suhute varṣe nāpnoti vai phalam /
GP11brahmppu:31078: mahāpuṇyamayaṃ viprās tad asya śravaṇāt sakṛt // BrP_246.23 //
GP11brahmppu:31080: mathurāyāṃ hariṃ dṛṣṭvā prāpnoti puruṣaḥ phalam // BrP_246.24 //
GP11brahmppu:31081: tad āpnoti phalaṃ samyak samādhānena kīrtanāt /
GP11brahmppu:31083: yat phalaṃ kriyam ālokya puruṣo 'tha labhen naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31084: tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād api // BrP_246.26 //
GP11brahmppu:31085: idaṃ yaḥ śraddhayā nityaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam /
GP11brahmppu:31086: yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyān martyaḥ sa yāti bhuvanaṃ hareḥ // BrP_246.27 //
GP11brahmppu:31087: śrāvayed brāhmaṇo yas tu sadā parvasu saṃyataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31088: ekādaśyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ ca viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BrP_246.28 //
GP11brahmppu:31091: trisaṃdhyaṃ yaḥ paṭhed vidvāñ śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31092: idaṃ variṣṭham ākhyānaṃ sa sarvam īpsitaṃ labhet // BrP_246.30 //
GP11brahmppu:31093: rogārto mucyate rogād baddho mucyeta bandhanāt /
GP11brahmppu:31094: bhayād vimucyate bhīta āpadāpanna āpadaḥ // BrP_246.31 //
GP11brahmppu:31095: jātismaratvaṃ vidyāṃ ca putrān medhāṃ paśūn dhṛtim /
GP11brahmppu:31096: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ tu labhate naraḥ // BrP_246.32 //
GP11brahmppu:31097: yān yān kāmān abhipretya paṭhet prayatamānasaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31098: tāṃs tān sarvān avāpnoti puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_246.33 //
GP11brahmppu:31099: yaś cedaṃ satataṃ śṛṇoti manujaḥ svargāpavargapradaṃ BrP_246.34a
GP11brahmppu:31100: viṣṇuṃ lokaguruṃ praṇamya varadaṃ bhaktyekacittaḥ śuciḥ BrP_246.34b
GP11brahmppu:31101: bhuktvā cātra sukhaṃ vimuktakaluṣaḥ svarge ca divyaṃ sukhaṃ BrP_246.34c
GP11brahmppu:31102: paścād yāti hareḥ padaṃ suvimalaṃ mukto guṇaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ BrP_246.34d
GP11brahmppu:31104: tadvat kṣatriyapuṃgavais tu niyataiḥ śreyorthibhiḥ sarvadā BrP_246.35b
GP11brahmppu:31105: vaiśyaiś cānudinaṃ viśuddhakulajaiḥ śūdrais tathā dhārmikaiḥ BrP_246.35c
GP11brahmppu:31106: śrotavyaṃ tv idam uttamaṃ bahuphalaṃ dharmārthamokṣapradam BrP_246.35d
GP11brahmppu:31107: dharme matir bhavatu vaḥ puruṣottamānāṃ BrP_246.36a
GP11brahmppu:31108: sa hy eka eva paralokagatasya bandhuḥ BrP_246.36b
GP11brahmppu:31109: arthāḥ striyaś ca nipuṇair api sevyamānā BrP_246.36c
GP11brahmppu:31110: naiva prabhāvam upayānti na ca sthiratvam BrP_246.36d
GP11brahmppu:31112: svargaṃ ca dharmeṇa naraḥ prayāti BrP_246.37b
GP11brahmppu:31113: āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca tapaś ca dharmaṃ BrP_246.37c
GP11brahmppu:31116: dharmaḥ sakhā cātra pare ca loke BrP_246.38b
GP11brahmppu:31117: trātā ca dharmas tv iha mokṣadaś ca BrP_246.38c
GP11brahmppu:31118: dharmād ṛte nāsti tu kiṃcid eva BrP_246.38d
GP11brahmppu:31119: idaṃ rahasyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ca purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam /
GP11brahmppu:31120: na deyaṃ duṣṭamataye nāstikāya viśeṣataḥ // BrP_246.39 //
